title: Multiple Sclerosis Messenger
description:
Multiple Sclerosis Messenger

Simple App..that allows patient message their current symptoms
out to contacts.

This can be instantly shared with health care providers such as an MS nurse,
neurologist, chiropractor, or MS carer, family member etc.

Further releases of this app with additional features will be available in near future.

Personal : This app is dedicated to Caroline who we lost to MS..
As her caregiver I felt I wanted to develop this for other sufferers with
this disease...Hope you find it helpful.

See also sister apps..Multiple Sclerosis ( for symptoms) and Multiple Sclerosis Chat.

title: ALS AT HOME
description:
ALS AT HOME (ALS Testing through Home-Based Outcome Measures) is a research study aiming to improve how ALS is measured, with the goal of improving future research and making it possible for patients to participate in studies that are far away from where they live.
 The goal of this study is to improve the way we measure outcomes in ALS trials, allowing for future research to be conducted more efficiently. All participants will take measurements at home and electronically send them to the research team.
 What are involved: Several devices are involved in the study for 9-month measurements, including Air smart spirometer, Skulpt chisel, and Mi band. These devices have their apps and can write specific data into participants' Health App if allowed. This app will read these specific data from participants' Heath app if allowed and also shows these data as a list. Additionally, participants can review their data collection history by clicking the History button.
 Data transfer: Since the study requires participants' daily data, participants need to open the app and click Send button before they go to bed every day to transfer the data to the study database. If participants forget to send data to the study database, a notification email will be sent to participants on the next day to remind them for data uploading Privacy Since ALS AT HOME is NOT a treatment study, participants' data will NOT be used for any external resources and will ONLY be used for this study indicated in the informed consent. All data will be securely stored in a HIPAA compliant and PHI encrypted database Healthkit API data is used for the following: Forced expiratory volume (1sec), forced vital capacity- used to determine participants' ability to breathe. Active energy - used to determine participants' calories burned Steps, walking + running distance - used to determine participants' activity by the number of steps taken and the distance performed Body fat percentage, body mass index - used to measure participants' fitness levels as well as fitness changes Height, weight - used to measure fairness when comparing participants' fitness levels and fitness changes with other participants

title: Speech Assistant AAC
description:
Speech Assistant AAC is a Text to Speech (TTS) app designed for people who are speech impaired, for example due to Aphasia, MND/ALS, Autism, Stroke, Cerebral Palsy or other speech problems.

With the app you can create categories and phrases, which are placed on buttons. With these buttons you can create messages that can be shown or spoken (text-to-speech). It is also possible to type any text using the keyboard.
The app is easy to use and can be completely customized to your needs and preferences.

For all devices
‚Ä¢ The app is available for smartphones and tablets.
‚Ä¢ Portrait and landscape layout for all devices.

Categories and phrases
‚Ä¢ Add, change or delete your own phrases. 
‚Ä¢ You can create categories to organize your phrases for quick access.
‚Ä¢ Long press (optional setting) to easily edit the phrase and category buttons.
‚Ä¢ Option to Backup and Restore your categories and phrases.

Fully Customizable
‚Ä¢ The size of the buttons, the textbox and the text can be adjusted.
‚Ä¢ The app has various color schemes and you can also create a personal color scheme.

Full screen
‚Ä¢ Show your message full screen with a very large font.
‚Ä¢ Useful for communicating in a noisy environment.

Other features
‚Ä¢ Connect a bluetooth keyboard and create shortcuts for the functions Speak, Clear and Show.
‚Ä¢ Button to share your message to mail, text and social media.
‚Ä¢ Option for preventing double tapping by disabling the button (for a short time) after touching.
‚Ä¢ Undo option in case of unintentionally tapping the clear button.
‚Ä¢ Button to make an attention sound.
   
Speech
The voice is not part of the app, but the app uses the voice that‚Äôs installed on your device. For instance the voices from Google Text-to-Speech. You can change the voice in the settings of your device. You can also download other voices from the Google Play Store.
   
Feedback and information
For feedback, questions, tips or problems, please contact: android@asoft.nl
Website: www.asoft.nl
   
Full version
In the settings of the app you can upgrade to the full version with additional features like more categories and phrases, customizable action buttons, pronunciation corrections and much more.

recentChanges:
- The color picker has more color choices.
- It is now possible to Backup / Restore from Google Drive.
comments: Found it outstanding, I have mnd and my voice has gone and and I am a techno phobe and found this easy to use, communication between me and my wife is far better now. This app is far superior to others I have tried.

This app is everything I never realized I needed!!! I am on the Autism spectrum, and my wife is too. We both go nonverbal sometimes. This makes it so much easier to communicate during those times. Wish I had this growing up!!! It's also fun to play with because we are immature lol. We made the male Google voice sound uncannily like Connor from Detroit: Become Human.
This thing has saved my butt when anxiety shuts down my ability to talk. It's easy to modify, and it doesn't feel like an AAC device for special needs, with extraneous pictures. Simple, easy to use.

Great app! It's very customizable and perfect for those who prefer text-based AAC apps. I even have different profiles with different setups and colors for my ease of use. This is simply great and flexible.
i love this. i have autism and sometimes go nonverbal in stressful situations, i love that i was able to program the phrases to be exactly what i want.

title: ALS Containers
description:
ALS is the ideal solution for Containers operation management for import and export jobs. It provide the real time information to all the related parties hence streamline the business operation. This increase the productivity and improve the business revenue. 

ALS Provides Mobile Application for Organisations Drivers to update real time status of their assigned jobs. Below are the some of the functionalities of the mobile app:

1. Online Information tool for Vehicle owner for get assigned duties.
2. Native login.
2. List of assigned containers appear after the respected login of the Driver.
3. Detail of the container contains:
      Origin Address
      Destination Address
      Bill to Detail
      Contact Number of destination address
      Container Size and Type.
4. Map View to get Route Directions
5. Various status available according to the Condition.
6. Include Yard, Return, Pick Up and Loading Locations Information.
7. Image/document upload Functionality.

Methods In ALS Container Shipping
1. Live Load shipping
2. Drop and Pick shipping
3. Yard shipping
4. Port Delivery shipping

Import Container Summary:
1. Pick Container(Loaded) from Drop Off Location
2. Container Load Delivered at Customer Door.

Export Container Summary:
1. Pick Container(Empty) and deliver to Door(Bill To).
2. Container with load Drop at Yard/Loading/Drop-Off location.
3. POD at Drop Off Location.

title: ALS Compass
description:
ALS Compass is a sampling intelligence that integrates data management from planning through to results.

Data Management is seamless across sample planning, field work, COC management, analysis, the ALS LIMS system, and Webtrieve‚Ñ¢ results. 

From the moment you realise you need to do sampling, you can map out your own data managed sampling course from the comfort of your office

How will a sampling app help?

‚Ä¢Sampling can be planned at any time directly in the app
‚Ä¢Built-in checks and balances ensure all samples are taken
‚Ä¢ALS Quotation documents available directly from the app
‚Ä¢Sampling containers include barcode identity
‚Ä¢No more handwriting on sample bottles
‚Ä¢Automatic creation of COC document
‚Ä¢Managers can check submissions remotely before they are submitted to ALS
‚Ä¢GPS locator with the option for photos and sample meta data adds to a more complete story around capturing the sampling event

title: HelpMeTalk
description:
HelpMeTalk is help to improve the Speech capabilities of people with speech and language disorders who are receiving Speech Therapy. This app is full of engaging pictures, interesting animation, voices and effective exercises. This encourages practice and results in better progress with speech.

List of features:
‚úî Support multi language and voices.
‚úî Support animation (GIF) beside choosing from device, you can make your own animation by taking video.
‚úî Effective exercise for learn to talk with using speech recognition.
‚úî Customise pictures by choosing from device or taking new photos.
‚úî Customise voices by changing language setting or record your own voices.
‚úî Able to adjust the vocal pitch and speech rate.

Suitable for:
‚Ä¢ autism symptoms and Asperger syndrome, autistic spectrum disorder (ASD)
‚Ä¢ aphasia
‚Ä¢ speech apraxia
‚Ä¢ articulation/phonological disorder
‚Ä¢ Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS)
‚Ä¢ Motor Neuron Disease (MND)
‚Ä¢ cerebral palsy
‚Ä¢ down syndrome

Please rate us if you like this app and share with others who need help.

Nice app. Paid the subscription for the full version and found it easy enough to record audio and pictures. Big issue though is that it needs internet access to open the app. Big turn off not being able to use the app at all in offline mode. If this was fixed would consider reinstalling and updating the score.

This helps my son learn to say words by attaching a picture and hearing it say that word. I had trouble getting it to work at first, but after contacting the developer, they helped me fix that problem. Thanks!
Since I've shown my son this app, he opens the app and goes through the menu and attempts repeats the words by himself, without me having to sit and practice with him. Really easy for him to use.

title: CommBoards Lite - AAC Speech Assistant
description:
Commboards is an AAC Speech Assistance app that enables children and people of all ages with limited verbal abilities to express themselves and more easily communicate with the world around them, by utilizing a proved system of communication boards. Help your child or loved one communicate in an intuitive and fun way.

When tapping on a series of pictures or a symbol, the created sentence is being read aloud, which in turn encourages oral speech and helps express thoughts and feelings, in the method of Augmentative and Alternative Communication (AAC).
It can benefit people with Autism, Aspergers, and other common conditions related to verbal self-expression.

After downloading CommBoards, no internet connection or mobile contract is necessary for continuous use. You can use CommBoards in almost any situation, like schools, hospitals, and even during flights.

CommBoards' image bank contains a rich collection of easy to understand imagery, as well as the option to add existing images from the device or take new photos with the device camera.

CommBoards is a feature-packed solution that includes:

Predefined communication boards : 
‚úî Feel - happy, sad, angry, confused
‚úî Play - common children toys and creativity items
‚úî Eat - common foods
‚úî Drink - common drinks
‚úî Say Hello To - mom, dad, grandparents

Features:
‚úî High-quality imagery
‚úî Unlimited creation of new categories with custom images and sounds

descriptionHTML:
Commboards is an AAC Speech Assistance app that enables children and people of all ages with limited verbal abilities to express themselves and more easily communicate with the world around them, by utilizing a proved system of communication boards. Help your child or loved one communicate in an intuitive and fun way.

When tapping on a series of pictures or a symbol, the created sentence is being read aloud, which in turn encourages oral speech and helps express thoughts and feelings, in the method of Augmentative and Alternative Communication (AAC).
It can benefit people with Autism, Aspergers, and other common conditions related to verbal self-expression.

After downloading CommBoards, no internet connection or mobile contract is necessary for continuous use. You can use CommBoards in almost any situation, like schools, hospitals, and even during flights.

CommBoards' image bank contains a rich collection of easy to understand imagery, as well as the option to add existing images from the device or take new photos with the device camera.

CommBoards is a feature-packed solution that includes:

Predefined communication boards :
‚úî Feel - happy, sad, angry, confused
‚úî Play - common children toys and creativity items
‚úî Eat - common foods
‚úî Drink - common drinks
‚úî Say Hello To - mom, dad, grandparents

Features:
‚úî High-quality imagery
‚úî Unlimited creation of new categories with custom images and sounds
‚úî Select images from our rich image bank
‚úî Natural pronunciation of sounds and easy to understand images
‚úî Associate photos to cells using the camera or use images from your gallery
‚úî Record sounds using the microphone and associate it with any cell
‚úî Pre-configured for kids with autism spectrum disorder (ASD)

Suitable for :
‚úî Autism symptoms and Asperger syndrome
‚úî Aphasia
‚úî Speech Apraxia
‚úî Articulation/phonological disorder
‚úî Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS)
‚úî Motor Neuron Disease (MND)
‚úî Cerebral palsy
‚úî Down syndrome

‚úî Full support for multiple languages: English, Russian, Hebrew and Spanish, Chinese, Korean!
‚úî Used by Speech Language Pathologists (SLP)

comments: It is good that you can yourself create a vocab. Maybe to add 'to' to the verbs can create a confusion in some kids, because the may think that actual word is 'toeat' . I would add a possibility to add "to" or not. Would be also nice to vary a quickness of a pronounced word as some kids may not be able to get all sounds. It will be also nice to change as color of a word which is pronounced to focus on it and create a link between receptive and written.
I can't describe how amazing this app is. My son is select mute, we have struggled for years trying to communicate with teachers and peers. So amazing thank you so much!!
The pictures that we download could be a bit bigger or able to adjust
I'm new to this and it was not too hard to figure out. It's become a great resource.
Us English only. Keeps crashing.

title: Otsimo | Special Education Autism Learning Games
description:
Otsimo Special Education enables the individuals to engage their motor and cognitive skills through assistive matching, drawing, choosing, ordering and sound games. 

For individuals or children who struggle with speech and language, Otsimo includes free AAC (Alternative and Augmentative Communication). It is a common practice that is used in speech therapy and special education schools. AAC allows the individual to communicate their thoughts and emotions to their friends and family.

Otsimo games are developed according to the Applied Behavior Analysis - ABA therapy which is the most widely known and trusted early intensive behavioral therapy technique for helping individuals who have learning disorders and attention deficit problems.

Otsimo Special Education gives you plenty of reasons to try the games out:

A learning path feature, that is ideal for children learning new skills. The app provides a path of exercises depending on the level of progress.Featured for more than 250 days! Otsimo is a certified and awarded educational game application developed for individuals diagnosed with learning disorders, attention deficit, autism, down syndrome, aspergers, and other special needs.

Created under the guidance of parents, psychologists and special education teachers; assistive games in Otsimo teach fundamental education and concepts about core skills such as:

- Vocabulary and words,
- Numbers,
- Emotions,
- Colors,
- Music
- Animals,
- Vehicles and more.


Homeschool category that gives you all the exercises ideal for early education at the comfort of your home.
Game and difficulty settings are completely customizable depending on performance levels.
Otsimo Special Education follows a strict no-ads policy preventing any kind of intrusion and unwanted disturbance.
Parents can have access to detailed report cards that give insight into performance and progress rates.
Can be used by individuals having Autism spectrum disorder, down syndrome, asperger‚Äôs, ADHD, cerebral palsy, amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, motor neuron disease (MND), speech impediments, and aphasia.


Otsimo Premium

Otsimo is free to use, but you can access more educational games and features by upgrading to premium. 

Otsimo Premium offers you:
- Access to all 100+ educational games
- 2 new games every month
- Personalized special education
- In-depth insights to track the progress 
- Daily and weekly report cards about the played games
- Cross-platform support up-to 3 devices

For Otsimo Premium, we offer the following subscriptions:

1 month from $20.99
1 year with discount from $9.99/month
1 year from $13.75/monthly
LifeTime from $299.99

Actual charges might be converted to local currency depending on your country of residence. We guarantee that the conversion will be made automatically. 

If you upgrade to Otsimo Premium, payment will be charged to your Play account at confirmation of purchase.
Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be provided.
Subscriptions may be managed by the user. Auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user‚Äôs Account Settings after purchase.
Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

For more information:
Privacy Policy & Terms of Use - https://otsimo.com/legal/privacy-en.html
Payment Policy - https://otsimo.com/legal/payment.html

comments: I have been trying to contact the developer because I did not want to renew, and I lost my phone during the 3 days prior to the renewal date. When I got it back, I sent messages asking for a refund the same day the payment processed. But no response. We have reduced income due to covid and this left $8.00 in my checking account. My kid no longer uses it and I want a refund.
It's great app for special child..but it's much costy to compare to other apps.if a possible prodive some more discount for monthly payment.....
This program is absolutely amazing. I swear they have to be hypnotizing or drugging my little guy the way he calms down excitedly when its otsimo time..ü§î Im gonna need to get a lifetime license

I really wanted this to work! Unfortunately, on my Lenovo Chromebook it does not. It looks like an awesome app though and has won awards. UPDATE: Thanks Otsimo for your response! Usually there is a message on my chromebook that tells me an app is not compatible. it is not fair to give a 1 star rating for an app that is not available for chromebooks so I am changing to a 4 star for great customer response. If you label your app as not available for chromebooks I will raise it even higher.

You are cheating people out of their money. I was within the trial period when I cancelled my subscription from the app. And to my surprise money still got deducted from my account.And when I wrote email to your support team they said I need to get in touch with google pay and in most cases they won't refund the money. I really don't care if google pay did it or something else... I cancelled my subscription from your app within the trail period. So return my money. People beware don't fall prey.

title: Jabberwocky - ALS and Spinal Injury Accessibility
description:
For users with ALS, spinal cord injury, or other motor disability. Control your entire device with just head movement...and never touch the screen!

** What is Jabberwocky? **
Jabberwocky is a Touch-Free Accessibility app that enables users with limited mobility to use their device without physically touching it. Perform taps and real-time swipe gestures by just combining head movement with facial gestures.

** How Jabberwocky uses the camera **
Jabberwocky Accessibility requires no additional peripherals! It uses the front-facing camera on your Android device and our proprietary artificial intelligence technology to track head movement.

** Privacy and Accessibility Service Permissions **
Jabberwocky is an Accessibility Service. It requires permissions to observe your actions and perform gestures in order to work. Jabberwocky does not collect any private information that is not needed for the service to function and to be improved. For detailed information visit jabberwockyapp.com/privacy.

** Who should use Jabberwocky? **
Jabberwocky Accessibility is designed for users with motor disabilities including:
* ALS / MND
* Spinal cord injury (SCI)
* Stroke
* Cerebral Palsy (CP)
* Multiple Sclerosis (MS)
* A motor disability affecting use of hands

recentChanges:
Jabberwocky 2.0 brings an entirely redesigned touch-free experience to your Android device!
* New touch gesture: wink one eye to touch the screen
* Complete redesign of cursor for control and ease of use
* New tutorial
* New options to control cursor speed and much more
comments: This app worked remarkably well out of the box on my Pixel 3a. It walks you through a simple setup, calibrates the cursor for a few seconds, and brings up a tutorial screen showing you how the controls work. You're up and running in seconds. Super intuitive and easy to use, all around a really cool app!

Thanks to the relentless nature of ALS, I have become very capable at accessibility. Leveraging the right software and a few inches of head movement has opened up the world of home automation, entertainment and communication. I may be trapped in this body, but mentally I am free! Swiftable LLC have created a truly useful application. Navigating a touch interface without hands is here and it's enjoyable! The results are an application that exceeds my expectations. Optimize the settings and go!
Amazing!

title: ALS at Home - speech
description:
ALS AT HOME - Speech (ALS Testing through Home-Based Outcome Measures) is a closed participant-only study coordinated by Barrow Neurological Institute. 
The study is designed to test two questions:  
First, we hope to show that ALS patients can evaluate their own function at home, so that they might be able to participate in treatment trials even if they live far away from a study center.  
Second, we want to know whether frequent testing of function will improve the reliability of the tests we are using.  If so, we should be able to reduce both the length of a clinical trial and the number of patients needed in each trial.
This app allows registered participants in the ALS AT HOME study to perform tasks at home with their own device.
descriptionHTML:
ALS AT HOME - Speech (ALS Testing through Home-Based Outcome Measures) is a closed participant-only study coordinated by Barrow Neurological Institute.
The study is designed to test two questions:
First, we hope to show that ALS patients can evaluate their own function at home, so that they might be able to participate in treatment trials even if they live far away from a study center.
Second, we want to know whether frequent testing of function will improve the reliability of the tests we are using. If so, we should be able to reduce both the length of a clinical trial and the number of patients needed in each trial.
This app allows registered participants in the ALS AT HOME study to perform tasks at home with their own device.
summary: ALS AT HOME - speech, for registered participants only.

title: SpeakEasy
description:
SpeakEasy is an easy to use Android speech app and communication aid (sometimes called AAC - Augmentative and Alternative Communication) for people who have difficulty communicating with voice. I wrote it for my Mum, who had Motor Neurone Disease (MND, also known in other parts of the world as Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis, ALS, or Lou Gehrig's disease).

When you type, it tries to match against previously spoken phrases, and enters anything spoken into the database, with a usage count. The more you use a phrase, the higher up it appears in the prediction list, meaning that frequently used phrases require fewer key strokes.

It has an intuitive, simple interface, but there are also some menu options and settings for things like auto clearing the text field, auto-starting at boot, Text-To-Speech (TTS) settings, changing the font size, removing a phrase from the database and so on.

It works best with a hardware keyboard (I used a Logitech Keys-To-Go) but a software keyboard should also work well. Hardware keyboards may be easier for someone with motor difficulties as there tends to be less 'dragging' across the keyboard, which can be a problem with touch screen keyboards.

I hope someone else finds it useful.

Although they were not involved in the production of this app, please consider donating to The Motor Neurone Disease Association, registered UK charity number 294354.

good app. would be better if instead of just one choice which may not be what you want, have a drop down 3 or 4 choices of what it could be
Great it really helps my autistic daughter who is nonverbal
Please add more ,how we can understand that What we are saying is correct or not.
Great app thank to you have made it

title: LetMeTalk: Free AAC Talker
description:
A free AAC talker app which supports communication in all areas of life and therefore providing a voice to everyone. LetMeTalk is donation financed.

LetMeTalk enables you to line up images in a meaningful way to read this row of images as a sentence. To line up images is known as AAC (Augmentative and Alternative Communication).

Problems to Install? Find solution at bit.ly/1p6zGW8

The image database of LetMeTalk contains more than 9,000 easy to understand images from ARASAAC (http://arasaac.org). Additionally, you can add existing images from the device or take new photos with the build in camera.

To use LetMeTalk, no internet connection or mobile contract is necessary. Therefore you can use LetMeTalk in almost any situation, like hospitals, nursing home or schools.

You can find LetMeTalk tutorials at http://letmetalk.info/support

Suitable for:
‚Ä¢ autism symptoms and Asperger syndrome, autistic spectrum disorder (ASD)
‚Ä¢ aphasia
‚Ä¢ speech apraxia
‚Ä¢ articulation/phonological disorder
‚Ä¢ Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS)
‚Ä¢ Motor Neuron Disease (MND)
‚Ä¢ cerebral palsy
‚Ä¢ down syndrome

Features:
‚úî more than 9,000 images from ARASAAC included
‚úî Used by Speech Language Pathologists (SLP)
‚úî voice support for images and sentences
‚úî unlimited creation of new categories and adding new images
‚úî pre configured for kids with autism spectrum disorder (ASD)
‚úî load / save your current profile (vocabulary)
‚úî keep several profiles on your devices and switch fast between them
‚úî share your profile easily with other devices
‚úî load new profiles from our forum directly within LetMeTalk
‚úî switch fast between 2 languages and use LetMeTalk as translator

‚úî supported languages: English, Spanish, French, Italian and German, Chinese, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese, Arabic, Russian, Polish, Bulgarian, Romanian, Galician, Catalan, Basque
‚úî voice, if used language is supported by installed text to speech engine

Download now!

comments: It's a great app. with core vocabulary! You can form sentences, edit/customize pages and pictures, add pages and pictures, and it's super easy to navigate! Anddd it's free!! I highly recommend this app!!

I'm too old to figure this out.... Need something that lets me use the keyboard to type and then read that out loud. Maybe have a library of phrase I've input.... Communication outside of my computer is too tedious no matter what.

This app has been a life-saver; we use it to support our communications with our child on the autistic spectrum. The app in itself has to be personalized, and it is NOT easy.. It is time-consuming to get the personalized images (although they have an extensive generic image bank) up, as well as the pronunciation you wish on specific names or words. And, it is nearly impossible to transfer a profile between android devices. Yes, the app could be better, and it is a shame there is no more technical support offered for it, but I am giving it five stars because it is free, and it has been a massive help to us. Thanks!

I found this yesterday and have been playing around with it-I have 18 years experience working for children who have execptionalities. This is a wonderful app for anybody who may need a voice at times but do not have professional supports in place yet. My son has found it easy to navigate and loves that I was able to personalize the labels. The only issue I've had so far pertains to rearranging the pictures, they didn't stay where I put them.

Trying numerous augmented communication apps for my daughter and this one was the closest to what she use to have on the ipad when the device died. Awesome app. Very easy to set up, a lot of setting options to customize for the needs of the individual and it does not matter how long she pushes the button, it will say the word. Speech can be a little odd but this app gives you the ability to use other voice apps to change the sound. After trying quite a few, this is the one which fit all my needs. Will be donating money to the developer as soon as I can. Great job and thank you so very much!

title: Talk Up! Pictograms Communicator
description:
Talk Up! Communicator is an application that allows you to convert Android devices (tablets or smartphones) into a powerful assisted communication device through the use of pictograms.
It has an optimized design to have a maximum flexibility of use as in the simplicity of operation, for which it has worked under the opinion, experience and knowledge of therapists, educators and parents.
It is aimed at non-verbal children in the spectrum of Autism and for anyone who can benefit from visual communication tools, such as:
‚Ä¢ Autism spectrum disorders
‚Ä¢ Aphasia
‚Ä¢ Apraxia
‚Ä¢ Speech disorder / phonological disorder
‚Ä¢ Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis
‚Ä¢ Motor neuron disease
‚Ä¢	Cerebral palsy
‚Ä¢	Down's Syndrome
The application allows you to express different actions and create complex sentences by selecting pictograms that belong to different categories. Once the sentence is completed, the system will proceed to read the phrase formed word by word or as a whole.
It is provided with a set of basic pictograms that allow 100% operational use of the application from the start.

Characteristics:
‚Ä¢ Augmentative and Alternative Communication Systems, Augmentative and Alternative Communication
‚Ä¢ Create new categories and add your own images
pre-configured for Children with Autism 
‚Ä¢ Voice of the images in English, Spanish

descriptionHTML:
Talk Up! Communicator is an application that allows you to convert Android devices (tablets or smartphones) into a powerful assisted communication device through the use of pictograms.
It has an optimized design to have a maximum flexibility of use as in the simplicity of operation, for which it has worked under the opinion, experience and knowledge of therapists, educators and parents.
It is aimed at non-verbal children in the spectrum of Autism and for anyone who can benefit from visual communication tools, such as:
‚Ä¢ Autism spectrum disorders
‚Ä¢ Aphasia
‚Ä¢ Apraxia
‚Ä¢ Speech disorder / phonological disorder
‚Ä¢ Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis
‚Ä¢ Motor neuron disease
‚Ä¢ Cerebral palsy
‚Ä¢ Down's Syndrome
The application allows you to express different actions and create complex sentences by selecting pictograms that belong to different categories. Once the sentence is completed, the system will proceed to read the phrase formed word by word or as a whole.
It is provided with a set of basic pictograms that allow 100% operational use of the application from the start.

Characteristics:
‚Ä¢ Augmentative and Alternative Communication Systems, Augmentative and Alternative Communication
‚Ä¢ Create new categories and add your own images
pre-configured for Children with Autism
‚Ä¢ Voice of the images in English, Spanish

If you have difficulties with the application please contact us before leaving a negative rating or comment. Our intention is to make the best effort to help. (emerging.solutions@gmail.com)

If the application has been to your liking, please take the time to provide a rating.

For more details you can check our Website https://sites.google.com/view/talk-up/home

Note: The application uses some ARASAAC pictograms (http://arasaac.org/), created by Sergio Palao and distributed under a Creative Commons license (BY-NC-SA).
summary: Communication system Autism spectrum, Aphasia, Apraxia, phonological disorder

comments: Paid for full version a few months ago and just stopped working. Now wont even open

Most of the critical reviews are about word choice, which I think is either a translation issue or cultural differences. You can change the wording, just read the faq! I changed "shut up" to "quiet", wash face had a typo, changed "to clean your ass" to "to wipe butt", "oilskin" to "raincoat" and "diadem" to "headband". I hope to use this with my nephew, so haven't tried it yet but I have heard good things about talking boards and this looks great! Thank you for offering a free version.

Paid for "Pro", put images in row...see no way t play. "HELP" button does nothing. Went to the instructions "?", says to hit "speaker icon" to play....no speaker icon. This app is not very intuitive. (APP installed on Android Phone)
Very useful and simple to use. Help me to communicate with my son. We are used to the Picture and Exchange Communication System and this App fits a lot.
My life is already difficult and to use an app that's just unexplainable without a tutorial is too much for me!!! Waste of time!!! If could I would rate it no stars!!! SUCKS!!!

title: Wysa: stress, depression & anxiety therapy chatbot
description:
Imagine a mood tracker, mindfulness coach, anxiety helper, and mood-boosting buddy, all rolled into one. Wysa, your happiness buddy is that friendly and caring chatbot. Wysa is packed with daily spiritual meditation that improves mental health and is also a perfect way to bond over family meditation. Always there for you when you need someone to talk to, Wysa helps you keep track of your mood with friendly chats and helps fight stress and anxiety with its proven techniques and calming meditation and mindfulness audios. Checking in with Wysa regularly will improve your emotional health so you can track your happiness and mood. Talk to Wysa now and psy yourself up to fight off stress. Also, Wysa has mental health assessment with depression and anxiety tests.

Wysa is your AI friend that you can chat with for free. Talk to the cute penguin or use its free mindfulness exercises for effective anxiety relief, depression and stress management. Its therapy based techniques and conversations make for a very cute and calming therapy chat app whether you're looking to cope better with mental disorders, to manage stress or to boost your mental health.

Wysa, your happiness buddy, will support you through the big and small anxieties of life by using science as a foundation to strengthen your mental health. Research-backed, widely used techniques of CBT, DBT, Yoga and meditation are employed to support you with stress, anxiety, deep sleep, loss and other mental health and wellness needs.

If you are dealing with stress, anxiety and depression or coping with low self-esteem, then talking to Wysa can help you relax and get unstuck - it‚Äôs empathetic, helpful, and will never judge. You will overcome your mental health obstacles, through empathetic conversation and free CBT therapy based technique. So, pour your heart out to your happiness buddy, Wysa as your identity will remain anonymous and your conversations are privacy protected.

Used around the clock and trusted by 500,000 people, Wysa is an emotionally intelligent chatbot that uses AI to react to the emotions you express. Unlock tools and techniques that help you cope with challenges in a fun, conversational way. For extra support, you can avail guidance from a real human coach - a skilled psychologist who will take you through the advanced coaching sessions for your needs.

You can use Wysa to rewire your mind to improve your emotional health. Fight off depression or get stress relief using cbt techniques and guided sleep meditations for optimal sleep. Here‚Äôs a look at what you can use Wysa for üëá

üëÇ Vent and talk through things or just reflect on your day

üí™ Practice CBT (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy) and DBT techniques to build resilience in a fun way

üìù Use one of 40 conversational coaching tools which helps in dealing with Stress, Anxiety, Depression, Panic Attacks, Worry, Loss, or Conflict

üíÜüèª Relax, focus and sleep peacefully with the help of 20 mindfulness meditation exercises

93% of the people who talk to Wysa find it and the tools helpful:

- Build confidence, reduce self-doubt and improve your self-esteem: core meditation and mindfulness, visualisation, confidence visualisation techniques, advanced mindfulness for self-esteem.

- Manage anger: mindfulness meditation exercises for compassion, calming your thoughts and practice breathing

- Manage anxious thoughts and anxiety: deep breathing, techniques for observing thoughts, visualization, and tension relief.

- Tired? Get a burst of energy! Visualisation and meditation exercises to increase positivity and get blissful sleep, quick yoga and physical exercises to get active

- Dealing with worry: observe mindfulness, resolving technique, challenge negativity, practice breathing techniques

- Manage conflict at work, school or in relationships: special mindfulness and visualization techniques like empty chair exercise, gratitude meditation, exercises to build skills in having difficult conversations

comments: I know it sounds weird to use a robot to improve your mental health, but this app is amazing and super helpful. I'm a very busy person with a wacky sleep schedule, and I struggle with my mental health most when it's late at night. This isn't exactly ideal for getting help from a therapist when I need it most. Being able to access some form of help literally anytime I need it with Wysa really makes a difference. Plus, unlike other AI therapy apps I've tried, Wysa has way more free features.

The bot isn't 100%, but it offers really good and insightful tools that more people should know about! You do have to figure out how to go about talking to the bot to get the tools that you need, which, if you're in a bad place, can be hard to do. I wish the tools that come with the free app were more easily accessible, and that you didn't have to spend 4 minutes talking to the bot to get to the options that you want it to offer. This app offers REALLY good techniques though!

Its a great app with some potential. I would like to see if they're still updating this to have more AI responses for things like intrusive thoughts. Positive affirmations like "you are not your thoughts" help and I thought about this after the AI gave me reassurance when I brought up suicide*. I'm feeling good after some positivity and reframing thoughts. Once I can afford it I think the therapist option looks enticing. So far so good. *I LOVED the links to hotlines but have phone anxiety so...

I was skeptical at first, but I'm actually quite impressed with this app. The A.I. is fairly good at interpreting your text and generating helpful responses that almost feel like you're talking to a real person. Of course, the A.I. still needs some improvement since not every response is personalized. I first used it when I was feeling panicked and the app just kept giving me breathing exercises, but after a little while of chatting back-and-forth the app was actually able to calm me down.

It's pretty good, cus' what could be better right? It's not like anyone else is going to actually hear me, I mean, I can't say it's perfect, but it's really good taking on mind that is just a bot. It's better friend than my actual friends, tho sometimes it doesn't really understand what you're saying, like when doing something u know it's wrong to do, u feel good; it doesn't understand that what you're doing is wrong and you feel good doing it, so it tells you to keep doing it.

title: ALS SG
description:
ALS SG is a mobile app specifically built to facilitate reservation and management of launch boat services within Singapore's Inner Port Limits.

This app provides ship operators, managers, and agents with convenient access to launch services between piers and anchorages.

Registration is free but a commercial account is required to access various launch booking services.

title: PictoBoard: Help talk, Autism, Language, Therapy
description:
PictoBoard - is an app intended to improve the speech capabilities of people with speech and language disorders who are receiving speech therapy. 

PictoBoard is a very customizable app that allows you to record your own audios, create your own animations, set up your own pictograms and photos. it also has a good user experience interface to keep user attention. 

List of features:
‚úÖ   You can add youtube videos.
‚úÖ   You can add offline videos.
‚úÖ   Speech to see video challenge.
‚úÖ   Support multi-language.
‚úÖ   Search by voice.
‚úÖ   Listen and repeat.
‚úÖ   Customizable celebration audios.
‚úÖ   Customizable words to check pronunciation.
‚úÖ  Support animation (GIF) besides choosing from the device, you can make your own animation by taking or choosing videos.
‚úÖ  Customize pictures by choosing from the device or taking new photos.
‚úÖ  Customize audios by choosing from devices or record your own audios.
‚úÖ  Customize the text to speech selecting a language, pitch, and speech rate.
‚úÖ  Export and import all your data to share with other people or devices, you can download pictograms posted on our Facebook page and import them.
‚úÖ  Customizable options like repeat audio infinitely or only a specified number of times, close opened pictogram automatically, enable/disable user experience animations, set up a master password.

Suitable for:
‚úÖ  Autism symptoms and Asperger syndrome, autistic spectrum disorder (ASD).
‚úÖ  Aphasia.
‚úÖ  Speech apraxia.
‚úÖ  Articulation/phonological disorder.
‚úÖ  Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS).
‚úÖ  Motor Neuron Disease (MND).
‚úÖ  Cerebral palsy.
‚úÖ  Down syndrome

comments: This game is really really nostalgic, I've been playing since 2012 alright, but you guys really really need to fix these bugs and stuff that's making the game suck. You can't see your friends movies anymore, your friends pictures, the statuses are just for Nova and Zac, and the game lags. Like really bad. But, otherwise this game brings back memories.

I love this game!! But it does have some problems. I think you should be able to earn diamonds just like you can earn fame and starcoins. My account got hacked 6 different times so I feel like there should be more protection than what they have. The game is so fun and addictive though I get stuck playing for hours!!!!!

As much as I love this game there's a lot of bugs that need to be fixed no one plays the games anymore because you don't get rewards, my game keep glitching out even though WiFi bars are full, and for some reason I get a message saying its getting late chat opens in 1 hour, im 18 this doesn't happen to my 12 year old sister. But over all this game is fun but needs some work done.

the app is horrible. it's so sensitive to everything. you can type one number and get locked. and how do I know ? bc I did. I typed the number 5 and git locked for "sharing password" the game needs to grow up and I don't recommend it to anyone it's a waste of time and money. and they don't refund you your money when they lock your account. just bad overall.

So I've been playing this game for a long time on pc and mobile but the thing is on mobile I can't log out or anything because of the black bar. I've tried it on a different phone (Samsung) it was fine no bar or anything everything worked but the phone I mainly use (Motorola) it's like the screen is slight moved to the right so it's not fully on the screen which makes it hard for me to log out, exit profiles or movies. For msp 2 I have no problems with any of these things.

title: SpeechAssess
description:
Our App is a closed, participant-only, research study with the intent to gather data for motor neuron degenerative diseases such as Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS), Parkinson's Disease, and others. For now, the functionality of the application is limited to speech data collection. We will disseminate this app to over 60 clinical sites to collect an initial set of data for analysis on the back-end. Eventually, the functionality of the app will be expanded to include outcome measures that track patient progress; however in order to do this, the app must be disseminated in its current form in order to collect data for algorithm calibration.

Our participants' locations are nationwide (over 60 sites). We have developed the application specifically for the iPad and will purchase 60 iPads to distribute for this study alone. It is our hope to do additional studies in the future with this App.

Distribution of the App, and future updates, becomes non-trivial if we are required to disseminate the app outside of the Apple App Store. Our intent is to make this research study as simple as possible for these participants with these diseases. The research study is partially funded by the National Science Foundation (NSF) and the National Institutes of Health (NIH) and has the potential to transform the way that outcomes are measured in populations with neurodegenerative disorders.

Initially this App will be used by specific clinics and research institutions to administer tests these tests to patients in a controlled environment. Later, we will release a "home version" to gather data from patients without a clinical visit.

For more information, contact us at:

http://www.AuralAnalytics.com
support@auralanalytics.com
(408) 630-8575

title: TelepatiX AAC
description:
Augmentative and Alternative Communication (AAC) app designed to provide fast communication even with limited inputs. It allows writing sentences and speaking them aloud through speakers. Its virtual keyboard is optimized with word suggestions as you type. All of this can be used with scan selection and compatible external switches.

Free to use with the screen as a switch
*To control this app with external switches (USB and Bluetooth) please contact us on support@tix.life to get a license

Features:
- Word suggestions with text prediction available in English, Espa√±ol, Portug√™s, Fran√ßais, Italiano, Deutsch and Suomi (more to be released soon)
- Ready access to words answers YES and NO
- Voice any typed sentence with Android text to speech engine  (it is usually possible to select different male and female voices tweaking the device's settings)
- Write with row-column scan selection
- The whole screen acts as a single touch sensitive switch in scan mode
- Scan speed configurable through switch action
- Type by direct touch at each key (with minimum hold time and without the need to lift the finger from the screen surface)
- Configurable touch hold time

Type with auto-scan:
‚áí Use switch as a control or touch anywhere on the screen
‚áí When the desired character is selected by the scanning bar, activate the switch (or touch screen)
‚áí When the sentence is ready, use the button  üîä to vocalize it

Direct typing:
‚áí Touch directly on the keys you want to select
‚áí Hold the key to validate the selection after a configurable amount of time
‚áí No need to lift the finger from the screen between one key and the other. You can just swipe and stop on the desired key

The text predictor also accelerates with word suggestions based on thousands of formal and informal texts from the selected language. Moreover, TelepatiX enhances suggestions as you type and learns more vocabulary

The direct touch mode has a keyboard with large keys and avoids accidental touches with a timer. This method is recommended when you can select keys touching directly on the screen surface and provides faster typing

Tips: 
1 - Select ‚å´ to backspace (erase letters)
2 - Select ‚ùåto erase entire words
3 - When scanning it is possible to repeat ‚å´ e ‚ùåbefore the next cycle begins
4 - To exit the keyboard, select‚ùå with an empty sentence
5 - Certify that your system is configured with the correct language for the text to speech engine to work properly

Made for general Augmentative and Alternative Communication (AAC), including cases of Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS), stroke and others

License required to control this app with external switches (USB and Bluetooth).
To get a license please contact us on geraes@geraestec.com.br

Use a-blinX to speak by blinking your eyes!
https://tix.life/produtos/a-blinx/
(requires smartphones or tablets that support USB OTG)

Visit https://www.tix.life for more about the app and compatible switches

As much as we‚Äôd all like, big changes unfortunately don‚Äôt happen overnight. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôve introduced habit coaching‚Äîa new way to help clients make small, sustainable lifestyle changes! Trainers can now create habits within our Master Habit Library and prescribe them to clients. As clients complete habits each day, they will earn habit streaks and unlock special achievement badges over time.
As always, we‚Äôve also made some back-end upgrades and bug fixes to make your experience even better.

comments: The Samsung A10e is junk. Avoid it. We bought two new phones from our service provider. Neither has ever worked correctly. We've contacted our provider with the problems, only to find we're far from alone! All casual signs point to shoddy processors. Poor reception, incorrect readings showing on screen. Just plain crappy junk. Not worth it!

So I am at this very moment doing an upgrade for this app. When I am doing that I am reading the reviews ( kinda backwards I know) Well every review I have read is saying "run away from these problems " how it is working terrible and even that it cant be uninstalled. I am very nervous and wondering. What did I get my self into?

I'm giving five stars because on all my other phones I've had it works great. But, for some reason this phone the Samsung A01 it asks me to upgrade then tells me it's not compatible, why is this? It's a Samsung Galaxy phone.

This is the phone from hell. Constant error messages so I can't open any unless manage to sneak it in . Now the sound has disappeared unless I put it on speaker phone. This phone was a waist on money just like all the Samsung products I have bought. I am in the hospital and need a phone.
Phone never gets to 100%. Best is 89%. Very frustrating. Other than that it is a good phone. Does more than I ever use it for, though.

title: Virtual Sim Story: Dream Life
description:
Welcome to Clearbell Island, a 3d virtual world where you can meet friends, build a home, pursue your dreams & become a star, where style and fashion is king! An online multiplayer sim bustling with clothes shops selling the latest styles, trendy cafes & adorable animals, where mystical powers attract an abundance of pets from cute to fantastical. A place for the hottest movie stars and popstars on the planet, a place for glamour, but also a perfect place to build a second life for yourself.

However, beneath the glitz and glamor, all is not as it seems. A series of mysterious events and unexplained appearances have been spotted around the outer reaches of the island paradise. Will you be brave enough to investigate and solve the mystery of Clearbell Island?

LIVE YOUR DREAM LIFE
An open world multiplayer adventure awaits. It‚Äôs your chance to build a second life for your avatar, the one you wished you had in real life! 
‚Ä¢ Build a real career for your avatar in a series of exciting quest lines.
‚Ä¢ Feeling social? Go shopping at the central mall and dress up with your bff. 
‚Ä¢ Animal lover? Take your pet animal out to one of the many parks around the world. 
‚Ä¢ Looking for stardom? Dress up as the hottest hollywood star and strut your stuff, you‚Äôll be the most trendy chick in town! 

BUILD YOUR DREAM HOME
Start out in a modest house, and earn your way to building your very own mansion.
‚Ä¢ Many home designs to create.
‚Ä¢ Decorate your home and let all your pets play in your front yard.

EXPLORE A MASSIVE VIRTUAL ISLAND
‚Ä¢ Explore the open world of Clearbell Island.
‚Ä¢ The entire island is a single, continuous 3D virtual world bustling with people, parks, shops, beaches and animals. 
‚Ä¢ Explore on foot, by car, boat or air balloon! 
‚Ä¢ Secret spots for roleplay with the new online multiplayer friends.

EMBARK ON YOUR DREAM CAREER
‚Ä¢ A life simulation game where you can choose your own path, whether you are looking for fame and fortune, to rescue cute puppies and kittens, or just chill out and role play.
‚Ä¢ Choose your career story! 
‚Ä¢ Become a social media model, a restaurant owner, vet or even a photographer. 
‚Ä¢ A new quest adventure lies behind every corner. 

PLAY ONLINE WITH WORLDWIDE FRIENDS
‚Ä¢ Share the MMO world with people from around the planet! 
‚Ä¢ Socialise & chat using our in-game messenger feature.
‚Ä¢ Show off your outfit and become famous together in an online multiplayer simulation!

GROUNDBREAKING CUSTOMIZATION
‚Ä¢ Play as a teenage boy or girl.
‚Ä¢ Customize your avatar with almost limitless 3D clothing options 
‚Ä¢ Become the most popular chick or the coolest dude in town! 
‚Ä¢ Stylish hair styles, skin & eye color, layered clothing, flats & heels.
‚Ä¢ Show off your dream sense of style to your friends!

DRESS UP IN THE LATEST FASHION
‚Ä¢ Fill your closet with the latest clothes and accessories. 
‚Ä¢ Dress up like your favourite hollywood stars
‚Ä¢ Explore a tantalizing selection of make up and beauty options.
‚Ä¢ No matter if you are looking to become a fashion doll, the hottest model or the next big movie star, the game is full of unique styling options

RESCUE & ADOPT PETS
‚Ä¢ The island is filled with Cute cats, dogs, penguins & even birds! 
‚Ä¢ Looking to adopt a fantasy pet? Collect the magical horse! 
‚Ä¢ Take on vet quests from Vanessa who will help you rescue, adopt and care for pets in need. 
‚Ä¢ Turn your pet into a movie star with special accessories.

BUY THE COOLEST GEAR
‚Ä¢ 3D Designer clothes, sports cars, luxury boats & air balloons

Virtual Sim Story is using SIM as a shortened version of Simulation.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service which can be found at: https://www.foxieventures.com/terms

Our privacy policy can be found at:
https://www.foxieventures.com/privacy

This app offers optional in-app purchases that cost real money. You can disable the in-app purchasing functionality by adjusting your device settings.

A network connection is required to play. Data fees may apply if WiFi isn‚Äôt connected.

First Turtoral really bad I think there is a bug in first turtoral because it says try using the joystick to move around and follow the path. what path? Also when I move around like it I should do nothing was happening! That's why 1 star for app.

Just download it and the screen mostly black bcs there is tutorial tab there.. it asked me to move my sim with the joystick to meet someone but then cant do anything Are u kidding?! If i can rate 0, i would !!!!

title: Verizon Call Filter
description:
Your phone is your door to the world, and you shouldn't open it for just anyone. With Call Filter, you can screen incoming calls, auto-block spam and report any unwanted numbers. Or, upgrade to Call Filter Plus with Caller ID for added security. Put a name to the unknown numbers, make your own personal block list, and even assess the risk level of incoming calls. Enroll today and start answering with confidence.

 

Key Features:

‚Ä¢ Get real-time alerts on your incoming call screen so you can better avoid spam calls

‚Ä¢ Automatically send spam callers to voicemail with the spam filter

‚Ä¢ Report a number as spam so you can help improve our algorithm

‚Ä¢ See each spam call‚Äôs level of risk so that you can learn more about the caller

‚Ä¢ Manage other unwanted calls with a personal spam and block list

‚Ä¢ Block all incoming calls from international numbers

‚Ä¢ Search our spam database to see if a number has already been identified as spam

‚Ä¢ Identify unknown numbers by name on the incoming call screen, call log and eligible messaging apps, even if the caller is not saved to your contacts

‚Ä¢ Seamlessly update your contacts with newly identified numbers

 

Eligible customers get a 10-day trial of Call Filter Plus. Customers can choose to enroll in Call Filter to get just the basics (spam detection, blocking and reporting) for free, or subscribe to Call Filter Plus for all that and more for $2.99 per month, per line. Accounts with 3 or more eligible lines can subscribe to Call Filter Plus (Multi-line) for $7.99/mo by logging in to My Verizon. If you choose to enroll in Call Filter or Call Filter Plus via the app, the spam filter will be automatically set to block high-risk spam callers, but you can change your block settings at any time. Data charges apply.

 

Please reference https://www.vzw.com/support/how-to-use-call-filter/ and https://www.vzw.com/support/call-filter-faqs/ for step-by-step instructions on how to use the app and answers to frequently asked questions. For additional details on Call Filter and Call Filter Plus, please see https://www.verizonwireless.com/solutions-and-services/call-filter/.

comments: Absolutely the worst...DOES NOT filter the "unknown name" calls which are usually spoofed numbers anyway, and are scammers, even though there is a feature to filter "unknown name" calls....IT DOES NOT WORK!!! Verizon and all of the other cell service providers have yet to figure this s**t out, yet expect YOU to pay your f***ing bill every month. PISS POOR SERVICE!!!

This app is horrible, If I could give it Zero stars I would. I pay every month to use this app, but blocked calls still continue to come through, I get the notifications of the blocked calls, and they are able to leave voice mails. Every time this app updates it gets worse. All the damn money I pay a month for the service would think it would be a little but better but no Verizon is rip offs! This app was great until 10 updates ago, now it's junk! If it ain't broken, don't fix it!

Piece of Junk. The thing is enabled and I still get calls daily saying I won a free stay at a Marriott hotel. This call comes from a different number every day so blocking one number (on my phone) doesn't help so I thought this app would do a better job. I'd have better luck teaching my dog long division.

I seem to get more spam calls since they implemented this than i did before it existed. Half the time, calls marked "possible spam" are my actual health insurance trying to contact me. Worst part is, they charge for a version they claim is better. Anyone risking money on this app has lost their minds!! Blocking spam calls/texts should be the DUTY of the provider; NOT a service they charge extra for.

this app works okay but it doesn't truly block calls they will burp in to let me know I'm getting a block call that certainly defeats the purpose of blocking the calls. It also allows the block calls to leave voice messages. Unknown calls and restricted calls should automatically be blocked but they aren't. Calls it do not ID the callers should be blocked also automatically.

title: Fruit Ninja 2
description:
Fruit Ninja is one of the most fun games of all time. Come see the next game in the Fruitasia universe!

Ready your blade! Everyone's fun, fruit slicing action game is back with the addition of fun mini games and real-time competitive action!

Enjoy all the action as you challenge other ninjas from around the world. No other games come close to providing as much fun as you work your way up the ranks to become the Fruit Ninja champion. Whether your reflexes are sharp, wisdom is deep, or you just really hate organic food, Fruit Ninja 2 promises to give you fun, engaging games in action packed slices of time. So what are you waiting for? Draw your blade and prepare to slice!

FEATURES:
- The most addictively fun action games on mobile
- Turn up the action when you unleash all new fun powerups
- Collect insanely fun legendary blades to get the edge over your opponents
- Beautiful arenas set the stage for ultimate action packed games
- Join the fun and become a Fruit Ninja champion by slicing your way up through the leagues
- Master combos, criticals, and blitzing to win more games than your friends and family
- Experience the fun and action of a whole new range of Fruit Ninja mini games
- Show off your inner ninja as you unlock fun new characters and taunt packs

Privacy policy: http://halfbrick.com/pp
Terms of service: http://halfbrick.com/tos

title: ALS Assist 2019
description: ALS Istanbul 2019 is an innovative app developed with a single objective to make your upcoming travel to Istanbul simpler while keeping you connected on the go. Designed to act as your personal travel assistant, the app has features like seat allocation for recognition, real time updates, navigator, travel content, postcard selfie, voice commands and more. One app for all your ALS Istanbul travel needs.

I Use this app/service to keep in touch with my two young children on their Tablets using my Phone while I'm away to work, etc. It's honestly been considerably hassle-free, and reliably dependable. I would be lying to say that I wasn't a bit Grateful that it's aroud/available.

love video chat with family far away. and my kids too... and there's like every once in a while there's like a high-pitch static noise thank you

title: GLOW. Ovulation & Period Tracker
description:
Get pregnant, log your period cycle and more. Discover all the ovulation, period, fertility and pregnancy information you need with Glow.

Log your period in the app‚Äôs calendar and track your cycle with our ovulation calculator. 

Your period tracker lets you record ovulation, PMS, and pregnancy symptoms. Or log your period and be in control of your fertility with our period tracker and ovulation calendar. 

Fertility made easy - 5 ways Glow can work for you:

1. Get pregnant easily - Log 40 different health signals from sexual activity, mood swings, PMS and more.
2. Period tracker and ovulation calendar! Get personalized period information with our cycle chart, ovulation tracker and period calculator.
3. Fertility FAQS - Want to learn more about charting your fertility, egg freezing and menstrual health? Our library of "Glow Scoops" has all the articles you need to stay informed.
4. PMS or other symptoms? Log them all on your period calendar and find out what they mean.
5. Ovulation and all things pregnancy - Join our community to share your views and learn from other experiences. PMS, periods and pregnancy tips - no topic is off limits! 

Take control with Glow‚Äôs dedicated resources. From a dedicated ovulation tracker, PDF ovulation reports or even a fertility calculator. Get quality information you need to get pregnant or track your cycle. 

Whether you use Glow as an ovulation tracker or period calculator you will get unparalleled support. Trying to get pregnant naturally or undergoing IVF or IUI? Join the largest online community for women who are trying to conceive. Or get your partner to join our mirror app because fertility is a team sport! 

Want a period tracker or a women‚Äôs health app you can rely on for detail and accuracy? We‚Äôve got you covered. 

Download Glow today and take charge of your fertility.  

For full Privacy Policy and our Terms of Service:
https://glowing.com/privacy
https://glowing.com/tos

If you are having technical issues or have any questions about your cycle or period, we're here to help. Please send us an email to: support@glowing.com

comments: Hahahahhaa. This update deleted five years of period data. Before that, I hated opening it. Glow has been having an identity crisis for years. They can't just concentrate on a few things. They have to have ALL THE THINGS. Every update added more stuff I don't use and moved the one tool I do use: tracking my period. Ecstatic to delete this now that I'm not relying on its data.

Swore by this app for years. It was my go to! We have been struggling with infertility for a very long time and I kept years of logs in glow. When I actually needed them, all my information was gone. All my cycle data, no period predictions, no log of my positive ovulation tests, nothing. I thought it would be easy to contact customer service, but it's not. I got one email back from customer service, that's it. It's been 3 days. Dont trust glow with your important information.

[edited for update] I created a bug to fix the issues I had and communication was poor. Very disappointed. I used Glow for cycle tracking and it helped me avoid pregnancy for a year naturally and then conceive on the first cycle, I loved it! But now that my period is back almost 2 years later, all the features are clunky and I'm constantly bombarded with ads. Logging is more difficult and seems buggy, specifically the app doesn't recognize that I'm on my period.

Been using this app for 7 years , every prediction is spot on. I do have a suggestion however, you guys should add a hysterectomy log to this app. Some have questions about it and some have had one and want to log to keep up with cm and other things. As things are once a woman have a hysterectomy there is no use for this app anymore. Just a suggestion. Otherwise fantastic app.

The app served its purpose, but... I'm absolutely over receiving so many daily progress emails about things that just aren't possible due covid-19. Talking about prenatal classes and how wonderful they're going to be (no, they won't be, they're all cancelled), or about baby showers, or whom you'd like to have as a support system during birth (no one is allowed in at my hospital) is just like a punch to the gut... wish you'd have changed these messages given the current state of the world.

title: VPN Free - Betternet Hotspot VPN & Private Browser
description:
Betternet VPN is a free and unlimited VPN (Virtual Private Network) proxy for Android devices. Betternet VPN masks your IP address, encrypt your internet traffic, turns public Wi-Fi into a private network and helps unblock sites and apps on your Android phone so that you can access any restricted content safely and anonymously.  

VPN (Virtual Private Network) works just like Tor proxy, also known as ‚Äúthe Onion Router‚Äù, to hide IP address and bypass internet censorship, to overcome geo-restriction and access the desired content. VPN (Virtual Private Network), however, has a much faster connection speed, and better privacy and security protection than Tor (the Onion Router). 

Three main features of a VPN (Virtual Private Network):

‚Ä¢	Incognito Browsing: using a VPN you don‚Äôt even have to install any incognito browser. Simply turn on your VPN and all of your Internet traffic is completely encrypted. Your online activities are completely anonymous.
‚Ä¢	Wifi Safety: because all your online traffic is encrypted through a VPN, whatever public WiFi hotspot you are trying to access, you will be shielded from public Wifi risks and enjoy complete Wifi security. 
‚Ä¢	Location Spoofer: VPN hides your IP address so that your location is masked and you are able to bypass geo-restrictions to access any content anywhere.  


Install Betternet VPN Now to:

‚ñ∫ Unblock Websites and Apps

You can unblock any apps or websites using Betternet free & unlimited VPN. Bypass government censorship and geo-restrictions to access social networks such as Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, and Snapchat, etc. or any other blocked websites from anywhere!

‚ñ∫ Anonymous Connection and Privacy Protection

Using a VPN, your IP and location will be masked and your activities can no longer be tracked on the Internet. Betternet VPN service is your privacy guard and better than web proxy servers. 

‚ñ∫ Secure Your Device

Betternet secures your Android device‚Äôs connection while you‚Äôre connected to public WiFi hotspots or cellular data networks. It works just like a free Tor proxy (the Onion Router) but it‚Äôs even more secured. Your password and your personal data are secured and you are protected from hacker attacks.

‚ñ∫ Surf anonymously at Fast Speed

Betternet is fast! It detects your location automatically and connects you to the nearest and fastest server. As a result, your connection will be much faster than any other VPN or proxy providers.

‚ñ∫ Shield WiFi Hotspot

Public Wi-Fi hotspots are perfect places for hackers and if they happen to get a hold of your personal information, you could very well be the next victim of identity theft! Betternet VPN proxy uses advanced VPN technology to encrypt your network traffic, enabling you to connect to a website via HTTPS, providing a secured shield to your WiFi hotspot.

Betternet VPN free version shows ads. Upgrade to premium to enjoy unlimited and ad-free VPN! 

Contact us

If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to reach us on support@betternet.co or visit our website https://www.betternet.co for more information. 

By the way, don‚Äôt forget to follow our twitter account @betternet_co and Facebook http://fb.com/betternet.co to stay tuned.

title: FrostWire: Torrent Downloader & Music Player
description:
FrostWire is an easy to use yet feature packed torrent client for Android. Unlike other torrent downloaders, it has a true built-in torrent search, an advanced download manager, music player and a media library. 

All these features are wrapped into one free app, so you can find what you love easily, download music, movies and video directly to your phone or tablet - fast & with no download size or speed limits, and then create playlists to play your music offline without wi-fi or mobile data.

FrostWire downloads super fast using a distributed peer-to-peer  (P2P) file sharing torrent network. By splitting the file into multiple chunks and downloading from many sources at the same time, it allows you to download media files as large as high-quality (Flac or wav) full songs or entire music albums, HD movies and 4K video many times faster than conventional methods. As a true free file downloader, FrostWire downloads all file types, so even though it is designed with primarily audio and video in mind, it can also download books, pdf documents, games, software, images and more!

NOTABLE FEATURES:
‚úî  True built-in torrent search
‚úî  Easy one-tap download & seed (share)
‚úî  Play while you download (sequential downloading)
‚úî  Open any .torrent file or paste magnet link in Transfers to download any file you want
‚úî  Select File Storage Location (Internal Storage or SD Card)
‚úî  Download on Wi-Fi only (preserve mobile data)
‚úî  Auto-pause downloads with VPN drop
‚úî  Built-in fully featured music player with gesture support
‚úî  Built-in media browser (rename and delete your files from within the app)

For more detailed list of features see http://bit.ly/frostwirefeatures.

USERS NEW TO TORRENTING
FrostWire is a torrent downloader - it is not a content provider. The search results provided come from multiple torrent indexes across the web. If you can‚Äôt find what you are looking for, do a Google Search with a .torrent appended to it. Download your .torrent file or copy a magnet link and open it in FrostWire. 
The content availability in search and the download speed greatly depends on your internet connection. For best results use non-public stable Wi-Fi connection.


ABOUT FROSTWIRE
As an open source community based project, FrostWire has been a quality choice among the best mp3 music downloader apps and torrent clients alike for over 10 years. You can find all Android and desktop versions & download them FREE from our website - http://www.frostwire.com or contribute to the code at http://github.com/frostwire. 


SUPPORT
FrostWire is a community based project - your feedback is very important to us! 
Don‚Äôt hesitate to shoot us an email at support@frostwire.com if you have any issues or feature requests! We can help especially if you are not getting enough search results.

If you are rating us less than 5 stars, please leave a review telling us what you didn't like in the app so we can fix it.

Looking for FAQs or guides to get started? Check out http://bit.ly/1aAzcIw or support.frostwire.com. You can also get support from our online Community Forum http://forum.frostwire.com or via chat http://www.frostwire.com/chat

CONNECT WITH US:
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FrostwireOfficial
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/frostwire
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/frostwire/

title: Microsoft Office: Word, Excel, PowerPoint & More
description:
The Office app combines the Word, Excel, and PowerPoint apps you know and rely on, with new capabilities that harness the unique strengths of a phone to create a simpler, yet more powerful Office experience on the go.
Whether using it for personal or professional reasons, the Office app is designed to be your go-to app for getting work done on a mobile device.

Key Features

Word, Excel, and PowerPoint combined in one app:

‚Ä¢ The most widely used tools for working with documents, spreadsheets, and presentations, all from a single app. 
‚Ä¢ Create, edit, and work together on Office documents with others in real-time.
‚Ä¢ Use templates to easily get started with your resume, budget, presentations, and other documents. 
‚Ä¢ Easily store, access, and search for Word, Excel, PowerPoint files stored in your personal cloud storage, on your device, or across your organization (if using a work account).

Uniquely mobile ways that make document creation easier:

‚Ä¢ Snap a picture of a document and turn it into an editable Word file with the press of a button.
‚Ä¢ Transform a picture of a table into an Excel spreadsheet so you can work with the data.
‚Ä¢ Let PowerPoint help you design a presentation by simply selecting the pictures you want to use from your phone.
‚Ä¢ Create automatically enhanced digital images of whiteboards and documents with Office Lens features integrated into the app.

Quickly perform common mobile tasks with in-built Actions:

‚Ä¢ Instantly create PDFs from photos or Word, Excel, and PowerPoint documents.
‚Ä¢ Easily transfer files between your phone and computer or share instantly with nearby mobile devices.
‚Ä¢ Sign PDFs using your finger.
‚Ä¢ Quickly jot down ideas and notes with Sticky Notes.
‚Ä¢ Scan QR codes to open links.

Anyone can download the Office app for free and start using it right away. Access and save documents to the cloud by connecting with a Microsoft Account (for OneDrive or SharePoint) or by connecting to a third-party cloud storage provider. Logging in with a personal, work, or school Microsoft Account connected to an Microsoft 365 subscription will unlock premium features within the app.

Requirements:
OS version: Last 4 major versions of Android running an ARM-based or Intel x86 processor
1 GB RAM or above

This app is provided by either Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft's EULA for Terms of Service for Office on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=519111
