recentChanges:
* From the Android 10, need to update and re-login for LG Health service(Ranking and sync).
* According to Google policies, From the Oreo OS(Android 8.0), LG Health app alerts are always displayed in the notification window.
You can setting app notifications by touching and holding the notification.
Turning off notifications may limit some features.
* Activity recognition of cycling and climbing stairs are no longer supported.
* Does not support login with Amazon account.
comments: This is an applicable widget, but I found a shortage on it. For example, during daily activity, while I'm in the car, the widget is still counting my steps, while I'm not walking. So I suggest you to put some useful keys on the widget i.e. play/pause/stop, in order to use this application just during exercise or at the time that we need do some activites.

The app needs to allow for the customer to be able to add the information on the types of exercises even if it the day after. This app does not allow to add information if you forgot to do it on the specific day. Also is too light. They need to af more features.
Very accurate step count. Within 25 inches. Lousy complicatef UI.

You should be able to choose whether or not you want to have this app on you phone. There should be a sign in option as well. If you want to erase the data you've entered that should be an option as well. Nowadays people are using their smartwatches to track their fitness. Stop prompting me to update an app I don't want to use, it's taking up space.

Please increase the font size and contrast of info on the widget. There is plenty of room for a larger font. The white letters against the gray background make it even harder to read. Also the number of steps is unreadable in both colors because of the font and the bright colors. Thank you.

title: Samsung Accessory Service
description:
Samsung Accessory Service provides a stable environment in which you can use a variety features by connecting accessories to your mobile device.
This service is compatible with various connectivity environments, and it makes using accessories with your mobile device efficient and convenient via manager applications.
(e.g.  Galaxy Wearable, Samsung Camera Manager Inst.)

Samsung Accessory Service can be used with the following accessories when connected with a mobile device.
- GALAXY Gear,  Gear 2, Gear S Series, Galaxy Watch Series
- Samsung Gear Fit 2
- Samsung NX-1

Samsung Accessory Service provides the following features for accessories and a mobile device.
- Connection and sending/receiving data
- File transfer

The following permission is required for the app service. 
[Required permissions] 
- Storage : It is required to transfer media files to accessory device.

If your system software version is lower than Android 6.0, please update the software to configure App permissions.
Previously allowed permissions can be reset on Apps menu in device settings after software update.

If you install or move this application to external storage, it may not work properly.

recentChanges: Fixed some minor bugs
comments: I have a gear S3. Use to work fine with my Samsung Galaxy S7 that ran Oreo, but I changed my phone to another brand with android 10 and now it disconnects also it drains the battery both on the phone and watch at an incredibly fast rate. To stop the battery drain I must kill all related Samsung processes, clear the cache and reboot phone.

Was working fine with my s9 but i changed to Sony 5 II start the connectivity problems. Keep disconnecting .. what happened to you guys ?? Even the latest update of my active 2 not released yet.... Next time i will go to apple .. thank you
The worst thing to have. Half of the app is not working and these developers don't even respond to a request. All the info is for IOS user. Nothing for ADR users.

I don't think Samsung cares or maybe it's just incompetence, but the combination of the latest version of this app and their other Galaxy Wear apps causes massive battery drain and connection issues with their Galaxy Watch. Maybe if enough people rate their poor apps they will fix it.
Massive Battery Drain. I bought this gear almost a year back, since then I'm facing this issue. I think developer are not in mood to rectify.

title: TextNow: Free Texting & Calling App
description:
*NEW FEATURE* Now you can use TextNow without WiFi! Get unlimited calling and texting in the US over the Nationwide Sprint Network -- for FREE.  Check if your phone is eligible, and get phone service without the phone bill by clicking on "Free Coverage" in the app menu.

Local US or Canada Phone number
Give your friends your very own phone number they can call!

Unlimited Text & Picture Messaging 
You can send as many text messages as you want to US & Canada - FREE!

Unlimited Calling to USA and Canada 
Make unlimited free phone calls to any phone number in the US & Canada!

Cheap International Calling
TextNow offers low-cost, international calling to over 230 countries. Stay connected longer with rates starting at less than $0.01 per minute. Add money or earn free money by completing offers to your account and make low-cost international calls.

Features:
- Make and receive voice calls
- Emojis, stickers and gifs
- Full picture messaging : send, receive and save pictures!
- Video messaging: Send videos to your friends and family
- Voicemail Transcription: transcript of your voicemail
- Caller ID
- PassCode: keep your messages under lock and key
- Google SmartLock: no need to remember your password
- Call Forwarding
- Conference calling
- Signatures: add your own personalized signature to each text
- Customizable text-tone, ringtone & vibration
- Customizable backgrounds
- Assign individual contacts their own ringtone & background
- Quick Reply to easily (and quickly) respond to friends
- Home screen widget to launch TextNow, compose a new message or quickly make a call
- Unified inbox: send and receive your texts, SMS and GIFs directly via TextNow - use TextNow as your one-stop SMS texting app!
- One number, multiple devices ‚Äì Send messages and make calls on your computer or tablet, then access them from your phone while on the go.
- TextNow.com - text from your computer too! All messages seamlessly synchronize with your mobile device.
- Turn your Wi-Fi enabled tablets into a phone.
- Elastic calling to protect you from dropped calls. Elastic calling is TextNow‚Äôs unique ability to have our calls choose the best possible route for your call to improve quality

Is it really free? 

There is no catch. No yearly or monthly fees! It is completely free! Download today and start sending and receiving your unlimited texts, pics, videos, and SMS messages.

How can all this be free?

The app comes with a few ads. If you don't like ads, you can purchase a subscription to remove them. Join the 100 million people who have already found a better way to talk & text free.

recentChanges:
New & Noticeable:
- No new features, as our engineering elves were busy working under the hood this week. We update every week, so keep checking this space for new features and other nifty stuff.

New and Not-so Noticeable:
- Many bug fixes, plus performance and stability improvements.
comments: Ever since the update it made it worse. It rings again, that's good. Problem is, people can't hear me but I can hear them. I have to use LINE for the time being until it gets fixed. Dont tell me to get the latest update either etc. I did all that. You guys need to update this again because my callers can't hear me when talking. It works then I stops working.

Its great! Actually free. Ive had it for a 2nd private line since like 2016. But you have to pay attention to your account. Because I didn't use mine for a while, lapsed & I still had an account sort of. But I lost my phone number. But its totally not a big deal! For real only actually free. When I lapsed I didn't renew right away because textnow had changed with how it had always been. But now that I renewed, its like it was before and even better! Katy

Totally free for calling, texting and calling landlines and toll free # also when I traveles overseas I could call landlines and office numbers with ease and for free. I use this as a number to give out to people who i buy stuff from online or when companies ask for my # to send ad text, as wel. If it is not used, you will lose the number. I do not recommend using for sensitive data as it is easy to lose the number assigned . that said it is easy to get any # in any area code within the US. üëç

I love this app. Been using it for about 3 years now. I always tell people about this app. It's a great way to have a secondary phone but on same device. Plus it works really well and offers great plans and If you cant afford a plan you can still use it and keep your # for free if needed. Even free for all incoming/outgoing calls with voicemail and text messages also. So you can stay in touch with friends, family, and/or work anytime needed!! Awesome app!!

Beautiful app. I have been using this app for several years and find it very useful and stable. My only reservation is the possibility of losing your phone number if it is not used for a while. The time needs to be extended as sometimes people are unable to use the phone for extensive periods either because of illl health or because the device the number was loaded on has become temporarily unavailable.

title: Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications
description:
Live Transcribe has a new name‚ÄîLive Transcribe & Sound Notifications. It's an app that makes everyday conversations and surrounding sounds more accessible among people who are deaf and hard of hearing, using just your Android phone.

Using Google‚Äôs state-of-the-art automatic speech recognition and sound detection technology, Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications provides you free, real-time transcriptions of your conversations and sends notifications based on your surrounding sounds at home. The notifications make you aware of important situations at home, such as a fire alarm or doorbell ringing, so that you can respond quickly.

On most phones, you can directly access Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications with these steps:
1. Open your device's Settings app.
2. Tap Accessibility, then tap Live Transcribe, or Sound Notifications, depending on which app you‚Äôd like to start.
3. Tap Use service, then accept the permissions.
4. Use the Accessibility button or gesture to start Live Transcribe or Sound Notifications.

[New] Sound Notifications:
‚Ä¢ Get notified of potential risky situations and personal situations based on sounds happening at home (for example, smoke alarm, siren, baby sounds).
‚Ä¢ Get notifications with a flashing light or vibration to your mobile device or wearable.
‚Ä¢ Timeline view lets you go back in history (currently limited to 12 hours) to see what was happening around you.

Real-time transcription:
‚Ä¢ Transcribes in real-time. Text appears on your phone as words are spoken.
‚Ä¢ Accurately captures the nuances of how words are used in context.
‚Ä¢ Choose from over 80 languages and dialects, and quickly switch between two languages.
‚Ä¢ Add custom words that you use frequently, like names or household items.
‚Ä¢ Set your phone to vibrate when someone says your name.
‚Ä¢ Type responses in your conversation. Bring up your phone‚Äôs keyboard and type your words for a continuous dialogue. Transcriptions still appear while you type.
‚Ä¢ See the volume of the speaker‚Äôs voice compared to the loudness in your environment. You can use this sound indicator to adjust your volume when you speak.
‚Ä¢ Use external microphones found in wired headsets, Bluetooth headsets, and USB mics for better audio reception.

Referring back to transcription:
‚Ä¢ Choose to save transcriptions for 3 days. Saved transcriptions will stay locally on your device for 3 days, so you can copy and paste them elsewhere. (By default, transcriptions are not saved.)
‚Ä¢ Search within saved transcriptions.
‚Ä¢ Touch and hold text in transcription to copy and paste.

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Android 5.0 (Lollipop) and up.

Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications was made in collaboration with Gallaudet University, the premier Deaf and hard of hearing university in the US.

Join the Google Accessible community to provide feedback and receive product updates. For help using Live Transcribe & Sound Notifications, visit contact the Disability Support team.

Permissions Notice
Microphone: Live Transcribe needs microphone access to transcribe the speech around you. The audio is not stored after the transcription is processed. Sound Notifications needs microphone access to listen for sounds happening around you. The audio is also not stored after processing is finished.

summary: Real-time transcriptions of your conversations and sound event notifications
comments: Very helpful for me, since I am legally deaf. Sometimes I have trouble understanding someone that talk very fast and low, and in loud environment for example like Walmart paying for my items and the cashier had some questions and I had a hard time understanding her, thankfully this app came in very handy. I also have a speech impairment due to my deafness, and sometimes others have trouble understanding me, again this app made my day. Thanks a million, Michael

I'm deaf/ hard of hearing. I came upon this app. Read where it can detect knocking at the door. I can't hear people knock, so I decided to down load the app. Unless there is absolutely no noice and someone pounds on the door. The phone doesn't tell me when someone knocks. Back to my flashing light doorbell. I would need an app the can distinguish between sounds at any volume, including music, human speech, or tv and between someone talking to me and just near me having a conversation.

I am just learning to use this app. So far, so good. Am trying to discern just how accurate are the transcriptions under different circumstances: indoor and out, telephone, TV dialog, children's voices and other, including effects of ambient noise. As of now, results of my "tests" are encouraging.

I'm profoundly deaf and hoped I might be able to use this to alert me to sounds at home instead of relying on old fashioned equipment. It doesn't seem to pick up anything except really loud sounds and that's with the phone held close to the source. It doesn't detect door knocking or the phone ringing or the microwave beeping or any of the things it's supposed to. The transcribing feature works - though it doesn't seem to do well with Scottish accents - so I don't think there's a problem with my microphone. I wonder if it might be an issue with sensitivity but there isn't any option to configure the microphone, which is maybe something the developers need to add? Disappointed as I've seen a similar feature on a friend's Iphone and it seemed to work perfectly. Time to give up on Android devices when it comes to accessibility I think.

I gave it 4 stars coz' there are times that there are missing words & I would like to suggest for you to have an editing mode, All caps, upper or lower case, and to have a key word as a command or a button maybe? Take this words as an example: PLUS SIGN plus sign (as a word) + (as a sign) yeah, I hope you get my point somehow cause I swear you're going to bring this app on another level if you can. Love lots and Take care to all of us during this pandemicü§ç God Blessü§ç

title: Design Home: Play + Save
description:
Looking for a new creative hobby? Play Design Home today - a relaxing, fun game that allows you to live the life of an interior decorator. Sharpen your decorating skills in daily Design Challenges and style visually stunning three-dimensional spaces with access to real, high-end furniture and decor brands. Unlock 'My Homes' to access bathrooms, kitchens and more customization options to bring your dream homes to life! It‚Äôs quick, it‚Äôs fun and you can connect with a vibrant creative community while learning about diverse d√©cor styles - thus improving your design skills and gaining inspiration that you can even apply in your real life.

* Relax through play and express your creativity in daily Design Challenges.
* Unlock rewards as you polish your amazing abilities as an interior decorator.
* Level up to access 'My Homes' - with dream homes of your very own to design as you wish!
* Play with real life, high-end brands as you learn about different interior design styles.
* Vote on your favorite rooms from a vibrant, creative community.
* Share your creativity and borrow furnishings from your friends when you connect to Facebook.

With new pieces added every day, Design Home lets you play with home furnishings from real-life brands - all available directly at your fingertips. Not only can you discover brands and trends, you can get inspired and build your interior decorating skills! 

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
- This game is not intended for children.
- Please buy carefully.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.
- A network connection is required to play.
- For information about how Glu collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: www.Glu.com/privacy
- If you have a problem with this game, please use the game‚Äôs ‚ÄúHelp‚Äù feature.

Terms of Service: http://www.glu.com/terms
Privacy Policy: http://www.glu.com/privacy

With new pieces added every day, Design Home lets you play with home furnishings from real-life brands - all available directly at your fingertips. Not only can you discover brands and trends, you can get inspired and build your interior decorating skills!

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
- This game is not intended for children.
- Please buy carefully.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.
- A network connection is required to play.
- For information about how Glu collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: www.Glu.com/privacy
- If you have a problem with this game, please use the game‚Äôs ‚ÄúHelp‚Äù feature.

Terms of Service: http://www.glu.com/terms
Privacy Policy: http://www.glu.com/privacy
summary: Create your dream house design! Design rooms & decorate with real furniture.
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Introducing ‚ÄòDH Inspired‚Äô - an ALL-NEW shopping experience to earn savings on home decor delivered right to your door by just playing the game you love.
‚Ä¢ Don't forget that new real-world items from top brands and unique Design Challenges are added daily!
‚Ä¢ Technical fixes and performance improvements
comments: I really love this game, it is addictive. I recommend a few changes or I need to back away from playing. To decorate the way you'd like, it cost too much money. I think once you've earned an item it should be yours to keep. You only get to use it 5 times then you have to keep re-purchasing. Also, the "My Homes" doesn't keep up with your pace, you can only collect 50 keys then you just lose them. I wish when going through items to purchase you could sort by price. 5 stars down to 3, sorry!

I absolutely like this game. The designs and inventory are pretty. I like the fact that they give you diamonds every day and have a chance to earn money on a design with out having to spend any money. This comment was when I first started playing the game. I have been p!aying for a few months now and I sense the frustration as others do about the voting process. It really needs to be rethought. It is not fair and gives stars when not due and no stars when due. People see differently!

Love this app, but I would love some real review so I can learn how to.get the 5.0 scores all the time. Also, the app expects you to buy too much all the time with what is required. It makes it hard to just play in the app. We need more daily challenges. Update: I really like this app but it is so hard to do more than 1 challenge because everything costs so much in diamonds. Too expensive.

Design home is my daily stress reliever. Although I love this game, I have to say that it is always taking forever to load and it is not my connection though it says I have a bad connection. For the few years I have been playing it I haven't complained but I'm at level 51 and just trying to load an option takes forever and sometimes I'm told item can't be found right nowü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. It's a little frustrating but still absolutely love this game. Please let me know if there is a way to improve this?

Game is great.. expensive if you want to keep up...but it never ever connects for me the 1st time . and it's not my interent it's your server...One time I have to use my interent then I have to use my data..and most times I have to go back and forth 3 or 4 times to see which it will take...and this is every single day a few times a day .it never is the same and takes forever to load when it finally gets working.. but I do love the game! I am addicted just wish you would fix those 2 things...

title: Abs workout A6W - flat belly at home
description:
This abs workout contains workout schedule to perform in 42 days known as Aerobic Weider Six (Aerobic Six of Weider).

- over 200 000 positive comments
- over 30 millions downloads

Main features:
- daily abs workout
- only 6 exercises
- perfect abs in just 6 weeks
- home workout without equipment
- customize your workout or use default
- check your progress on photos
- monitor your weight and waist
- editable spoken messages during workout (via Text-to-Speech service)

Free application version is supported by in-app ads and has some limitations.

What's more in PRO version:
Not much - it's more like donate/thank you gesture.
- you support development of this and other Caynax apps, thank you :)
- no ads
- change exercises order
- dark application theme

Notice:
This application shouldn't be used as personal trainer. Before you start training ask your fitness instructor how you should perform each exercise.

If you have obesity problems you might not notice results of these exercises (flat stomach).
This workout was not designed to lose belly fat but to get flat, muscular abs/sixpack.

If You want to burn body fat try:
Caynax HIIT with Tabata workout
Caynax Home Workouts with HICT workout or other Tabata variations

Permissions:
READ_PHONE_STATE - used to detect incoming phone call and pause workout.
RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED - to start reminder service after phone start.
ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE, INTERNET - ads, checking for new app version, Google Analytics, Firebase Analytics.
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE/READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - backup/restore settings, store generated TTS files on sd card.
WAKE_LOCK - to ensure that workout works when screen is off.

comments: Fantastic series of Exercises. Simple exercises but still progressive. Need to be disciplined to get results
The best and simple. Results show after workout. üëçüëÜ

Update your alarm clock. I paid for it and expect you to improve it by adding functions people need. Some functions don't even work and are pointless. You need to give it some attention. If you get people's money and leave the apps like that people will understand what you're doing and will avoid you.

Have been using this app since 2015. Never let me down. Although I was inconsistent, during my early days of using the app in 2015 in two weeks I got the shreds, the abs lines really showed and the muscles cut and deep and since then the little abs I still have now is as a result of using the app often then. I'm downloading again. Let's go!
There is an issue where it just remains stuck on the generating TTS files in an infinite loop and the workout doesnt begin. Please fix. Otherwise its a great app.

title: Android Accessibility Suite
description:
Android Accessibility Suite is a collection of accessibility apps that help you use your Android device eyes-free or with a switch device.

Android Accessibility Suite includes:
‚Ä¢ Accessibility Menu: Use this large on-screen menu to lock your phone, control volume and brightness, take screenshots, and more.
‚Ä¢ Select to Speak: Select items on your screen and hear them read aloud.
‚Ä¢ Switch Access: Interact with your Android device using one or more switches or a keyboard instead of the touch screen.
‚Ä¢ TalkBack screen reader: Get spoken feedback, control your device with gestures, and type with the on-screen braille keyboard.

Android Accessibility Suite requires Android 6 or later. Learn how to check your Android version:
 https://support.google.com/android/answer/7680439

Learn more about using Android Accessibility Suite and other Android accessibility options:
 http://g.co/help/androidaccessibility

To get started:
1. Open your device's Settings app.
2. Select Accessibility.
3. Select Accessibility Menu, Select to Speak, Switch Access, or TalkBack.

Permissions Notice
‚Ä¢ Phone: Android Accessibility Suite observes the phone state so it can adapt announcements to your call status.
‚Ä¢ Accessibility Service: Because this app is an accessibility service, it can observe your actions, retrieve window content, and observe text that you type.

recentChanges:
Version 8.2 updates:

comments: We talk back feature when active prevents the Google Assistant from functioning as of Android 11 this is yet to be fixed and it's an ongoing over a month I have reported this multiple times it has been tested on multiple devices including devices that have been factory reset The assistant works correctly until talkback is turned on at which point it no longer can connect to Google and stops functioning

Has completely stopped working. I need this app to read text messages to me. And the transcribe button has overtaken the accessibility and it only will allow me to talk and record but not be able to read. Please repair this ASAP as it's very needful for me
Very annoying for the people that don't need it. My wife turned it on by accident several times, and it took a while to figure out how to navigate to disable the feature.
Not able to take screenshot in android 11 and better if the size of the accessibility icons are in regular size as like apps.

A great app, I'm sure, if you need the added support that Google can provide; however, if you don't need the added support this app just sits on your phone and uses memory storage that could be used more effectively. You can't uninstall this app so what else does it do when you are not looking?

title: Smart Recorder ‚Äì High-quality voice recorder
description:
Free and easy to use audio recorder for Android. It has been specifically designed for high-quality and long-time recording with a clean and simple user interface.

With a skipping silence on-the-fly feature you can shorten recordings by omitting relative silence. It allows you, for example, to catch night sleep talks or maybe some snoring, whatever comes first. üò¥ It is by the way how the idea to make this app was born: my wife wanted to prove that I talk at night. It turns out, I do. ü§î

Since 2012 this app has been installed on more than 40 million devices worldwide and proven to be a reliable everyday tool. From it's early days it has been known as Smart Voice Recorder, rebranded later to a bit more generic name. Because, you know, it's great not only for voice. üé∏

Regarding phone calls: üì≤
This app is not designed explicitly for recording phone calls. Some manufacturers block the ability to record the other party of a phone call for privacy or legal reasons. For the same purpose, the app will even pause the recording during phone calls, but it can be turned off in the settings. Check your local laws and make sure it works on your handset first.

More features:
‚Ä¢  Automatic and manual sensitivity control for Skip silence mode (Beta)
‚Ä¢  Live audio spectrum analyzer
‚Ä¢  Wave/PCM encoding with adjustable sample rate (8-44 kHz)
‚Ä¢  Recording in the background (even when a display is off)
‚Ä¢  Save/pause/resume/cancel recording process control
‚Ä¢  Efficient and easy on battery
‚Ä¢  Recording time limited only by available space on your storage (and tech. limit 2GB per file)
‚Ä¢  Straightforward recordings list and many sharing options
‚Ä¢  Launcher shortcut to start recording in one tap
‚Ä¢  Microphone gain calibration tool.

recentChanges: With the latest fixes and improvements, Smart Recorder is an even more reliable tool than it used to be. We will keep polishing it and will add more features soon. Just keep it up to date and go create.
comments: This is the best app of its kind. I go into the settings to manually set the skip silence and I have the best experience for multiple projects. I use this for music, capturing dreams when I wake up, recording important conversations, and sorting out ideas. I've downloaded this on multiple phones, I just wish there was an apple version of it.

It's Great! Does what it says it'll do and so far and especially with as much as I use it, no crashes, glitches or stall outs, (which used to happen a couple of years ago with older version of both app and phone). I've always re-downloaded this app specifically because of its definitive reliability for all that I need it for. It's also a definite 'must have' for interviews, appointments, sessions, and lectures whenever needed. (Only thing I might ask is for more updates playback options) Thanks

Great, simple app that opens quickly, is easy to navigate, and does exactly what it proposes to do and nothing more. When a native recorder was added to Android recently I considered switching to it, but it has a fatal flaw: it's difficult to get your recordings out of it. This app records things to a well-known place that it shows you via its settings.

I've been using this app for a few years now to record song ideas and stuff and they finally asked me to rate it so I decided hell yeah why not this app is a free high-quality recorder and has helped me out immensely and they don't constantly bombard with ads and and ask you to rate all the time I noticed this was the first time they asked maybe they just do that now but anyway I said "let's do it." Hope u like that sentence. üòé This is my primary recording app and I prefer it over the others.

Why all the high ratings for this I just ran the app and tested the recording quality of talking with my phone locked and my phone was directly next to me and all I got was muffled inaudible garbage. Perhaps it is good for speaking directly into the mic recording but if you need to record a class or something with your phone closed it seems this isn't the app for it. I had high hopes for this app back to the drawing board.

title: Tinker Island - Survival Story Adventure
description:
You're cast away on a TROPICAL ISLAND. Become the leader of SURVIVORS in this lost PARADISE. Take them on an ADVENTURE of a lifetime - build a base, explore mysteries or forage treasures. Learn the art of crafting, foraging and exploring but keep in mind, there is never an idle moment in the everyday lives of the survivors.

‚öì ‚öì ‚öì
FIGHT vicious enemies, tame savage beasts, kindle romance and solve RIDDLES. When the island SPEAKS to you, will you answer?

FEATURES:
‚ûæ Lead a band of island survivors using simple swipes
‚ûæ Choose your own adventure and try to survive
‚ûæ Explore a huge lush world
‚ûæ Experience a talking island
‚ûæ Fight many dangers that lurk behind every bush
‚ûæ Forage resources to survive
‚ûæ Build a base and upgrade structures
‚ûæ Match, stack and collect flowers in a cool mini game
‚ûæ Craft weapons and tools
‚ûæ Discover a gripping storyline
‚ûæ Uncover the terrible secret of Tinker Island

Three survivors find themselves shipwrecked and lost, not by choice, on what is believed to be a tropical deserted island. As they start exploring and discovering Tinker Island, they find great treasures, forage resources, build buildings and items that they need to gather, craft, build or harvest to protect themselves against the unfamiliar environment and the dangerous episodes awaiting them. A normal guy, a tourist onboard a ship, is forced to become a forager, a fighter, a true hero in this mini world adventure game. Find mysterious ancient villages and buildings, left behind by either wayward settlers or scum, discover an unknown civilization, uncover steampunk contraptions, covered with rust and almost unidentifiable. Not only is there no wifi in the caves on the islands, the whole thing is nowifi. 

As you progress and craft the needed tools, you slowly uncover the map, the monument, valley, the stars, the mountain and the treasures of the islands. If things don't pan out, retry. And then retry again. One hour, one life, yolo. There is plenty of wit and humor in the narrative, where you have to make the correct choices to progress through the story. Gather the needed resources to upgrade your buildings and unlock new areas and even new islands. Some are deserted islands, some are tiny islands with mysterious pasts, you may even come upon a Kraken. Maybe build a colony, a whole civilization in the rim of the world, but most of all, survive and complete the quests.

If you enjoy adventure games, survival games or even board games, this is definitely a game worth giving a go. It's a real treasure.

‚ò† WARNING! No wifi on the island. You're on your own!

Join the Tinker Island community and help each other out:
Follow Tinker Island story adventure game on the official forum: https://www.kongregate.com/forums/34216-tinker-island-mobile
Follow Tinker Island survival game on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tinkerisland/
Join the Tinker Island choice game Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/tinkerisland/
Follow the Tinker Island text game on Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/TinkerIsland/
Follow the Tinker Island updates and new episodes on Twitter: https://twitter.com/tinkerislandtm

PLEASE NOTE! Tinker Island is free to play, however, some additional items can  be purchased for real money or through special offers. If you don't wish to use this feature, please adjust your device's settings. By installing this game you agree to Terms of Service published here: https://www.trickytribe.com/terms-of-use/

recentChanges:
Even Tinker Island isn‚Äôt immune to the world beyond. Halloween has hit the island hard! Will you be able to solve the mystery in time?
Halloween Island: A separate isle with new locations, story and fights
Solve the Halloween mystery in time and unlock an incredible ally.
To ensure a smoother running, allow access to phone storage when prompted.
comments: I initially rated 4 stars, but after the recent update there's been a bug. The game is now stuck on the (empty) logbook section so it's unplayable. I can't use the back button, so my only option is to get out of the game. Please fix this :(

I couldn't get past the menu. I tried restarting the app a few times and it still wouldn't work. When the logbook menu loaded, the screen started flickering like crazy. If I was epileptic I probably would've had a seizure. The game keeps crashing, even on my other device. It's been nearly 2 hrs and I still cant play. But game looks good, so I'll rate it 3 stars at least.

This game is a great resource/idle type game. The ads aren't intrusive, the art design and sound are great. This is a perfect pick up and play type of game, with the random events and nicely tuned progression more than making up for the relative lack gameplay. The in-app purchases are fairly done as well, never feeling like you're being forced into them, but also being a great way to boost impatient players. Definitely give this game a try!

This is a fun little time burner and the aesthethic is charming. Gameplay is cathartic when things are made. The character are unique and give a retro feel. However this game is a bit lacking in depth, logic, and personality. For starters the equipment system is a bit rubbish, when a character get's something new, the old piece is lost to the void. It's a bit counterintuitive when survivor's can't be wasteful. It would make more sense if the old tool broke and the option to make a new one.
I am stuck in the caves and I cannot get out. I have tried everything and I tried deleting and reinstalling. Please help! This is ruining the game

title: Telegram X
description: An alternative Telegram client based on TDLib, with higher speed, slicker animations and experimental features.
descriptionHTML: An alternative Telegram client based on TDLib, with higher speed, slicker animations and experimental features.
summary: Instant messaging ‚Äî simple, fast, secure, and synced across all your devices.
recentChanges:
- Roll a die: send üé≤, üéØ or üèÄ emoji to try your luck
- View & edit privacy effective for specific user or chat members via Profile ‚Äî Three-Dot Menu ‚Äì Edit Privacy
- Quizzes 2.0: Explanations & Timer
- Edit channel messages without date limit
- Markdown in notifications
- Added an option to silence non-contacts
- In-App Camera 2.0
- Improved several admin tools

... and much more. See full change log: https://t.me/tgx_android/287
comments: Edit 5/10/2020: This used to be such a beautiful app, always used it in place of the regular Telegram. Downgrading the rating for two reasons 1. It hasn't been updated since May 2020 and 2. It still hasn't received the Video Calling update that the regular app has had for two months. What gives? I thought this version was supposed to receive newer updates sooner.

It's great! But when i uninstalled and reinstalled, it seems to not work on my mobile data anymore. All my other messaging apps still work so the problem isn't with me. I've tried all the solutions on Google, like clearing cache, but no use. It only seems to work on wifi which is such a shame. Is there a way to fix this issue? Has anyone else encountered this too?

Definitely lightweight and hogs way less resources in background compared to the official app and it's forks like Plus Messenger. Faster? maybe, the animations in TGX are slick but overall it's the same speed as official app. All I want to see is this app getting updates atleast once in 2 weeks to keep up with new telegram features, then it'll be perfect!

This app is a very general and decent one to use for chatting to people anywhere in the world. The calls are typically much clearer than Discord, and I love the fact you can send videos of any size, unlike Discord. The reason it only gets a 3 star is because there's no option to delete/block contacts on the mobile version of the app. It's a hinderance to need to get onto a computer to remove a contact you don't want.

It is very good app for sharing bigger file. At first it downloaded the file properly. But now it's not downloading.... It's a big problem. It's very difficult because I 've to reinstall and install every time so please rectify this problem. If it can't download any file and it seems very useless. So please rectify this problem as soon.

title: iHeartRadio: Radio, Podcasts & Music On Demand
description:
Your Music, Your Stations, And #1 For Podcasts. All Free.

Stream unlimited music, thousands of live radio stations, podcasts and playlists for any mood or activity, all in one app. The iHeartRadio app for Android Phone and Tablet is easy to use and best of all, it's FREE.
 
Download the iHeartRadio Android app today and start listening to your favorite live radio stations, podcasts and music playlists!


The Best Live & Local Radio Stations
‚Ä¢ Discover thousands of local AM and FM radio stations live near you and from cities across the globe.
‚Ä¢ Our Radio App allows you to tune in to top radio stations, music, breaking news, sports, talk and comedy radio shows.
‚Ä¢ Hear sports radio stations like ESPN Radio, Fox Sports Radio, FNTSY Sports Radio, and more.
‚Ä¢ Listen to top sports personalities discuss the latest news around the NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, NCAA, Soccer, Golf, and Tennis.

The iHeartRadio Podcast App - now #1 for Podcasts
‚Ä¢ Our Podcast App features the most popular podcasts from NPR, Gimlet, How Stuff Works, ESPN Podcasts, Big Money Players Network, TED, Wondery, and from popular personalities like The Ron Burgundy Podcast, Anna Faris Is Unqualified Podcast, The Herd with Colin Cowherd Podcast, The Joe Rogan Podcast, Ben Shapiro Podcast, Bobby Bones Podcast, Armchair Expert with Dax Shepard, Chelsea Handler Podcast, and more.
‚Ä¢ Follow your favorite podcasts and download podcast episodes to your Android device to listen offline, without the need for WiFi.

comments: The app works most of the time but does get hung on occasion. The worst part is that even though it recovers, every time it happens it replays extra commercials instead of continuing the audio stream. I did read response from the author, and brief connection interruptions may be occurring. The interruptions occur most frequently during a popular segment so might be backend. My main point still stands, a less than 2 sec interruption should not have the app replay extra ad, just recover stream.

This app doesn't work at all. It keeps on giving me a message saying try again later. This was my very first time installing this app. I tried to purchased the "All Access" version, but I kept on getting a message that said try again later. So this is the reason I gave it one star. I wished I couldn't get it no stars. Fix asap!

I use the app a lot and have enjoyed it for many years. One of the stations I enjoy listening to is The Tchaikovsky Large Symphony Orchestra. It used to be amazing and play a great variety of classical composers. Lately, it has started playing a lot of other genres, like classic rock, Lynard Skynard, rap, Snoop Dog and Dr Dre, and country, Johnny Cash, just to name a few. I believe someone adjusted the algorithm, it would be great of it could be fixed.

The version on device is up to date. The device is less than a year old. It crashes often - like just stops in middle of broadcast. Often cuts top of the hour news short - usually during the weather it just jumps to a commercial. Constantly asks user to upgrade to premium. Since this review originally posted, it has crashed about a half dozen times. All these problems are relatively new. Needs quite a bit of improvement.

app is good but avoiding the subscription pop up is annoying and video ads playing 30 secs every time you switch stations is a bit much. Ads already play on the stations so it's overwhelming and is much less enjoyable than listening to a podcast show on other apps. I only use free versions of news and talk apps. I'll use more if app becomes better.

title: Microsoft To Do: List, Task & Reminder
description:
Microsoft To Do is a task management app to help you stay organized and manage your day-to-day. You can use Microsoft To Do to make shopping lists or task lists, take notes, record collections, plan an event, or set reminders to increase your productivity and focus on what matters to you. Microsoft To Do makes it easy to stay organized and manage your life.

Accomplish what's meaningful and important to you each day with My Day and Suggestions, your personalized daily planner tools. Intelligent suggestions recommend tasks from across your lists that may be relevant for the day. From grocery lists to housecleaning routines, daily tasks are simple with To Do. When you're quickly switching between contexts and tasks, it's important to have tools that help you achieve what matters. Microsoft To Do helps you quickly capture and retrieve your lists and tasks across devices and between multiple accounts.

Capture tasks from different Microsoft apps and services and sync them with Microsoft To Do. Flag emails as tasks in Outlook or any email account hosted by Microsoft, add to lists with Cortana, and see tasks assigned to you from Microsoft Planner. Get peace of mind knowing that your tasks and lists are hosted on the Microsoft 365 service ‚Äì one of the most reliable services with industry-leading security offerings.

Microsoft To Do‚Äôs modern, easy-to-use experience makes your lists unique, with customizable features like emoji in lists, colorful themes, dark mode, and more. Plus, shared lists help you stay connected and collaborate with family, friends, and colleagues.
 
Microsoft To Do features:

Daily planner
‚Ä¢ A daily planner personalized with suggested tasks: My Day
‚Ä¢ To do lists are accessible anywhere, on any device
‚Ä¢ Share lists and assign tasks with your friends, family, colleagues, and classmates
‚Ä¢ Task management features break your tasks into manageable steps
‚Ä¢ Take notes to add to any task
‚Ä¢ Group lists together by topic or project

Task manager
‚Ä¢ Add reminders, tasks and lists with the To Do widget
‚Ä¢ Daily organizer personalized with bold and colorful backgrounds
‚Ä¢ Reminders with one-time or recurring due dates
‚Ä¢ Make task lists and switch between school, work, and personal lists 
‚Ä¢ Attach up to 25 MB of files to any task

To Do lists for any purpose
‚Ä¢ Bill planner
‚Ä¢ Shopping list
‚Ä¢ Reminders
‚Ä¢ Task management
‚Ä¢ Take notes
‚Ä¢ And more

Office 365 integration
‚Ä¢ Sync reminders and task lists between Outlook and To Do
‚Ä¢ Lists and tasks are hosted with the security of Microsoft 365
‚Ä¢ Task lists are compiled from the apps and services across Microsoft 365
‚Ä¢ Add multiple Microsoft accounts 

Microsoft To Do helps you organize and simplify your plans, whether it's for work, school, or home.

To Do is free and available across the web and iOS, Mac, Android, and Windows devices.
 
Learn more: https://to-do.microsoft.com
Follow us on Twitter: @MicrosoftToDo
Have an idea or feature suggestion? https://todo.uservoice.com/
Need support? https://todosupport.helpshift.com/
By installing Microsoft To Do, you agree to the Microsoft Terms of Use: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=842575

summary: Increase productivity! Make a daily to do list, create a reminder & share notes!
recentChanges: In this release we have made fixes to improve Sync in To Do.
comments: Love the app but have a few suggestions to make it even better. Have scheduled todo items show up on the Outlook calendar app; This would be awesome!! Have an option to hide certain lists from "my day". I have some lists I use as filler projects when there's free time and I don't want them taking priority over other necessary items I haven't scheduled yet. Thank you for a great app thus far!

For me, the best app for organizing your life. But some things should be improved though: 1. You can't set Monday as the first day of the week. 2. Having some of your notes appear both in Planned and Tasks and some in Planned but not in Tasks is bewildering. Besides Planned and Tasks there are two more lists - My Day and Important. Why so many overlapping lists? 3. You can't change fixed time for reminder alarm. For example, "tomorrow" is always at 9 a.m. You can't change that to, say, 10 a.m. 4. You can't set quick alarm. For example you can't type some note and then tap "remind me in half an hour" or in 15 minutes, in two hours etc. There's no such option. 5. You can't insert a photo or voice recording into your reminders. 6. You can't protect your reminders and notes with a password. Anyone can read them.

Redudant and limiting. There should be a way to share specific lists, but keep some private-a "Honey-Do"list; to be able to schedule minders for the 3rd level items and further break down tasks; to be able to reorder 3rd level sending completed to bottom; to be able to prioritize which list I want at the top and if I don't use Important, Planned, Tasks, then I want to move it down and pin what I want on top; to be able to set custom alarms, not notifications, for very important things...

Used to take the place of Wunderlist. Actually liking it much better. It would be helpful to see who created the task, who edited it and when. Also being able to add comments others would notice was an addition, or ask questions on it that would alert the creator there was a comment/question, would be super helpful. Other than that, very satisfied.

Granted, I just downloaded the app, but I have yet to find anything useful about it. Copy/pasting in and then reorganizing a basic task list took me about a half hour (seriously? No drag and drop?) and I haven't been able to figure out how to share a task list with someone else. If I can't share the task list, why is there an "assigned to me" toggle? Instructions on the MS website seem to be referencing a completely different version than the one I have. Utterly useless and frustrating.

title: Yelp: Find Food, Delivery & Services Nearby
description:
Yelp has over 199 million business and restaurant reviews worldwide. Whether you‚Äôre looking for a new pizzeria, a great coffee shop nearby, a new salon, or the best handyman in town, Yelp is the city and travel guide to finding the perfect places to eat, shop, drink, relax, visit and play.

Read online reviews, browse photos and menus, order takeout from favorite spots, make reservations, see hours, locations, and other important information for any business you‚Äôre looking for. 

Yelp puts great local businesses right at your fingertips. Discover new foods, hot spots, places for shopping and local businesses near me! While traveling or at home. Plus, order delivery or pickup. 

Yelp features: 
üçï Local Eats: Find Restaurants and Food Delivery Near Me  üçï
‚Ä¢ Find where to eat. Yelp shows all the newest, hottest and top rated places to eat and bars to drink nearby 
‚Ä¢ Dine at local restaurants for breakfast, lunch and dinner, or get something to go
‚Ä¢ Order timely food delivery
‚Ä¢ Make quick reservations, book a table, order pickup or food delivery, view restaurant menus‚Äîall from your phone
‚Ä¢ Read restaurant reviews from other Yelp users and scroll through photos to help you decide where to go
‚Ä¢ Get amazing food deals for dining and delivery places nearby, plan dinner reservations for trips in advance

‚úçÔ∏è Review, Discover, and Add Photos üì∏
‚Ä¢ Discover local events, businesses and services like body shops and hair salons
‚Ä¢ Look up addresses and phone numbers for businesses near me
‚Ä¢ Read and write reviews, check-in to local businesses, upload photos and add tips for other Yelp users
‚Ä¢ Browse photo galleries and add photos to share experiences
‚Ä¢ Redeem great check-in offers in the area or sign up for cash back

üöó Find Shops Around Me, Get Quotes, and Hire Professionals üõ†
‚Ä¢ Find the coolest stores and top rated body shops complete with customer reviews and contact info 
‚Ä¢ Hire local professionals for home renovation, car repair, car transport, landscaping, moving, and other hiring services
‚Ä¢ Get quotes from professionals, message contractors nearby, and book appointments with a click
‚Ä¢ Read millions of user reviews and recommendations by the Yelp community
‚Ä¢ Filter searches by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, location, and hours of operation 

üíÖ Beauty - Pamper Yourself üíá
‚Ä¢ Find highly-rated salons, spas, massage therapists, acupuncturists, and offers around me 
‚Ä¢ Book appointments through Yelp at the most relaxing staycation destinations or find deals when traveling

üîç Search Filters üîç
‚Ä¢ Filter search results by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, open now, and other specifics like good for groups, full bar, cuisine type etc.
‚Ä¢ Look up addresses and phone numbers, call a business, order food delivery and make quick reservations directly from the Yelp app
‚Ä¢ Find the top rated food, hotels or hiring services nearby or in cities like New York, Chicago, San Francisco, Los Angeles, Houston, Phoenix, Philadelphia

üç© Features üé®
‚Ä¢ Read millions of expert user reviews and browse through beautiful photos of each business
‚Ä¢ Write and read online reviews, check-in to local businesses, order pickup or delivery, upload photos, book appointments, find a new activity, and add tips for other Yelp users
‚Ä¢ Use Yelp as a travel guide and as a food guide for eating, drink, things to do, to see, to shop and relax

Need Help? Contact Yelp at https://www.yelp-support.com/?l=en_US 
Note: Continued use of GPS running can dramatically decrease battery life. 

This software uses code of FFmpeg (http://ffmpeg.org) licensed under the LGPLv2.1 (http://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/lgpl-2.1.html) and its source can be downloaded here: https://github.com/Yelp/ffmpeg-android

Find top local restaurants, bars, hotels, events and other things to do around me, read customer reviews, order pickup or delivery, and search for services near me, all from the Yelp app.

recentChanges:
Sometimes your gutters get clogged, your chimney needs sweeping, and your trees get so overgrown the branches start scraping your bedroom window like the opening scene of a Halloween movie. Fortunately, this update can help with all that and more.

comments: After the app updates on 10/29/20 a new review I posted indicated "save review as draft" when i chose "post review". Then it wouldn't allow me to update or post the draft. I exited and re-entered the app to find the review already posted. The notifications I received were incorrect. I've also attempted three times to update my profile pic for Halloween, and that's having issues. (Android user, yes I rebooted several times after yesterday's updates)

Yelp just cost me $75 in overages on my data plan because it's CONSTANTLY running in the background! It sucked 5.5 GB in one day! Apparently my phone settings were reset during an update, but this should NEVER have happened! Why do you need that much data from me?!
This app used 5 gb of my data from the background. I haven't even opened the app over a month but it's running in the background for some reason and takes up a lot of your data.

Uninstalled. I don't feel I have a use for your service anymore because of the recent unnecessary expansion of your business to implement a system of extrajudicial shaming/punishment, based solely on likely false or dubious accusations & without any semblance of due process, thru the awarding of special badges to businesses you feel are run or owned by those that you alone declare as undesirables. Try to not be too obvious with this badge however by making it a yellow star, pink triangle, etc.

Yelp has gotten worse then GOOGLE search when it comes to searching for the nearest business you search for. Your looking for a shell gas station then they put a station 3 times farther then you wanted as the 1 search! You drive past 3 stations to get to their 1 search results! I hope everyone who screwed up the yelp app to make more money instead of being actually a useful app dies of a horrible disease!

title: Microsoft Kaizala ‚Äì Chat, Call & Work
description:
Simple & secure chat app for large groups & work management.
 
Microsoft Kaizala is an encrypted messaging app for sending instant messages, pictures, documents, video and audio. 
 
Organizations worldwide have adopted Microsoft Kaizala, making it one of the most preferred professional communication and team collaboration apps.  
 
Kaizala is a highly interactive, all-in-one messaging app with incredibly productive & utility features viz. announcements, task management, survey & polls, schedule meetings, collecting feedback, requesting attendance, quizzes, and more. 
 
Users can utilize in-built features like 'jobs' for assigning tasks. Onboard new employees using the 'training' feature to upload text and video orientation instructions. Connect to your extended network with ease and share text, photos, data, and file sharing. Organizations can use the broadcast groups to engage with end user.   
 
Kaizala provides secure 1:1 and private group chats. These can be groups for internal team discussion, engaging consumers and gather feedback, and for professional interaction and interest-based networking.  
 
Kaizala is a scalable app aimed at increasing productivity, collaboration and efficiency for both users & organizations. With no upper limit on members, Kaizala has set the benchmark for messengers handling large groups.
 
Additional Value-added attributes for Office 365 Customers:  
- Kaizala is compliant with GDPR, ISO 27001, SOC1, and HIPAA. Kaizala provides Azure Active Directory sign-in options for chats.  
- The encrypted messenger sports Office 365's enterprise-level security.  
- Office 365 integration enables group creation and management. Users can remove members and manage data.  
- Create custom actions, get access to advanced data reporting and analysis.  
- Integrate business systems and workflow, and enhance collaboration using Kaizala‚Äôs open 
 
APIs. 
Features at a glance: https://products.office.com/en-in/business/microsoft-kaizala 
 
Check out the web version: https://webapp.kaiza.la/Account/Webapp 
 
Our customer stories: 
 
International airlines streamlines cabin crew operations 
Philippine Airlines has cut down on scheduling time, enhanced security and boosted employee satisfaction post Kaizala integration- https://customers.microsoft.com/en-us/story/philippine-airlines-travel-transportation-kaizala 
 
Indian Hospital makes real-time healthcare services affordable and accessible 
Narayana Health has implemented Kaizala to cut down healthcare costs and facilitate timely communication between patients and the medical staff- https://customers.microsoft.com/en-us/story/narayana-healthcare-kaizala 
 
We value your feedback, write to us at kaizalafeedback@microsoft.com 
For more details about availability in your region please visit- 
 
https://aka.ms/kaizala_availability 

Review terms and conditions: https://aka.ms/kaizala-eula

Simple & secure chat app for large groups & work management.

Microsoft Kaizala is an encrypted messaging app for sending instant messages, pictures, documents, video and audio.

Organizations worldwide have adopted Microsoft Kaizala, making it one of the most preferred professional communication and team collaboration apps.

Kaizala is a highly interactive, all-in-one messaging app with incredibly productive & utility features viz. announcements, task management, survey & polls, schedule meetings, collecting feedback, requesting attendance, quizzes, and more.

Users can utilize in-built features like 'jobs' for assigning tasks. Onboard new employees using the 'training' feature to upload text and video orientation instructions. Connect to your extended network with ease and share text, photos, data, and file sharing. Organizations can use the broadcast groups to engage with end user.

Kaizala provides secure 1:1 and private group chats. These can be groups for internal team discussion, engaging consumers and gather feedback, and for professional interaction and interest-based networking.

Kaizala is a scalable app aimed at increasing productivity, collaboration and efficiency for both users & organizations. With no upper limit on members, Kaizala has set the benchmark for messengers handling large groups.

Additional Value-added attributes for Office 365 Customers:
- Kaizala is compliant with GDPR, ISO 27001, SOC1, and HIPAA. Kaizala provides Azure Active Directory sign-in options for chats.
- The encrypted messenger sports Office 365's enterprise-level security.
- Office 365 integration enables group creation and management. Users can remove members and manage data.
- Create custom actions, get access to advanced data reporting and analysis.
- Integrate business systems and workflow, and enhance collaboration using Kaizala‚Äôs open

APIs.
Features at a glance: https://products.office.com/en-in/business/microsoft-kaizala

Check out the web version: https://webapp.kaiza.la/Account/Webapp

Our customer stories:

International airlines streamlines cabin crew operations
Philippine Airlines has cut down on scheduling time, enhanced security and boosted employee satisfaction post Kaizala integration- https://customers.microsoft.com/en-us/story/philippine-airlines-travel-transportation-kaizala

Indian Hospital makes real-time healthcare services affordable and accessible
Narayana Health has implemented Kaizala to cut down healthcare costs and facilitate timely communication between patients and the medical staff- https://customers.microsoft.com/en-us/story/narayana-healthcare-kaizala

We value your feedback, write to us at kaizalafeedback@microsoft.com
For more details about availability in your region please visit-

https://aka.ms/kaizala_availability

Review terms and conditions: https://aka.ms/kaizala-eula
summary: A simple and secure mobile chat app for work
comments: One of the best SaaS in long time. add feautres a- Calender Meet should be editable b- Public group creattion should be seprate procedure rather then enabling and disabling, this might risk business groups. c- Feature to send Gif and Stickers d- multiple device login, similar to Telegram, as the storage is in the cloud. e- forwarded message should show as forwarded f- battery optimization

Sorry... I am going to delete my account and uninstall it. It is has issues. Messages are not being delivered, but shows they are delivered. Messages does not reach their destination, yet shows they have reached. Very destructive when having a conversation.

Nice communicating app way better and official than WhatsApp the features are exactly what we need for this app is infinite stars but google has 5 star only option But I have a complain the dark mode you can't see what you are typing like the font colour is very light I suggest making the font colour black or more dark

This is a very good app for any groups or chats, the app even works better even when my net was coming low, I am very happy by the performance of the app and not only that it has a kaizala help team at home page of the app which enables to ask your doubts and all updates are also posted in that, Thank You Microsoft Team for this app ‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è.

I don't normally rate apps I believe it's a waste of time for the most part but this app offers so many really cool functions that I have to say something about it.I love this app it's like a combination of Facebook and Twitter and Instagram and the best messaging app . I wish that Microsoft would work a little harder to maintain this app's consistency. But other than that it's a fantastic app five stars.

comments: It has everything I want to watch from Disney! I love it sooo much. I had this service since Day 1 and there used to be multiple issues but now it has been a year and it is perfect, no issues whatsoever. I do wish the algorithm for movies recommended to you were on the level that Netflix and Amazon Prime Video has, but I'm sure that will be more finetuned in the future. Overall, I'm very happy with this app and service, and will continue its patronage into the foreseeable future.

Slow. Doesn't load. Says it's my internet but all my other streaming services work great. Hulu, Amazon, Netflix. Wish they would work on that. Also not everything comes up on my watchlist that I have saved. If I manually look for it. It shows in my watchlist but when I go to my watchlist. It isn't there. Downloaded movie to watch on the plane. Didn't work. I like the old Disney movies but not all of them are on here. They say they switch them up but never do.

The app worked great for the first 10 months but over the last month when we're at home watching a movie, the movie will freeze up and then the app will reset. After that, we have to navigate back to the movie. UPDATE.. PLEASE FIX THIS F@UCKING APP! We're paying for a monthly service in which we can't even watch the programing. A corporation like Disney should have a flawless app. The app was perfect and now it sucks.

I love watching my favorite shows on here, but this only works on my laptop and will not work on my phone. I have tried everything to get it to work and the only thing that keeps coming up when I try to watch something is "sorry cannot play if error keeps happening please contact disney support with code 39". But like I said works perfectly fine on my computer. I want to watch it on my phone as well, please fix the problem!

This app is pretty good I have enjoyed it so far. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is the app runs a slow sometimes but that could be on my end so I wouldn't take that into consideration too much. I also like the shows that are on there now but I was watching the marvel movies and they don't have Spiderman or The Hulk which isn't that big of a deal but if you wanted to watch those you would need another app +subscription. Overall its a good app and is cheap compared to other streaming services.

title: Cisco Webex Meetings
description:
Don‚Äôt let being away from the office slow your business down. Experience secure, productive meetings from wherever you are.

Cisco Webex Meetings delivers over 25 billion meetings per month, offering industry-leading video and audio conferencing with sharing, chat, and more. Experience why Webex Meetings is the most trusted video conferencing solution today.

General features: 
‚Ä¢	Join and present from any meeting, event, or training session
‚Ä¢	Hands-free voice commands with Google Assistant and Google Home Hub
‚Ä¢	Seamless joining directly from your calendar or customizable widget

‚Ä¢	Share your screen to everyone

Want to learn more? See https://help.webex.com/nowvmhw/.

Follow us:

comments: App is decent for online meetings. I use it for group meetings as well as one on one collaboration. It is as good as zoom and some of the other platforms out there. I like that you can set the meeting to be open to anyone that has the link. unlike zoom the host doesn't have to add each individual to the meeting and you can also lock the meeting so no one else can get in if it's a private conversation, for instance an appointment with a therapist.

I was a first time user & was originally overwhelmed by all of the different options & directions. Also, I was attempting to use a "smart" phone which gave me limited screen usage. I would suggest that there be a test setup & a dummy call for novices; that way we can get practice before our actual conference call. We could also work out any kinks with our equipmemt. UPDATE: 6/17/20 I've used the system frequently over the past month. The system is a good option for those w/limited screen size.

I use this app for group virtual meetings at my government occupation. the app works wonderful, lots of video, audio, quality settings to chose from. my only issue would be that I had a great deal of difficulty initially learning how to join an active group. in fact I missed the first two meetings because I couldn't get it to work, and I am very technically proficient, from building barebones CPUs, html Java cyber security ect, and I still found the login to join meeting process very difficult.

As the parent of student, I've had to learn this app to support my child's education & I have to say, it's pretty decent. It could be a little less glitchy on audio. The video streamed rather smoothly. It wasn't exactly HDMI quality but it wasn't Commadore 64 pixelated either. There was a time delay of a few seconds with audio, that wasn't reflected in the video stream at all, when transitioning but it seemed as tho it would handle a few users at a time when speaking. Overall, very sufficient!

I have used Webex several times and have always been happy with the quality of voice and video. This time specially, there were some delays (5-10 seconds) on what presenter was sharing on his screen with attendees. He could see a new page, but we were still waiting to get it in our screen.

title: Venmo
description:
Why use Venmo?

Because it‚Äôs the money app for splitting the cost of almost anything‚Äîright then, right there.
Because it makes settling up feel like catching up. 
Because you can add a note to each payment to remember the moments, not the money. 

What do people use Venmo for? Plenty of things, like:

Meals
Split the group dinner tab without the napkin math.

Rent
Transfer money to roomies for your share of rent and utilities.

Activities
Settle up for fun stuff like concert tix and road trips.

Surprises
Send a penny to say hi, or 5 bucks for good luck.

Still reading? We‚Äôll let you in on a little secret: we‚Äôre more than just a way to pay friends.
- We offer the Venmo Debit Card, so you can shop with your Venmo balance everywhere Mastercard¬Æ is accepted in the U.S., plus earn cash back rewards at select retailers. Terms apply: https://venmo.com/rewards/
- Get your Venmo money in the bank, fast. Use Instant Transfer to get your cash in minutes using an eligible debit card or bank account. 
- Check out with Venmo on some of your favorite apps, like Uber, StockX, Grubhub, and Zola. 
- We‚Äôve got your back‚Äîsecurity is very important to us, and we prioritize making you feel safe and secure by taking security measures to protect your account. Plus, we‚Äôve got a stellar customer support team, ready to solve any issues.


Card is issued by The Bancorp Bank pursuant to license by Mastercard International Incorporated. The Bancorp Bank; Member FDIC. Mastercard is a registered trademark, and the circles design is a trademark of Mastercard International Incorporated.

recentChanges: We worked on various improvements and bug fixes
comments: This app used to be good. I tried to add another bank account to use to send money and it did not accept my amount to verified. I never had problems sending money before. Then I tried the original bank account to send money. It keep saying cannot process try later. It's been three days and still now working. What a shame. I loved this app before, now I dont. Have to find another way to send money.

There isno feedback on payments and I had to exit and re-open the app to see my payment was sent. The settings suck, if something is on and you want it off, the app starts linking your accounts instead of being an off or on option. Whatever you do, don't accidentally break their rules or they will ban you for life and not give you an appeal option. The parent company will persecute you of you treat anyone the way they treat their customers.

I have had venmo since they started. I have not had any issues, I use it to accept payments. It makes budgeting easier for me as I use my venmo to make misc purchases that I don't want to use for my main account. No issues for me ever. I found venmo because originally I was with cash app. Someone hacked my acct and cash app penalized me and closed my account with no option to open again. Venmo saved the day! i love this app, my favorite part is the emojis!

App keeps freezing and crashing out of nowhere. It still runs fine, but at least 2 or 3 times now I've sent money to someone and the app freezes while the money is sending. Only way to escape is by exiting the app through task manager. The money always goes through to the other person but this shouldn't happen. Also often the app will just freeze while I'm scrolling through transactions. Sometimes it resolves itself, sometimes it doesn't. Otherwise, I would rate this app 5 stars.

The app keeps freezing randomly all the time, while navigating through it. It doesn't matter what I'm doing, it could be scrolling, tapping on something, etc., I have to restart the app each time. I also don't get notifications until I manually open the app. After which I keep getting the same notification again after I've closed the app!

title: News Break: Local Breaking Stories & US Headlines
description:
Local headlines and breaking news ‚Äì get your local news, crime updates,  results and coverage, sports updates and U.S. headlines straight to your phone, with News Break.

Connect with your local community and follow U.S. headlines such as the local news, sports events, lifestyle stories, and even crime updates and traffic. News Break is personalized to your interests, likes and dislikes, so you‚Äôll always get relevant stories that really matter to you.

News Break helps people live safer, more vibrant, more truly connected lives. Whether it‚Äôs your local sports team, lifestyle tips, local headlines, breaking stories, U.S. news and updates ‚Äì you can access local, relevant stories and world news with just a tap.

U.S. News and Highlights

‚Ä¢ Get a curated daily brief focused on breaking stories, the U.S, local headlines, crime updates, traffic, events, sports updates and more U.S. news and local updates
‚Ä¢ Our intelligent local news platform aggregates rich, relevant stories from more than 10,000 trusted news outlets across the U.S.
‚Ä¢ Breaking news - be the first to know about breaking local news, U.S. headlines, world news and local updates

Local Updates: Know Your Town

‚Ä¢ Find local restaurants, local events, shop openings, traffic, breaking stories, and more ‚Äì all in a single app!
‚Ä¢ Read unique perspectives and personal stories from local writers and content creators
‚Ä¢ U.S. headlines, sports updates, lifestyle stories and local events - focus on the incredible things that are happening right where you live and work!

News Commentary: Express Yourself

‚Ä¢ Don‚Äôt just read the news, discuss it with other News Break readers!
‚Ä¢ News Break welcomes all respectful perspectives and points of view

Support the Cause

‚Ä¢ News Break is working hard to revive the local-news ecosystem by supporting small publishers around the U.S.
‚Ä¢ We‚Äôre activating legions of local bloggers and content creators ‚Äì people just like you ‚Äì that have important things to say about their communities. Join in and share your views & news!

What are you waiting for? Download News Break today and start living a safer, more vibrant, more connected life through the power of local news, U.S. news and information!

Your place for local updates, breaking stories and world news. News Break ‚Äì Better Informed, Better Life.

comments: It's a pretty nice app. Loads of information and tons of links. The guys are great. If they run across something that you like, they will email you or text ya. They we're just letting me know about Tom's Place. It's really good too. Kinda slow at times but it's not bad. I would definitely recommend üòä this app.

I am tired of this app crashing, repeatedly. I will be in the middle of an interesting article and the app closes and restarts. I even deleted it and reloaded it and it still happens. To make things worse, I can't always find the article I was reading again. Annoying. Update...Still happening. Still annoyed.

it is a nice site- if you're into everything - I initially downloaded for my breaking neighborhood news - tried to adjust the notifications level to no avail - it resets itself for push, for local, for comments. it slowly started to take up my whole screen with updates on the same story, with nothing new to report on. I had to uninstall. :( updated 10/31 - app send emails only now :) it seems as though it has improved and I look forward to reading the articles now.

I've been using News break for about a year now, and it's been informative and accurate in relating the news. I like this app mainly because if it's wide variety of topics and interest pieces. My news etc. is ALWAYS just a few inches from me. I don't have to go buy a newspaper for almost $2.00 everyday. I feel I get the news I need to keep me up to date between this app and watching Action news a couple times a day.

The developer needs to work on this site!!! They do not respond back, or even care about issues. It freezes up and sometimes takes 30 minutes to as you to "stop"/"wait" or "close out" by that time you are other places. They load too many ads for the screens and ones that take over the whole screen where you can not close out of,you have to leave the app, and come back never to read the article you were trying. The ADs do not format to fit the page right. I need more space here to address issues

title: Smart Tutor for SAMSUNG Mobile
description:
Description

Smart Tutor is an easy, quick and safe means of consulting for Android‚Ñ¢ smart phone and tablet series. It can be used to diagnose your device remotely in order to optimize device performance and give functional advice. 

Diagnoses can be requested for the following:
     ‚Ä¢ Data transfer, backup and restore
     ‚Ä¢ New features advice
     ‚Ä¢ Software update check
     ‚Ä¢ Account settings (Samsung/Google‚Ñ¢/email/etc.)

How to get started
1. Download the "Smart Tutor" from Google play store and install on our Android device.
 * From Galaxy S5, please download Smart Tutor via the Galaxy Essential widget
   (this features may differ by region or nations.)
2. Make a phone call to the SAMSUNG Contact center. After agreeing "Terms and Conditions",
   the phone number of contact center will be displayed.(Because it is depending on country)
3. Enter the 6 digits connection code given by a tech expert.
4. Once connected, a tech expert will diagnose your mobile.
5. If you want to terminate "Smart Tutor", please tap "Disconnect" menu.

Benefit
 ‚Ä¢ Safety & Reliable
    Don't worry about exposing our private information."Smart Tutor" restricts a tech expert 
    from accessing applications with customer's private information such as Gallery, Message, 
    e-mail and other throughout special features.
 ‚Ä¢ Convenient & Easy
    Provide remote support from our Android device quickly and easily if we can use 3G/4G or Wi-Fi.
 ‚Ä¢ Features
    Screen Share / Chat / Screen Lock / Application Lock

Requirement & Note
1. "Smart Tutor" works with Android OS(Above Android 2.3.6)
2. "Google Experience Device" is not supported such as "Galaxy Nexus"
3. Connection in 3G/4G Network will be chargeable according to your network data fee agreement with 
   your operator/Telecom. Before the connection, ensure to check Wi-Fi availability for free support
