recentChanges: New on Android: language tips! Tap the Tips icon next to certain skills to get helpful explanations of grammar, pronunciation and useful phrases. Now available in our Spanish, French and Chinese courses, with more to come!
comments: I loved this app before the recent update!!! Before you could practice for hours and actually get somewhere with your learning. You could make mistakes and it would push you to get it right and that was so encouraging and rewarding and you felt like you were getting somewhere. Now with the hearts, as soon as you make 5 mistakes, thats it, end of session. Awful and very deflating. Yes I could pay to upgrade, but thats ¬£7 a month, over ¬£80 for a year!!!! Very very disappointed.

Fix the problem when we change email, the app keeps remembering the previous email. Create the option to delete courses or organize them by preference. The heart system is terrible, remove it. The application has too many bugs for silly things, it does not load the option to follow, sometimes the audio doesn't work. I don't uninstall it because they asked me to use it at school, but this app is terrible.

I can only recommend the Desk Top version of Duolingo, and even that is marginal. The mobile app is cumbersome and frustrating with having to earn and buy errors, unless you spring for the Pay version. Their slogan used to be "Make learning fun and free." Wll, let me tell you, the new Hearts system is not fun. And, I think their new update is solely intended to make people buy the Plus version. Also, both versions have some of the silliest sentences to translate. Why learn them if they have no purpose? I think there are better, more efficient ways to learn a new language.

The recent update to this app has made things unacceptable. The introduction of a 'hearts' system (when you get 5 things wrong in a row, you can't progress for the rest of the day) is anathema to the process of learning. What's more, I'm relatively sure the developers changed the accepted fields of words for answers smaller (phone is no longer an alternative to 'cell phone', an Americanism used nowhere outside of the United States). This is to push users into buying a subscription. Awful.

Very disappointed with the update to the heart system. It's to slow people down? Then just limit the number of lessons per day instead of hearts, but allow unlimited practice sessions. I'm learning nothing now because it feels like a test and I get too much anxiety with those. Mistakes are NORMAL when learning a new language! Even those who speak a second language for many years still make mistakes. Who cares if people go too fast? Worry about those who don't and use the app appropriately]!]

Please be careful: 
If it is your first time tuning the guitar or instrument, please be careful. We recommend watching a YouTube tutorial or asking a guitar player how it's done. Beginners risk snapping strings with improper tuning techniques.

comments: It was a great app. I had a few different tunings purchased. But now I am unable to restore my purchases. Even the guide on their website that shows how to restore them does not work. -edit- After working with support I have my purchases restored. They ended up having to give me a promo code to restore them. Everything is working great again. I use this to help tune my 2 guitars, bass, and ukelele.
Easy to use. I have a terrible ear so this really helps me stay in tune.

I've used this for a few months now, and it worked just fine until about 3 days ago. It wouldn't listen to me playing any of the strings, even though it was on auto mode. I left a review saying what had happened, and the developer of the app got back in touch within the hour. They asked for me to delete the app, restart my phone, and them reinstall the app. I did so, and all problems are gone. It's back to being the great app it was before, so I'm happy.
It actually tuned my guitar!!! also has loads of fun interactive games that help you learn/master chords

Honestly this app is amazing no ads and pretty on point with tuning your guitar. Also have had no problems so far, and you don't even need to pay for the tuning part. Really recommend this for someone who is just starting out on playing guitar and wants to learn how to tune your guitar. Definitely 5 star! :)

comments: Updated 10/31/20: The app is totally unusable. I uninstalled and reinstalled it, but I can't hit a single button on it. Completely useless. Original Review: Used to work great, but lately it has all kinds of bugs whether it suddenly decides it won't accept my payment method anymore or errors out when I try to place an order. It freezes and often forgets to clear my order bag after I've successfully picked up an order. So many headaches lately, I don't know what went wrong. Ued to love this app.

Constantly buggy and glitches. I've used it successfully but it typically requires constantly uninstalling and reinstalling the app or religiously clearing your cache. The deals screen often says you've already used a deal and have to wait an hour even when you haven't ordered in weeks. Overall, a frustrating experience for something that should be a convenience.

Updated 10/2020: I've done everything including uninstalling and re installing. The app doesn't work at all. love this app when it actually works. More than half of the time, I can't pull anything up on it, or it is frozen and nothing on it will work. "Connectivity issues" is what it stated. Those issues are not with my phone, because i have service and wifi. Please fix!!!! It's pretty hard to use the app while there when I can't even get in to it.

Fantastic app, works every time. Orders being automatically submitted and requiring "reopening" every time I switch apps is annoying but no big deal. One of the best developed fast food pre-order apps. The restaurants, maybe 1.5 star. They must be hiring illiterates, or they glance at the screen and throw in guesses for anything forgotten. The "hot&spicy" chicken patty isn't very spicy going down but DON'T LET IT BACK UP. Seems it turns into the fire of hades in your guts. Omg I cried, no joke.

Well, a couple years later, new phone, different Android version, still freezing on the opening screen. so unreliable (CLEARING CACHE DOES NOTHING!) - your food isn't that great that your app should be so problematic. Business 101 - don't make it difficult for people to do business with you. BK works great EVERY time - BYE!

title: Microsoft Authenticator
description:
Two factor authentication (2FA) is easy, convenient, and secure when you use Microsoft Authenticator. Use your phone, not your password, to log into your Microsoft account. Just enter your username, then approve the notification sent to your phone. Your fingerprint, face ID, or PIN will provide a second layer of security in this two step verification process. After you‚Äôve signed in with two factor authentication (2FA), you‚Äôll have access to all your Microsoft products and services, such as Outlook, OneDrive, Office, and more.

Microsoft Authenticator also supports multi factor authentication (MFA) even if you still use a password, by providing a second layer of security after you type your password. When logging in with two factor authentication (2FA), you‚Äôll enter your password, and then you‚Äôll be asked for an additional way to prove it‚Äôs really you. Either approve the notification sent to the Microsoft Authenticator, or enter the one time password (OTP) generated by the app.‚ÄØThe one time passwords (OTP codes) have a 30 second timer counting down. This timer is so you never have to use the same time based one time password (TOTP) twice and you don‚Äôt have to remember the number. The one time password (OTP) doesn‚Äôt require you to be connected to a network, and it won‚Äôt drain your battery.

You can add multiple accounts to your app, including non-Microsoft accounts like LinkedIn, Github, Amazon, Dropbox, Google, Facebook, and more. Since the app supports the industry standard for time based one time passwords (TOTP), you can secure all your online accounts. Simply enable two factor authentication (2FA) on all your accounts. Then, when you sign in, you‚Äôll provide your username and password as usual. Finally, you‚Äôll enter the one time password (OTP) provided by the Microsoft Authenticator app.

Sometimes your work or school might ask you to install the Microsoft Authenticator when accessing certain files, emails, or apps. You will need to register your device to your organization through the app and add your work or school account. Microsoft Authenticator also supports cert-based authentication by issuing a certificate on your device. This will let your organization know that the sign-in request is coming from a trusted device and help you seamlessly and securely access additional Microsoft apps and services without needing to log into each. Because Microsoft Authenticator supports single sign-on, once you have proven your identity once, you will not need to log in again to other Microsoft apps on your device.

Enroll in our beta program! Follow this link for an early preview of our latest updates: https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.azure.authenticator

recentChanges: To better protect Authenticator, App Lock is now enabled by default if you have a device pattern, PIN, or biometric gesture set up on your device.
comments: This app is awesome if you forget your passwords frequently or want to add an extra layer of security.. The downside is if you change your password and do not have another way to verify your account (send a code to email or phone number) then you're locked out. Make sure your contact preferences are set before linking your account! Also I have noticed the app doesn't link a lot of services; just Facebook, Microsoft, and Google accounts. I'd like to see more accounts able to be linked.

Amazing app, I really appreciate how easy it is to backup your information so when U get a New Phone, it is so much easier to reinstall with all your info. Let me say one thing, without that backup, it is a BE'ATCH to get authentication up‚¨Ü & running again with all your compatible apps! It is very Time Consuming without that Great Backup Feature!!! My only downfall, I am having big problems with PayPal... it is Never the right Code... WHY‚ùì It is driving me insane & it is really a problem for me‚ùó

Does exactly what it's supposed to do. Works perfectly for Microsoft accounts, and is acceptable for others. I can't have all the codes showing at once, which means an extra tap each time I go to use the app, and I'd like to be able to customise icons for accounts to make it easier to spot the one I'm after. Other than minor niggles, I'm good.

I have no choice but to use this app for my organization, but recently it began requiring me to "unlock" the app. I had no idea how to do this so I had to Google for an answer. Turns out you have to use your mobile PIN or biometric to unlock the app. I feel like my phone PIN has been compromised and provided to Microsoft. Unacceptable. Also unacceptable is the usage reporting that is enabled by default that I discovered when turning off this unlock feature. Sorry Microsoft, I do not trust you.

I recommend this application. It is convenient to keep your account security verification code secure. When you login, it ensure that no one will login to your account without your permission. I also love this app more than google authentication. You can backup your info link with your email. It is very good when compare to other authentication app.

title: Digital Secure
description:
Protect your private information from digital threats. 
Digital Secure is a one-stop suite of privacy and security tools for your mobile devices and home computers. Safeguard your internet connection and personal data with antivirus, anti-malware and identity theft protection so you can browse with peace of mind. 

Here‚Äôs what you‚Äôll get with Digital Secure.
You‚Äôll get free security and privacy tools, plus you can get advanced protection for $5/mo per line or $10/mo per account.

1. Security and Privacy
Protect your device from online threats and get around-the-clock peace of mind. 
Get warnings when connecting to an unsecure network, visiting risky websites or attempting dangerous downloads. Plus, you‚Äôll be able to see how installed apps are currently using your personal information.

1. Security and Privacy

Complete Battery Hog. I have to disable the web protection settings or it chews up my battery life in a matter of hours. I have been a subscriber with VERIZON for about 14 yrs. I have been more than satisfied with the cell svc, their products they sell, the support teams, and most of all the protection products they offer. title: Brainly ‚Äì The Homework App
description:
Need homework help? Post homework questions on Brainly and receive help from other students within minutes. Brainly supports:
‚Ä¢ 250M+ unique users monthly
‚Ä¢ Experts providing explanation
‚Ä¢ thousands of moderators
‚Ä¢ 35+ countries
‚Ä¢ 95M+ answered questions
Brainly is the world‚Äôs largest social learning community! 250+ million students trust and study with Brainly every month. Yup, that‚Äôs 250 million study partners to help you with any school subject, such as Math, Science, History, Algebra, English, Foreign Languages and many more. 
‚Ä¢ Free Homework Help - Brainly Basic is 100% free of charge!
‚Ä¢ 24/7 Homework App - Unlimited access, anywhere, anytime.
‚Ä¢ Superfast, Homework Answers and Explanations - Questions are answered within minutes & monitored by moderators.
‚Ä¢ Share Your Knowledge - Earn points and gain ranks by helping other students
No. 1 math app! With Brainly, you can ask homework questions, search for homework answers, practice for exams, essays and research in the following subjects - Math, History, English, Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Social Studies, Advanced Placement AP, Geography, Health, Arts, Business, Computers and Technology, French, German, Spanish, and World Languages! Plus, special sections featuring prep questions for SAT and PSAT exams!
Brainly covers education levels, such as elementary school, middle school, high school and college. Our learning community is reliable - the quality of homework answers and explanations are ensured by a dedicated team of moderators that check all content on a daily basis.
Don‚Äôt forget to check out the reviews. The Brainly app has over 400,000+ 5-Star reviews!
Where else can you find us?

title: Phone Tracker By Number
description:
Phone Tracker by Number app is a robust and accurate GPS tracker that helps you locate your phones and your kids. It is designed to help you find your kids' location by mobile number in a very accurate and fast way. Kids' Phone tracker app enables GPS location tracking between parents and their kids in a private network. Easily add an endless number of your family kids to your network and start tracking.

 Phone Tracker Service : Happily Serving 50 Million users around the world to locate their kids and even lost phones, App is translated to 44 languages. 

Features :

‚úì Totally free for an endless number of users. 

‚úì Get GPS notifications, when one of your kids are nearby.

‚úì  Phone tracker app uses both cell tracking and GPS tracking to optimize battery usage and accuracy of the location.

‚úì Find your lost or stolen phone easily using a family member's registered phone.

‚úì The app works with all mobile network operators.

‚úì You will get an instant notification when your kids move from one location to another. No need to refresh locations to get the latest location updates.

‚úì It pinpoints your kid's exact location and provides navigational help on a map so you can route to their location.

‚úì See the battery charge level of your family kids cell phones in each location.

‚úì  See all your kids as icon on the map that shows the exact address with the battery level for each of them.

‚úì  Keep track of the current location of your own cell phone. Track and log all the visited locations since you installed the app. 

‚úì  No need to ask where is my children, the Phone Tracker app is the location finder that puts this information at your fingertips. It sends you GPS location tracking alerts when your kids are moving along the way. 

Privacy Protection : Your privacy is our top concern, The app requires too few permissions to protect your privacy. The only needed permissions is to perform the main app function about location tracking so no need to access your photos, accounts. 

 How to use it to locate kid's phone 
1. Install the app and register using your phone number
2. Inside the App tap the send invitation button and select any number of your kids.

That's it! Once your child follows the invitation link and accepts the request both of you will be connected to each other in a private network so you can locate them in every location. 

Premium features :-

‚úì You can see the complete location history.

‚úì Locate any time - Get faster location updates by the location refresh button.

‚úì No Ads - Enjoy using the app without any Ads.


This app is not a spying or secret surveillance solution and the app can not be installed remotely or secretly. To join this service the user has to install the app himself and he has to accept the location sharing request. The user can stop tracking at any time by a single tap.

We love to hear from customers. If you have an issue or suggestion, please send an email to: support@onelocator.com

Didn't pull up nothing right. Looked up a phone number wrong name with the number. Wrong address, wrong name. Everything was wrong. Suppose to have a 21 day Free trial but everytime I look up a number or email it charge me 0.50 when it should be free. This app is no good. Give it all 0 on all levels. 4.5 is a lie should be 0.0

This app is horrible. Worse than useless really. It hardly ever updates phone locations, we're not talking a couple of hours behind but a couple of DAYS behind. Completely worthless. Even when I close app and restart it, it still won't update the locations. If you ever really needed to know where someone was this would be NO help! Don't waste your time or storage space on this app! The developers response is not true. EVERY phone we had this on had this issue!

This app was great to start off with but after a few weeks it stopped working. I still have my son's location for 4 days ago, despite refreshing numerous times. I've found the only way to get it working again is to uninstall and re-install. Not ideal. I downloaded this app so I could make sure my son was safe on his way to and from school.

title: Pandora - Streaming Music, Radio & Podcasts
description:
Listen to songs hand-picked by some of the top athletes in the world on UNINTERRUPTED Radio. Their music, their vibes, their channel.

Pandora gives you a personalized listening experience that continually evolves with your tastes. 

Create stations from your favorite songs, artists or genres, search or browse to find recommended stations for your mood or activity, and discover podcasts that speak to you. Download today and get instant access to your favorite artists and podcasts, while staying up to date on the most recent singles and releases. From rap and pop to rock and country, play your favorite artists and stay up to date on today‚Äôs top hits and releases. Start streaming all of the current global hits and enjoy your own personalized music experience. 

Take Pandora with you wherever you go with Android Auto for your daily commute or your next road trip. Enjoy your own personalized music or podcast experience from anywhere on the world‚Äôs most powerful music discovery platform. The new voice mode lets you search, play, pause, skip adjust volume & thumb up music with a simple voice command. Start streaming your favorite artist, song, genre, or podcast instantly today for free in your car.

With Podcasts on Pandora, find your favorites and listen to personalized recommendations that actually make sense. Just search on your mobile phone or tablet and play to start listening, then tap + to add to your collection. Find something new by simply browse and tap recommended podcasts to find over 1,400 podcasts, including SiriusXM shows, on-demand whether you're on Pandora Premium, Plus or Radio.

Looking for more?

Meet Pandora Modes - The new way to customize your station experience. Choose from six different modes to switch up the kind of music you're hearing:
‚Ä¢My Station: The station experience you know and love.
‚Ä¢Crowd Faves: Hear the most üëçsongs by other listeners.
‚Ä¢Deep Cuts: Hear less familiar songs from station artists.
‚Ä¢Discovery: Hear more artists who don't usually play on this station.
‚Ä¢Newly Released: Hear the newest releases from station artists.
‚Ä¢Artist Only: Hear songs from the station artist.

Pandora Premium‚Ñ¢
Subscribe to enjoy personalized on-demand music and podcasts

‚Ä¢ Search and play your favorite songs, podcasts, albums and playlists on-demand
‚Ä¢ Create playlists, not worklists ‚Äì on your own or powered by Pandora
‚Ä¢ Download the music you want for offline listening
‚Ä¢ Unlimited skips and replays
‚Ä¢ Higher quality audio
‚Ä¢ Listen with ad-free music

Pandora Plus‚Ñ¢
Subscribe to enjoy personalized radio with ad-free music

‚Ä¢ Unlimited personalized stations and podcasts
‚Ä¢ Up to four stations for offline listening
‚Ä¢ Unlimited skips and replays
‚Ä¢ Higher quality audio
‚Ä¢ Listen with ad-free music

Pandora Plus subscriptions are $4.99 per month. Pandora Premium subscriptions are $9.99 per month. You‚Äôll be charged as a recurring transaction through your Google Play account. Pending trial eligibility, charges for Plus >($4.99/month) or Premium ($9.99/month) begin at the end of a free trial unless you cancel 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription month. Any unused portion of a free Pandora Plus trial period will be forfeited if you upgrade to Pandora Premium. You can manage your subscription, cancel or turn off auto-renewal through Account Settings in your Google Play account. Pandora is available to US customers only.

Some advertising exclusions apply. Skips, replays and offline features may be limited by certain licensing restrictions. Pandora may use large amounts of data, and carrier data charges may apply. For best results, we recommend you connect your device to trusted Wi-Fi networks when available.

Terms and conditions:
www.pandora.com/legal
www.pandora.com/legal/subscription
www.pandora.com/privacy

‚Ä¢ Dark Mode is now available to users with Android 10 or greater and Samsung users with devices supporting Night Mode! Switch to Dark Mode to lower the brightness of your interface so you can focus on your music, not the screen.

‚Ä¢ Offline Podcasts are now available to Plus and Premium subscribers! Take your favorite episodes and series with you wherever you go, even without internet.
comments: Ive been using Pandora for three years, and lately I've been having issues. Whenever I choose a specific song on my playlist it doesnt play it and ends up playing a different song on my playlist. I updated it and everything, and it still hasnt been fixed. I have no idea if it is a bug, but it needs to be fixed asap.

I've had continuous problems with pandora since I got it. I download songs and playlists, then when I try to play them, it says I haven't downloaded them. It never wants to open unless it has an internet connection, even though all I ever listen to is my playlists in offline mode unless I am actively searching for new music. And now today, with no warning or reason WHATSOEVER, it has erased ALL my music and playlists!!!!! My advice is don't waste your money.

I use it just about every day. The app will automatically close if I pause a song for 1 min to do something on my phone. The app will close and I have to restart it and the playlist. super annoying. I've un-installed and re-installed it, and that helped the crashes that everyone, including myself, used to have. It didn't help the pause and automatically closing issues...I've checked my phone settings on my old Samsung10 5g and they're cool...it is the app that is the issue.

I've been a Pandora subscriber for several years now. I love no ads. Since Last update, Pandora just stops working and closes. I thought it was my phone. Then I changed phones, for other reasons. Still plays for about 15 minutes before having to reopen the app. I hope that bug can be fixed. I have to see all that work fine tuning my stations be all for naught.

Used to work great but now it will shuffle through all songs without playing them , the songs will pop up then the next one will pop up while no music is heard or can be played. I've uninstalled multiple times and can't figure out the issue. I want my refund back because I can't use the app or listen to the song I want

title: Vocalyx
description:
VOCALYX is a powerful, but easy to use, Augmentative and Alternative
Communication (AAC) tool that utilizes pictograms, photos, and text to allow its users,
suffering from various speech difficulties, to easily communicate with those around them and
to make daily progress on their path of speech rehabilitation.
 
VOCALYX can be used for both children and adults who suffer from the loss of
communication or language. It is completely malleable, and it addresses all levels of
memory, knowledge, comprehension, reading, and writing.  From a child stricken with
low-functioning autism, to a senior citizen who has had a stroke and now suffers from
aphasia, to someone who has had a tracheotomy or laryngectomy, to someone suffering
from MS, Cerebral Palsy, Lou Gehrig‚Äôs Disease, brain trauma or legions, or to a person with
deafness or muteness who wants a convenient way to communicate with people who don‚Äôt
know sign language, VOCALYX can be a life changing tool to those who need it.
 
In short, VOCALYX can compensate for three types of speech problems: vocalization
(for example in the case of throat cancer), language (as is the case for aphasics), and
communication (in the case of autism). The principle is simple: you click on an image (a
photo, pictogram, or text box) within a premade or personalized keyboard, and VOCALYX
says the message for you through the use of voice synthesis, or with the recorded voice
of either the user or someone close to him/her.
 
The parameters are 100% customizable to meet the needs of all our individual users. This
includes: the size and number of buttons displayed, the length of button presses (useful
for people who tremble because of Parkinson‚Äôs, Lou Gehrig‚Äôs, or MS for example), the
synthetic voice (age, gender, speed), and there are several different forms of visual
communication.
 
There are keyboards made up of pictograms, photos, and prewritten phrases, as well as
ABCD and QWERTY keyboards. When using the pictogram and photo keyboards, you have
the option of either using the images we have already provided and organized, uploading
your own personal images, or searching through photo and pictogram databases, like
ARASAAC, MAKATON, or PECS, and downloading a wide selection of images.
 
An internet connection is not required to use VOCALYX, except during the registration
and the initial set up. It is usable in all situations and any normal place one would go on a
daily basis. Take advantage of the free trial and discover how much this AAC tool can help
you or someone you love!  When the free trial is over, you can buy VOCALYX per number of
clicks, or as a 1-time final purchase.
 
VOCALYX Features Summary List:
‚Äî Free trial available!
‚Äî Pay by number of clicks or as a 1-time final purchase
‚Äî Fully mobile, VOCALYX can be used anywhere
‚Äî Adaptable to all needs

‚Äî Rehabilitation tool with a speech therapy team
‚Äî Adaptable synthetic voice (age, gender, speed of speech)
‚Äî Record personalized voice messages
‚Äî Use personal photos or choose from photos and pictograms offered through the app
‚Äî 1000 pre-programmed messages for helping communication
‚Äî 800 images and 1200 pictograms available to meet individual needs
‚Äî Create your own messages
‚Äî QWERTY keyboard with word predict
‚Äî An unlimited number of personalized messages
‚Äî Combine the use of photos, pictograms, and phrases to send texts/SMS or emails
‚Äî Display settings are customizable (button size, number of images shown on each page)
‚Äî Share your exercises with your speech therapist

title: APUS Message Center‚ÄîIntelligent management
description:
APUS Message Center is one of the best free unified messenger app for android. It helps unify and manage all messages from SMS, WhatsApp, Gmail and 3rd party apps. It includes message management, notification mamagement, contact manager, dialer and call log. It will completely bring you a fuss-free experience. 

You can not only manage all kinds of messages (SMS, WhatsApp, Gmail, Yahoo mail, and 3rd party apps), but also find your contacts easily and make a phone call or view your call log in the new APUS Message Center. You only need this one application to grasp all the necessary functions. 

If you are always jumping between SMS, WhatsAppp, Facebook Messenger, etc. Please try APUS Message Center right now! APUS Message Center brings you a more intelligent, easier and smarter experience. 

Key FeaturesÔºö


‚ñ∑Message Management (Support Dual SIM) 

APUS Message Center provides not only free text service such as SMS, WhatsApp, Facebook and instant messages but also email apps such as Gmail. APUS Message Center fully supports dual SIM devices for SMS, so you won‚Äôt miss any important messages. And it is also easy to search for contacts and message texts from dual SIM card. 

‚ñ∑Contact Manager

In APUS Message Center, you can find one contact‚Äôs multiple social information and connect with them by dragging to the app you want. Eg. SMS, Dialer, Line, WeChat, WhatsApp, Telegram, Viber, etc. 
‚ñ∑Notification Management 

APUS Message Center also provides notification manager.It will clean your unimprortant notifications from your notification bar and help you get rid of messy notifications. 

‚ñ∑Phone Calling

After you check a missed call or chatting with someone, you can directly make a phone call and view your call log in APUS Message Center. 

‚ñ∑Group Messaging

Tired for your orderless notification bar? Try APUS Message Center now, you can check any notification (Gmail, WeChat, WhatsApp, Skype, Facebook messenger, instant messaging, etc ) you want by using APUS Message Center. It will always organize your important messages so that you can read more simply and conveniently find all notifications at one stop any time. 

‚ñ∑Quick Reply

When there is a new message from SMS or WhatsApp, a message bubble will pop up to remind you to view the notification. Then you can read and reply messages of SMS and WhatsApp from pop-up notification bubble, without exiting the current app, and quick reply the message directly. 

‚ñ∑Regular Reminder for Messages 

Notification bar will push so many notifications everyday, what if you miss some important messages? Don‚Äôt worry, APUS Message Center always reminds you about the messages from these app: Messages, Call, WeChat, Gmail,  WhatsApp, Facebook messenger, Twitter, Snapchat, Skype,  Tinder and so on. 

You‚Äôll never miss important calls or unread messages (SMS, Gmail, Yahoo mail, social media apps notification)! 

‚ñ∑Easy Search

Within just one second, you can find notifications, Messages, SMS, Contacts, Calls, email (such as Yahoo mail and Gmail) without fuss by entering keywords. All messages and contacts are collected in one app. 

APUS Message Center is an intelligent, simple, easy and fast messenger and message management tool for android, comes with collecting all messages, such as SMS and 3rd party apps messages. You can enjoy contact manager, phone calling, regular notifications, dual sim support, quick reply, group messages. 

The conversation apps currently supported by APUS Message Center include but not limited: WhatsApp, Hike, Facebook, Facebook Messenger, Gmail, Yahoo Mail, Instagram, Twitter, Snapchat, Wechat, QQ, Skype, LinkedIn, Imo, Kakao, VK, Tinder, Yandex mail, Hangouts and more. 

Contact usÔºö
- Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/APUSGROUP
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/apusgroup
- Mail: apusmsgcenter@gmail.com
- Official website: http://www.apusapps.com

title: Zillow: Find Houses for Sale & Apartments for Rent
description:
Take control of your next move with the Zillow app. Our best-in-class features help you unlock life‚Äôs next chapter by getting into a home you love. 

BUY A HOME ‚Äì Find your place with immersive photos, virtual tours, and the most listings, including things you won‚Äôt find anywhere else.

SELL A HOME ‚Äì Whether you sell directly to Zillow with Zillow Offers‚Ñ¢ or take a traditional approach, we‚Äôll help you navigate the path to a successful sale.

RENT A HOME ‚Äì From shopping on the largest rental network to automating applications, we‚Äôve created a seamless online experience for renters.

The Zillow app gives you resources and tools you won‚Äôt find anywhere else, so you can shop smarter for your next home:

‚Ä¢ The most listings and constant updates so you never miss out¬π
‚Ä¢ 3D Home Tours so you can picture yourself in a home and narrow down which houses to visit in person 
‚Ä¢ Self Tour for Zillow-owned homes, with no appointment and no pressure. Stop by when it‚Äôs convenient and unlock the door with the app
‚Ä¢ Zestimate¬Æ, the industry-leading independent home valuation tool, calculated daily
‚Ä¢ Robust filters for school districts, views, pricing, pets, HOAs, and more
‚Ä¢ Easier co-shopping: Tag your favorite home features and share your favorites to coordinate your search with a partner or roommate
‚Ä¢ Push notifications to let you know when houses come to market, have a sale pending, or drop in price 
‚Ä¢ Neighborhood details including restaurants, grocery stores, parks, and coffee shops
‚Ä¢ Easy access to Zillow Premier Agents, local real estate experts who meet Zillow‚Äôs bar for quality customer service
‚Ä¢ All the pricing and details you need to compare homes & apartments for rent 
‚Ä¢ A personal renter profile so you can visit a house rental and engage directly with potential landlords and property managers who rent homes

1. Most listing based on direct site comparisons

summary: Buy Homes, Rent Apartments & Sell Real Estate: Open Houses & Homes for Rent
recentChanges: We are always working hard to improve our apps. This is a small update to fix a few bugs. Please continue to send your feedback to androidfeedback@zillow.com. We appreciate it.
comments: Its ok. Its best for home window shopping. If you're seriously looking, it's less convenient. It assumes how much you're going to put down and what interest rate you've been approved for. There's no way to set those things so it gives you a more accurate idea of what you're paying each month. Plus, in my area theres a lot of 55+ communities and theres no way to filter those out, which is irritating.

I like this app, overall, but would really love to have the ability to hide or dismiss a property from my search, if it's not one that meets my needs. I like that I can save homes, but when searching later, homes keep popping up that I would rather not look at again! Also, if there is a way to get HOA/Space rent to be mandatory when there is one for the property, that would be great. I've looked at many that stated there was none, but that wasn't true. Thanks!

Zillow gave the option to turn off cookies, but did not bother to mention that it will erase all of your data when you do this. I went ahead and typed everything in once again, and it erased it AGAIN. Also, you can't add photos, videos, or tours with any Android phone -only i0s I want to know what kind of incentive apple is giving developers to leave these flaws in their designs..

I use this app almost daily, it keeps me up to date on homes that I am very interested in. We will be buying or building in the next 5 months, we are looking forward to building or buying our dream home. I love Zillow, I have found it to be more up to date than a Real Estate office. I highly recommend Zillow. Thank you, carolintallahassee

While the interface is the best I've seen out of all the other real estate options, the information is not accurate or up to date. If you try to get information from the listing agent on the app, a third party starts messaging you and sending your information to unrelated agents. I simply messaged asking about an open house and some random dude was trying to get me a new buyer's agent even though I already have one.

title: Secrets: Game of Choices
description:
Choose your own story! Discover Secrets in romance, fantasy, drama in thrilling stories, where you can make your decisions and change the development of the story. In this simulation game, you can date a vampire prince, meet teen friends in high school, flirt with a college teacher or even chase super-hot criminals with your choices. Read original stories, control the drama, your appearance and decide what dress to wear! 

Now start your own story, customize your character and build relationships with all the characters in the narrative!
-	Customize your main character. Choose outfits to dress up in. Become a fashionista!
-	Fall in love, have a summer crush, fight the enemies, and embark on wonderful romance adventures.
-	Discover new stories and episodes every week!
-	You‚Äôll be hooked deciding what happens next, discover amazing visual storytelling!

COLLEGE DESIRES ‚Äì Play the role of a young adult girl in this college romance story! Get ready to meet cute girls, attractive guys, and hot teachers! Be ready to face your choices as your story unfolds! LGBTQ friendly story!

SUMMER LOVE ‚Äì Join the world-famous reality show Summer Love in this exciting real-life story! Don't be fooled by the luxury resort and its wonderful beach: Summer Love is not all about love and fashion, it's also about tough challenges and decisions to make!

THE HAUNTED HOTEL ‚Äì You've been invited to a party with your friends. The manager comes to greet you, but you know there's something wrong with the place! Get ready to get goosebumps and tons of fun in this horror-comedy story!

BROKEN SOULS ‚Äì Experience the most romantic and sexy story in the flesh of a young gay teenager and discover love in this LGBTQ story! Spend a lovely weekend outside with your best friend, and your potential love interest!

MY PERFECT MISTAKE - A terrible mistake on a Friday night will change your life forever. Your relationship with your high school boyfriend will be threatened by new romances, and... A BABY!?

Make the right choice, fall in love, make your decisions and discover unique secrets in this innovative and fun-to-play story-based game for boys and girls! Free to play!

New books and chapters EVERY WEEK!

comments: Very interactive stories app, with great storytelling and artwork. My one issue is that it is hard to save up diamonds to do the premium choices and scenes. I understand that app developers want money, but not everyone can afford to put money out on a game. That being said, I do enjoy playing the app and reading the stories.

Honestly this game is really fun and addicting. The biggest downside would be just how expensive everything is. It's weird that you have to use gems for outfits the he apparently bought for you. You have to use diomands to flirt, have sex, go on a date; pretty much anything to make the storyline interesting will cost you diamonds, a lot of diomands!

The game is fascinating I like it so much. But there is one problem that's making me to hate it.The app keeps on clashing when I open it. I've updated the app today & I've not played since morning bcoz of the problem I've spoken of . So plz help me fix it up so that I can at least play it tomorrow or the day after plz! Plz! Fix it up I don't want to end up deleting the app

I would like to complain that I cant get to read Painted Soldiers (a romantic story). I have used the key to unlock but it take time to download the content. Since I'm using my house WiFi and it's speed but from today it has problems. If I try to read other stories then there is no problem but with this story only consume my time as it took more than 30 minutes but still it never download the content.

I understand the world is just slowly starting to develop an open mind. But man I love this app because it's hard to find interactive stories that are LGBTQ friendly or in my case Lesbian friendly. Thank you for this. 5 stars, although I do wish that you made the stories be more friendly to your choices because I feel like your choices don't matter in here almost at all, but needless to say they are very touching :)

title: Star Trek‚Ñ¢ Fleet Command
description:
You have the conn! Summon your skills in strategy, combat, diplomacy, and leadership to master the dangerous universe of Star Trek Fleet Command.

Star Trek Fleet Command expands its universe with brand new Star Trek: Discovery IP!

Enter a galaxy on the brink of war as Federation, Klingon, and Romulan forces vie for control of the Alpha and Beta quadrants. Discover an ancient secret that could tip the scales of power forever.

As the commander of a starbase on the edge of civilized space, you will recruit iconic officers like James T. Kirk, Spock, and Nero -- and build powerful ships including the Enterprise, the Romulan Warbird, and Klingon Bird of Prey.

Join Millions of players -- forge alliances, defeat your enemies, and build an epic fleet to secure, or dominate, the galaxy.

Explore strange new worlds, seek out new life and new civilizations, boldly go where no one has gone before!
Create or join powerful alliances to dominate star systems and build the most powerful empire in the galaxy.

Be prepared to:
- Experience epic conflict in a vast, dynamic galaxy
- Collect, build, and upgrade iconic ships 
- Encounter famous Star Trek‚Ñ¢ characters in an epic, galaxy-spanning storyline
- Help locals, fight pirates, or negotiate peace in hundreds of unique missions
- Recruit famous officers with unique, tactical abilities
- Compete in faction wars &  Lead your Starfleet to Glory 
- Ally yourself with Federation, Klingon, or Romulan forces as they clash among the stars
- War is on the rise - Occupy enemies worlds and prepare for new galaxy order
- Work with and against thousands of other players in real-time
- Build, upgrade, and defend your star base
- Defeat your enemies in epic star wars & battles
- Discover new technologies, ship upgrades, and resources
- Take command of your fleet and conquer the universe

Key Features:
- An open world, strategy MMO Game
- Mobile Free to play
- Stunning graphics
- Iconic Star Trek‚Ñ¢ characters, ships and tech
- Fierce battles with players all over the world
- A New, immersive Star Trek‚Ñ¢ story in the Kelvin Timeline

Download Star Trek - Fleet Command today and join Millions all over the world.

‚Ä¢ Introducing Summoning! Summon your ships with the USS Discovery and instantly warp around the Galaxy!

comments: Terribly pay to win. Everything about this game is unbalanced. And it's daily missions aren't a quick couple minutes here and there to complete they take hours. This developer needs to learn the place of this style of game, its not one that you should be expected to sit down and play for hours a day, rather a few minutes here and there.

I was really enjoying this game however there are a large number of issues. Once you get to level 18+ everything takes to long to upgrade. Parts needed to upgrade ships start to get to high and it becomes boring doing the same daily missions to acquire the parts. All the missions I currently have in progress I'm unable to go further with as I need to upgrade ships to the right power. Can only purchase one pack then it's removed and replaced with a more expensive option

The game, and especially its publisher, sucks. In no case do not install the game to get reward in another game, because the promise of a high reward just a lure. Publisher just increase install base in such manner. The game itself has no originality in terms of gameplay and aimed at the donation, the donation and once again the donation. In my case for reaching level 15 was just an excuses from support you have not completed the task, you are free to walk .. (ticket #8682186 from ironsource)

Be aware that if you play this game it is set up to be pay to win. You can do ok till about level 30 - 32 then it is so difficult to upgrade anything with out buying expensive packages in the store. ($20-$100) The game has no power balance so your at the mercy of anyone more powerful than you. There is no addressing griefers as they spend the most on the game so it grows difficult to advance or do events at times being constantly attacked by ships you can't damage at all. Just don't bother.

Downgraded my review. I have been playing since June of 2019 and this game is definitely a pay-to-win game. The mechanics of the game are pretty easy one you get the hang of it, but you will never get a way without paying $$$$...it's not even that there are micro transactions, it's that they cost $50, $100, and one or two $20 thrown in there. Clearly the developers are making bank as they are large number of players who are level 30 and higher with super strong ships that can be got thu paying.

comments: The game was amazing. But when I hit level 12 it did not let me go to the next level. I played level 12 about 5 times. It only let me play levels 1-12. Then it said that I have to rate the game. When I rated the game, I went to the game to play again. But it said I have to rate but I already did. So I deleted the review and decided to write a really mean review. IF YOU WILL REGET IT. PLEASE DO NOT GET THE GAME.

At first this game was really fun, but then when i finished level 12 it asked me to rate it and there was no "later" option as there usually is so i rated the game and when i got back to the game to continue playing, i had to do the level all over again, so i did, and then the same thing happened after i finished the level for the second time. I am so angry. Defenitly deleting the game.

I love this game. Because of quarantine I have a lot of free time and this game helps m kill that time. I love that the ads are somewhat limited. The only thing I don't like is that is makes you watch an ad when you got the help buttun. Would definitely recommend üòâ

Really good game. Excellent puzzles to solve 'em swiftly. So many details, so many colors and numbers. That's fine. Grafphic is 4/5, can be better, but that's ok. It is really funny to solve so many puzzles. But actually, there' re too less rooms, only 12. Am waiting for the next upd.

This is game is fun! Why? -because you can use your minds to solve many things and can play this game offline! What do you learn from it? -you learn many ways on life basics especially on how to do something or try to escape something. You learn many things and also this game helps you revise on what you do at school like knowing the numbers on the clock or auditioning number combinations you unlock this draw! You must download this app !

title: Call me a Legend - Game of Battle & Love
description:
Playboy x Call Me A Legend

12 beautiful Playmates are trapped in the zombie world. Rescue all the Playmates before they are gone!  
Time is limited for all legends to finish the rescue-missions and set them free from the zombies. They promise to thank you and you won't be disappointed.
Meet the Playmates of the month including Gia, Audrey, Raquel, Stephanie, Sophie, Monica....etc, they are waiting for you to rescue them. 

Call me a Legend is a free RPG game simulation with plenty of love affairs and politics! Become a Legend in the game, which enables you to get rich and gain power! But beware of zombies, because they are lurking behind every corner!

Main features:
‚úî Love affairs - Increase intimacy with girls by dating them and giving them gifts. Become a Legend among girls!
‚úî Raising a family - Take care of your wife and she will take care of your life and your children. Groom your heirs!
‚úî Political games - Get rich and powerful!
‚úî Forge Alliances - Recruit heroes which will help you defeat the zombies! 
‚úî Develop the camp and upgrade your heroes to make them stronger. Be the top of the legend!
‚úî Go on Quests - send expeditions to explore new territories and find more survivors.
‚úî Chat online with other players - exchange your experiences! Who is the Legend at the end?
‚úî Set the record - We challenge you to try to become the best-ranked player on our worldwide ranking list! Are you the Legend?

Play Call me a Legend for FREE now! Get Rich, Gain Power Now!

¬© 2020 Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. Playboy and the Rabbit Head Design are trademarks of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. and used under license by Empire Studios Inc.

comments: Downloaded the game to see what it was about. Waiting for it to load which was exceptionally long load time, only to get to the main background screen and nothing else. Nothing to click on to proceed any further. Just the main screen. Read the reviews for the gane and seems to me like the devs for this gane arent sure what they are doing. Waste of time.

Very challenging game. Excellent girls, can build soldiers to whatever strength you want according to your resources. Would recommend this game if your diligent. The bad, it's a little glitchy, have had 2 uninstall and reinstall several times this last week in order for the game to load. Also likes to disconnect from the server, occasionally it won't reconnect. Once required a reinstall. Fortunately no game play was lost and no penalties. Kudos to the DEVS for the mini game and variety.

The is a good game but it sucks that you have to collect 800 puzzle pieces for most girls and sucks that the girls never get put in the rotation, so I have alot of puzzle pieces and never get the chance to get them, unless they start putting back into rotation then I'm going to delete the game

Beware, extremely low probabilities and undisclosed gacha odds. Did over 150+ searches and did not gain a single point in progression towards a character. Needs more work and bug fixes. Half of the content says "Coming Soon," and even a screen still shows as "Beta testing." Servers are pretty much dead, no social aspect and lacks co-cop related content. Also don't like that some events run at 4am in the morning and only last 2 hours.

Fun enough game if you're patient. The beauties are ridiculous but entertaining and at least they aren't Anime style. There's enough to do to keep you coming back and figure out. Like that if you miss out on something it will come around again in a few months. PTP helps but you don't need to if you're patient and don't mind grinding it out.

title: Google Photos
description:
Google Photos is the home for all your photos and videos, automatically organized and easy to share.

      - ‚ÄúThe best photo product on Earth‚Äù ‚Äì The Verge

      - ‚ÄúGoogle Photos is your new essential picture app‚Äù ‚Äì Wired



    The official Google Photos app is made for the way you take photos today and includes essential features like shared albums, automatic creations and an advanced editing suite. You won‚Äôt have to worry about storage either as you can choose to automatically back up all your photos and videos for free in high quality. You can then access them from any connected device and on photos.google.com.



    With the official app, you get:



    FREE HIGH QUALITY STORAGE: Back up unlimited photos and videos for free for up to 16 megapixels and 1080p HD and access them from any device and photos.google.com ‚Äì your photos are safe, secure, and private to you.



    FREE UP SPACE: Never worry about running out of space on your phone again. Photos that are safely backed up can be removed from your device's storage in just a tap.



    SMART AUTOMATIC ALBUMS: Automatically get a new album with just your best shots after an event or trip, then invite others to add their photos.



    AUTOMATIC CREATIONS: Bring photos to life with automatically created movies, collages, animations, panoramas, and more from your photos. Or easily create them yourself.



    ADVANCED EDITING SUITE: Transform photos with a tap. Use intuitive and powerful photo editing tools to apply content-aware filters, adjust lighting, and more.



    SHARING SUGGESTIONS: With smart sharing suggestions, giving your friends the photos you took of them is painless. And they can add their photos, too, so you‚Äôll finally get the photos you‚Äôre actually in.



    FAST AND POWERFUL SEARCH: Your photos are now searchable by the people, places and things in them ‚Äî no tagging required.



    LIVE ALBUMS: Select the people and pets you want to see and Google Photos will automatically add photos of them as you take them, no manual updates needed.*



    PHOTO BOOKS: Create a photo book in just minutes from your phone or computer. You can also see suggested photo books based on your best shots from a trip or period of time.*



    GOOGLE LENS: Search the hard-to-describe and get stuff done, right from a photo. Copy and translate text, identify plants and animals, add events to your calendar, find products online, and more.



    SEND PHOTOS IN SECONDS: Instantly share photos with any contact, email, or phone number.



    SHARED LIBRARIES: Grant a trusted person access to all of your photos.



    You can also upgrade storage for your Google Account, used for Original Quality photos and videos by subscribing to Google One. Subscriptions start at $1.99/month for 100 GB in the US. Pricing and availability can vary by region.

      - Google One Terms of Service: https://one.google.com/terms-of-service

      - One Google Pricing: https://one.google.com/about



    For additional help visit https://support.google.com/photos



    *Face grouping, live albums and photo books are not available in all countries.

comments: It is very good, there is good editing in it, it is available for free in everyone's phone and it also looks good editing the normal photo, but it really takes backup so I liked it This is a gallery, it is very good to save photos and it also has edits, it really keeps updating, so keep updating it, then you get to see new features and I like it too That is why I did not force stop it and I am using it, I would give it 5 stars but due to the lack of any more good features, I will start it only 3

I really can't say that I love the way this app works. It's not at all intutitive. There's such a disconnect between my sd card and my photos on my phone when I'm in the photos app.. I don't really get why this has to be so difficult? It'd be nice if every pic or video the phone has access to (on device or on sd card or in other apps, etc) would just come up when I go into the photos or gallery app. It's like a mystery I have to solve any time I'm trying to work with this app! Thx.

This update is the absolute worst. No longer are the folders small, easy to navigate single pics, but now the first dozen photos from each folder, filling the entire screen, with a tiny label... I can't just tap a pic to open the folder, now I have to scroll through pages to find the folder I'm looking for - plus, other than "camera," everytime I open "Photos," the folders are going n random order - and there's no way to alter or customize the view. Thanks for making garbage! üëç

mostly positive. i like that it keeps my photos on the cloud and that i can use google apps to switch info from phone to phone. but my pixel 3 had an issue with this app where it restarted randomly as i was backing a LOT of stuff up to the cloud and about a 3rd of the photos were corrupted when it started back up again, even on the cloud, even on my phone. also, it says in the description of the app that you can upload unlimited photos and videos for free but you really only get 15 gb

Good. But we need an option where you can manually set some photos to be saved in full resolution and the rest in high quality (free tier). So that the pictures that the user don't want it compressed can be availed in full resolution but the other pictures can be compressed and saved in free tier without using up the GBs allocated to and account. Right now the entire gallery gets uploaded on full resolution, when you change the mode.

title: Microsoft OneNote: Save Ideas and Organize Notes
description:
Organize your thoughts, discoveries, and ideas and simplify planning important moments in your life with your digital notepad. Microsoft OneNote lets you take notes on your phone and sync them across all your devices.

With OneNote, you can plan a big event, seize a moment of inspiration to create something new, and track your list of errands that are too important to forget. Take notes, write memos and make a digital sketchbook right on your phone. Capture pictures and add images to your notes.

Sync notes across your devices to access them anytime, anywhere. Save ideas and check your list at home, in the office, or on the go across your devices. Search your notes quickly and effortlessly.

Take notes, share ideas, organize and collaborate when you download Microsoft OneNote today. 

Capture Content And Get Organized
‚Ä¢ Write notes, draw and clip things from the web to get your thoughts down into your notebook.
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote‚Äôs flexible canvas to place content anywhere you want.
‚Ä¢ Scan documents and business cards straight into OneNote.
‚Ä¢ Save pictures and images to your notes.

Take Notes And Achieve More
‚Ä¢ OneNote is a digital notebook that brings 3-ring binders to the digital era. 
‚Ä¢ Organize notes with sections and pages to separate thoughts by theme at school, home or work.
‚Ä¢ Organize your notes using to-do lists, follow up items, marks for what‚Äôs important and custom labels.
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote as a notebook, journal or a notepad.

Save Ideas At The Speed of Light
‚Ä¢ OneNote syncs your notes across all devices and lets multiple people work on the content together, at the same time.
‚Ä¢ Use the notepad to list your thoughts down whenever something crosses your mind.
‚Ä¢ Notepad badge hovers on screen and lets you quickly write your thoughts down any time.
‚Ä¢ Sticky notes are helpful for quick memos.

Collaborate and Share Notes
‚Ä¢ Take meeting notes, brainstorm projects, draw attention to important points and organize key resources.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate in real time to stay in sync and on the same page.
‚Ä¢ Take notes and save ideas across your favorite devices, no matter what device your team likes to use.
‚Ä¢ Take notes during classes or meetings, mixing in text, voice, ink and web clippings.
‚Ä¢ Search your notes with a fast and powerful search function

Better Together With Microsoft Office
‚Ä¢ OneNote is part of the Office family and works great with your favorite apps, such as Excel or Word, to help you do more.

Write notes, save ideas and keep up with your to-do list with Microsoft OneNote.

You can find answers to frequently asked questions about OneNote for Android at http://aka.ms/OnenoteAndroidFAQ

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Requires Android OS 5.0 or later.
‚Ä¢ A free Microsoft account is required to use OneNote.
‚Ä¢ OneNote opens existing notebooks created in Microsoft OneNote 2010 format or later.
‚Ä¢ To sync your notes to OneDrive for Business, sign in with your organization‚Äôs Office 365 or SharePoint account.

This app is provided either by Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft‚Äôs End User License Agreement (EULA) for Terms of Service for OneNote on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://support.office.com/legal?llcc=en-us&aid=OneNoteForAndroidLicenseTerms.htm. Microsoft‚Äôs privacy statement is available at https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/privacystatement

comments: UPDATE: Issue has been fixed. Full functionality restored. OLD: Ever since the update (10/5/20), I'm unable to add anything to my notes. When I click on the page the app restarts. I uninstalled/reinstalled the app with the same results. I need this to function as I use it to take notes in meetings. This is installed on a Chromebook running the most recent OS.

Recent update fixed issues I was having with trying to type, but then OneNote would close. Only giving 4 stars as I would love to be able to have some keyboard shortcut functions available since I am using a Pixel Chrome Tablet as if it were a PC. Otherwise, I love using OneNote.

I've wanted to take digital notes for a while, but I havn't been able to find an app that was efficient. This is the first app that has worked for me, and I absolutley love it. The color choices are awesome, and I love the ability to type, draw, insert pictures, and so much more. I would 10/10 recomend this to every android user.

The major problems I've been facing while using OneNote on my Samsung Tablet are - 1. Closing a notebook takes a lot of time. 2. There is no way of knowing how much is synced and how much is not. 3. Syncing takes a lot of time too. 4. They have given a provision of deleting a notebook from OneDrive, but it doesn't really go away from OneNote after deleting. 5. It doesn't work when the device is connected to Internet. It keeps lagging and sometimes even crashes.

Best Note App Ever. It sync to most of my devices. So I do not need my specific device to retrieve all my notes. It works even better with paste it notes. So handy for short reminder. I do online recording video and OneNote sync well with my phone and desktop. So I don't even need to buy additional USB writing pad. My Note8 and now Note10 will do the trick! Highly recommended for those taking a lot of notes and also using Windows to sync 'among' devices. My phone, laptop and desktop!

title: PENUP - Share your drawings
description:
PENUP is a creative SNS based on Pen generated images. Share your imagination with global creative minds. 

[Main Features]
- Drawing: Anyone could draw easily and comfortably 
- Coloring: You can do coloring on various beautiful sketches 
- Live Drawing: Foster your drawing skill set by following along the drawing video 
- Photo Drawing: Draw by using photos
- Challenge: Challenge yourself with new topics
- Popular: Enjoy some real-time popular artworks and share your own drawings
- Drawing Comment: Express through drawings in fun manner and interact with one another


-------------------------------------------------Regarding the App Access Privilege--------------------------------------

The following permissions are required for the app service. For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed.

[Optional Access Privilege]
- Contacts : To get an account information when signing in to PENUP with Samsung Account, Facebook, Google, or Twitter account
- Storage : To upload a drawing to PENUP or download a drawing from PENUP

If your system software version is lower than Android 6.0, please update the software to configure App permissions.
Previously allowed permissions can be reset on Apps menu in device settings after software update.

comments: Best free coloring app I have used to date. I like all the pen/brush options. Along with the option for paint bucket as well. And that the undo is more then just the last stroke. I would like to see the paint bucket come with a percentage fill, not just 100% fill. And like to see a floating undo button. I would like to be able to create a permanent personalized pallette of colors. I like to use same color schemes. The more I use the app, the more I enjoy it. Very Relaxing!!! üëçüß° ü•∞

I have mental health issues ( bi polar, ADHD) ;I have heard that coloring, drawing and setting up a new place in my journey to explore the possibilities. Also, I journel and put a lot of time in my Christian life. Basically by default I will be happy üòä to be able to make a positive impact in my life with words and color!! A daily gratitude list.

AWESOME app that I just discovered purely because of the fact that I bought a new phone.. Decided to give it a try just since I was bored at the time and since I actually didn't have a clue what the app was about. I started a drawing and now I can't stop.... (All good things!) I'm an artist anyway, so this is a great way for me to get the ol' artistic juices flowing when I can't have any of my usual art supplies with me. Only suggestion: WE NEED MORE COLORS TO WORK WITH! Mettalic, Matte, etc.

Good app... My problem is how do we thichen the pen and adjust it accordingly in the settings. It's really bad. Can't even sign in with my Google account. Next, when you tap the back key it ussualy asks you to save it but sometimes it doesn't. Give it 5 stars if you fix these problems. Otherwise a really good app. Glad I found a art app by samsung. Sorry now it has signed with my Google account.

It's good but not great. A major issue I have with this app is that when in coloring mode the color pixilates when you stop coloring and then start coloring again. It doesn't do this with drawing mode. When I first start coloring it doesn't pixilate. Only when I leave and come back to it. It makes coloring small areas almost impossible.

title: EVA Facial Mouse PRO
description:
EVA tracks your face movements using the front camera and artificial vision techniques. A mouse pointer allows you to control all the actions of your device.

FEATURES

‚Ä¢ HANDS-FREE. Use your smartphone by just moving your head without touching the screen.

‚Ä¢ NO ADDITIONAL HARDWARE. EVA leverages all the power of your smartphone camera and processor.

‚Ä¢ EASY TO USE. The configuration wizard guides you after the installation to get started as soon as possible.

‚Ä¢ GESTURE GENERATION. You can perform the most common gestures (e.g. tap, double-tap, long press, swipe, and pinch) to control your device.

‚Ä¢ VOICE COMMANDS. Use your voice to directly execute most actions without using the menus.

‚Ä¢ CUSTOMIZABLE. Pointer speed, motion acceleration and smoothness, dwelling time, and many other variables can be adjusted to fit your needs.

HOW IT WORKS?

1. The frontal camera of your smartphone or tablet detects your face and tracks it accurately. The motion of your head is used to move a pointer on the screen.

2. Once the pointer is stopped, it starts a countdown and the click is performed when the dwell time is over.

3. An on-screen menu allows you to choose the desired gesture or another action to perform. You can go back or home, open notifications, show running apps, zoom in and out, scroll contents and perform swipe or pinch gestures, for instance.

FOR WHOM IS INTENDED?

EVA is intended for those people who cannot use a touchscreen. For instance, some people with amputations, cerebral palsy, spinal cord injury, muscular dystrophy, multiple sclerosis, amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS) or other disabilities may benefit from this app.

----------------------------------------------

EVA Facial Mouse PRO is based on EVA Facial Mouse. 

EVA Facial Mouse was developed with the support of the Spain Vodafone Foundation.

title: Star Tracker - Mobile Sky Map & Stargazing guide
description:
Hey, get outdoors with your friends and enjoy star gazing! Let StarTracker guide you to explore the universe.

Just hold up and point the device to the sky and have fun! You can see any stars, constellations and deep sky objects you are watching in real time.

<< Please REMOVE the metal case or magnetic cover to avoid interference and get accurate orientation! >>
<< Calibration follow: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zrEzMggOnFQ >>

Features:
‚òÖ All data is offline!
‚òÖ Fits all screen sizes from 3.5 inch to 12 inch for any resolution!
‚òÖ Sun, Moon, Planets in Solar System, 88 Constellations and 8000+ stars visible to the naked eyes.
‚òÖ 12 Zodiac Constellations Art & some famous deep sky objects with magnificent graphics.
‚òÖ Location auto set by GPS, or set manually.
‚òÖ Auto hide all menus and enter AR track mode when you point your device to the sky.
‚òÖ Smooth motion flow and quick response which is realized by cutting edge signal processing technique.
‚òÖ Superb high quality graphic display by enabling the retina display of the device and the full screen anti-aliasing technology employment.

Pro version ($2.99 to unlock):
‚òÖ No ads & full main menu.
‚òÖ Full 88 Constellations & 100+ deep sky objects with magnificent graphics.
‚òÖ Search and guide you to stars, constellations, planets and deep sky objects.
‚òÖ 3D compass in AR mode, indicates position of objects you searched.
‚òÖ Time Machine menu and location menu to let you explore more on time and location dimension.
‚òÖ Night mode switch, protecting eye when doing star gazing outdoor.

comments: I love this app and how easy it is to use. Of note, though: if you have a magnetic case on your phone, take it off before you use this app. It kept giving me the sky for Central Africa when I'm in Arizona, USA! I love that I can turn features on and off, and the night vision is great for studying the night sky. Great for a layman like myself!

I LOVE this app. I think it's great. The compass works really really well, and it's usually pretty accurate when it comes to finding stars and constellations. My one complaint is that when I click on a notif it doesn't show up anywhere in the app. So if I see a notif and I don't read what it says or I don't really understand what it's saying I can't find out more about it after the app opens. If this one thing was fixed it would be 5/5 perfect app.

Just wish there were more options, such as when I see a notification I can close it but when the time comes I can see it again. I would also like to toggle back and forth from seeing the constellations' outlines to just seeing the stars. Overall it is a pretty cool experience when you are out in the open fields of rural Canada and can see a stellar experience.

Great app. Fun way to introduce my children to the wonders of the night sky. Just started astro photography, helping me find Galaxies of interest. My first stacked image turned out extremely well. Family and friends were very impressed.

A great app with plenty of detail & easy to use. It seems to be a lot more accurate than other similar apps I've tried. The only thing that seems to be missing is a red filter so your night sight isn't affected by looking at it. This would make it perfect & 5 stars.

title: My Verizon
description:
The My Verizon app is the all-in-one hub of your Verizon experience, allowing you to keep track of account changes, easily switch to Verizon, and much more.

With My Verizon you can:

Switch and bring your phone to Verizon in minutes with auto-detection of your device and the ability to scan your ID for quick setup. Plus, check which offers you're eligible for.

View your account in one seamless feed.

Get on-demand support tools like Live Chat and step-by-step troubleshooting instructions as needed. Need extra help? Customer service is just a tap away.

Monitor data usage via a control center that lets you see how much data is being used, who is using it and how to get more when you need it.

Change or manage your account safely anywhere, anytime. Easily switch to a different plan or go Unlimited right from your device.

Make secure payments quickly. Manage and pay your bills easily, or simply enroll in Auto Pay.

Score rewards, once-in-a-lifetime experiences and exclusive perks from your favorite brands when you register for Verizon Up.

Shop phones, wearables, smart devices and accessories right from the app, and get delivery as quickly as the same day.

Control your entire Verizon experience, in just one app.

***The My Verizon App is now also available to conveniently serve all prepaid self-service needs. Make payments, enroll in Auto Pay, monitor usage, add data or change a plan directly on your prepaid device. Managing your prepaid account on the most 
reliable network has never been easier.***

comments: No longer is functional on my Tab S2. When opening, it now displays, "We are sorry. We are having trouble connecting". Used to work great. Now it just takes up internal storage. Normal fixes (clear cache, reinstall, etc) do not work. Worked fine until just recently. All other apps on the tablet function, as intended. Only one does not, Verizon.

While the app itself can be useful, please don't allow yourself to fall for the Verizon Up reward program that the app will nag you about incessantly. You essentially agree to allow them to spy on everything you do with your phone, and harvest all kinds of your personal data in the process, by signing up for it. They aren't trying to be your pal, they just want your consent to profit even more off of your account.

It does not save my login credentials - I have to re-log in every time I open it, even when I have "Remember Me" selected & permissions on. Logging in is a two-step process so this wastes time. This is the connection my computer uses (a jetpack) & it has a data limit so I need to track it, which means I have to put up with this every day (I haven't found the same information on the website). I didn't have this problem with the old phone, which may have had an older version of the app. Annoying.

The app keeps me up to date with my data limit, I can pay my bill, look at my bill, and get my $3.00 Amazon gift card every month with the app. Make sure you take advantage of receiving and using your $3.00 gift card every month to offset your bill. It's a nice litte bonus at the end of the month that actually helps.

Very buggy along with their website. I been trying to fix my billings, plans, add-ons for the longest time and still seem to be getting the run around. App is worthless and keeps logging me off. Broken links or none what so ever. Now I am wondering if I made the right choice. When downgrading plans, make sure to un enroll in any add-on or you won't be able to un enroll afterwards and be charge each month. Check when changing plans that you don't get hidden or added fees.

title: Tiny Space Program
description:
This game is in a early release and is updated constantly. Almost every week more content is added. Everything in-game is free. If you like the genre and are willing to help and give some feedback about this game, feel free to try it out!

What would you do if you are a billionaire? owning your own space program, managing, researching and building new space ships, mining on planets and moons, bringing tourist into space for a space walk or just sending researchers to explore what is out there.  

In Tiny Space Program, like modern space companies such as Spacex, Blue origins and Virgin Galactic, you decide/manage what rockets you launch, if you want to bring tourists to Mars and The Moon, or start a mining operation on IO, Titan, Europa or Pluto. You manage and simulate the early colonization of our near future of our interplanetary society and learn what kinds of challenges exists for such an endeavor. 

Features:
- Space Program Manager.
- Building off-world colonies and outposts.
- Launch Space Ships and rockets into orbit.
- Research different technologies,
- Mine resources from stellar bodies,
- Character progression of astronauts
- Spacesuits
- Based on real orbital mechanics and ship propulsion
- Establish Off-world economies

Features ‚Äì to be implemented
- much more rockets and space ships.
- Space stations
- Drones and idle rovers
- Orbital Factories - Capital ships
- Facilitating space colonies
- Colonies to trade with
- Stellar bodies beyond Pluto
- Interstellar Travel. 
- (idle) Trade routes and automation (idle production)
