developerAddress:
Antonie Duyckstraat 35
2582 TC The Hague
Netherlands
recentChanges:
In this update:
- New vehicles
- Fixed many little bugs
- Adjusted the market to fixed pricing
- New tech
comments: It's a good game. A bit slow at first, but once you establish a few outposts the game moves as fast as you want. I enjoy that the tutorial is brief. Ads only happen if you want to make a bit of in-game cash. I would like to know what an upgrade will get me. "Improved performance" and "more crafting options" doesn't shed much light on what higher level buildings can do. Haven't found uranium yet.

This game is calm and way different from all those moneysucking mobile games. No annoying ads unless you want some extra currency or speed up some progress. It's amazing how much you can do. There's always something new to explore etc. Its only downside is that the gameplay is extremely slow, but it also has its charms: it gives a great feeling of accomplishment at the end of the road. Dear developer, if you see this, just know that i love your work and can't wait to see what comes next.

The game is a work in progress and so it has a few bugs and minor issues which do not affect the overall gameplay experience. This game is not marred by paywalls intrusive pop up ads. All of the content in the game can be enjoyed by players regardless of their budget. It is a difficut game to get the hang of and so a discord group has been created by the developer to assist players in progressing through the game and allowing them to socialize with other players.

Lots of bugs. Lacks instruction. I have everything that is says for Hydroponics (something needed for the game) yet fails to let me make it. Do I need to research something fails to tell me in the game. There is no close button when you open menus in the game. Pressing on top where close button should be works. Fun game too bad it's so clunky. Five out of five if you fix the issues...

It's a fun game and I like the idea but the reason why I'm giving it 3 stars is because of the UI. It jitters when you switch outposts and doesn't register half my taps, meaning you have to press the button twice for it to do something. Developers, if you're reading this, please improve the UI! Make it less jiterry and clunky and I'll up my review to 5 stars.

title: Audiomack: Download New Music Offline Free
description:
Stream and download the best new songs, albums, and playlists for free and play them offline data-free!  Browse music from top categories like Hip-Hop, Rap, R&B, EDM, Afropop, and Reggae on the Audiomack free music app. Download songs and even listen offline, without using your data!

Audiomack provides streaming and free download access to the newest and hottest tracks, right at your fingertips. Our free music download feature allows you to play your favorite songs offline, and our proprietary ‚ÄúTrending‚Äù section shows you the best albums and songs that are hot right now.

KEY FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Find & stream music and mixtapes that are new or trending. Be the first of your friends to be up on what‚Äôs next.
‚Ä¢ Download songs and albums for offline, data-free listening.
‚Ä¢ Unlimited listening & streaming - play as much Hip-Hop, Afrobeat, Electronic, Reggae & dancehall music as you want.
‚Ä¢ Favorite tracks, albums, and playlists and easily search, browse, and shuffle your favorites collection.
‚Ä¢ Browse expertly curated playlists by mood, genre, and much more.

‚Ä¢ Follow your favorite artists, producers, and tastemakers including 21 Savage, Young Thug, Future, and more.

STREAM AND DOWNLOAD SONGS FROM TOP ARTISTS

recentChanges:
Say hello to Audiomack version 5.9!

With this new version we made tons of behind-the-scenes improvements and design fixes. The app should run smoother than ever.

comments: Best. App. EVER!! Its amazing! Sure you cant download as many songs as you want, but they are just making buisness! Furthermore, its just great and I am listining to it as I am writing this. I can't think of a better app, spotify is way too expensive as I am a kid. But this here is just an amazing legend. It gets my 5 stars. (It deserves infinite stars though)

I really hate the fact that you know have to upgrade to premium to download as much songs as you want, it really sucks, I've had this app since 2017 when you didn't have to be premium, kinda sucks now you have a limited amount of songs you can download. Also adds are getting worse and worse, need to fix that

audiomack is usually a 5star App ...However, this new upgrade which only allows you to download a certain amount of premiums downloads before forcing an upgrade .... which once was free causing my rating to be as is... i am a long time customer and once im able to download an unlimited amount of download w\o seeing certain songs being characterized as premiums my rating will increase significantly!!!!!

If I'm being honest. Don't understand the complaints. The app devs need the money that they get for premium, limiting the offline Playlist to 20 isn't bad because you can still have an online one. You just need internet to play the songs and most people have data so I don't see the big deal. The app is good, you find new artist, remix and really anything you want. The staff is monitoring the app constantly from what I've seen and overall just works as a good music streaming app.

First. Anybody on this app that is looking for a Apple music replacement is lame; thats why excluscivity has a fee. Second, if you use Live Mixtapes but are tired of the lack of currensy, this is the type of release access you need. Finally, I use more Audiomack than the LiveMixtapes App, the Apple Music app, because apple is...corporate. Eventually they'll pick it up but Audiomack to me is still getting the links to the streets. Like that Zayetoven release, i cant find it anywhere. Thank you.

title: IMDb: Your guide to movies, TV shows, celebrities
description:
IMDb is the world's most popular and authoritative source for movie, TV, and celebrity information. Watch trailers, get showtimes, and buy tickets for upcoming films. Rate and review shows you've seen and track what you want to watch using your Watchlist. IMDb takes you behind the scenes with exclusive IMDb Originals, celebrity interviews, and more. Stay up to date with entertainment news, awards, and events.

Sign in to:
‚Ä¢ Get personalized recommendations for shows and movies
‚Ä¢ Track what you want to watch with your Watchlist
‚Ä¢ Rate and review what you've watched
‚Ä¢ Save your favorite theaters
‚Ä¢ Create and share lists of movies, shows, and celebrities

Discover what to watch - and where to watch it:
‚Ä¢ Browse popular favorites and personalized top picks
‚Ä¢ Compare watch options to find the best place to watch any title
‚Ä¢ Read user and critic reviews
‚Ä¢ Watch the latest trailers, IMDb Originals, and clips

Explore:
‚Ä¢ Search for more than 5 million shows, movies, and entertainment programs - and more than 8 million cast and crew members
‚Ä¢ Read breaking entertainment news
‚Ä¢ Browse quotes, trivia, and goofs
‚Ä¢ Get complete event coverage from the Academy Awards (Oscars), Golden Globes, Emmys, San Diego Comic-Con, film festivals, and more
‚Ä¢ Check out Best Picture winners, top rated movies, popular shows, celebrity birthdays, and more
‚Ä¢ Receive notifications for the latest trailers, movie showtimes, and breaking news

Check showtimes and buy local movie tickets:
‚Ä¢ Use your current location to get nearby showtimes
‚Ä¢ Sort movie showtimes by start time, end time, genre, rating, and more
‚Ä¢ Buy tickets directly from your phone or tablet

IMDb is available worldwide in English (US/UK), Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Turkish, and Hindi.

Do you think we're doing something well? Is there something we've overlooked? Please post your feedback at https://getsatisfaction.com/imdb/categories/imdb_imdb_mobile

recentChanges: "Do you understand the words that are coming out of my mouth?" Jackie Chan understood Chris Tucker perfectly well in Rush Hour, but like each of us, even he is susceptible to a misquote. To help Jackie and you keep your ears and memory in harmony, we enhanced the quotes, trivia, goofs, and other detailed information sections on movie and TV show pages. Now it‚Äôs easier than ever to avoid embarrassing misquotes and even dig in on details on your favorite people and titles. Thanks for using IMDb!
comments: It's a great and helpful app. I only have two complaints: 1. It should be easier to organise your list. I want to put the titles in a custom order, because sorting by rating puts them in wrong order due to multiple titles having the same rating. I also think the lists should instantly update when you give a new rating, now I have to wait a while before my list gets updated

I have never had such a great, useful, dependable, easy to use, informative, and valuable app. Valuable I have won a few bucks having IDBM as my personal bet settler. You should try it, you won't regret it. I continue to explore this app and find more things I can do with it. I really can't say enough about my IMBD app

Best app ever for film or TV lovers. Truthfully use this app multiple times a day, loads over an average week. Amazing for those "what have I seen him/her in before" moments; also those "who the hell dat" moments. Also settles many marital disputes for couples that watch a lot together. Great for watching suggestions and I especially like the Prime recommendations as a Prime user. Trailers are also useful. Goofs are funny to watch out for, location & OST details Great too. Love it - thank you.

I really like this app. I can watch tv shows and movies for free. I have read several reviews about problems playing trailers or anything. I have not experienced any of these issues. Everything has played perfectly. I have only been using this app for a little while but its worth having.

Could be a little less glitchy and more user friendly but overall great app. IMDb is the best! Better than Rotten Tomatoes by a mile for sure. I have been using IMDb for twenty years now and they've always proven to be the best in collective information about a movie, celebrity, tv show, etc.

title: Strava: Track Running, Cycling & Swimming
description:
Track your fitness with Strava activity tracker. Record routes, map your favorite bike trail or run & analyze your training with all the stats ‚Äì for free! 

Marathon training or simply love going for a bike ride? Turn your phone into a sophisticated cycle or running tracker with Strava. Try out a new trail with Strava distance tracker and mile counter or even track running speed. Join millions of active people and reach your goals!

Fitness Training with Strava Activity Tracker: 3 Ways to Train Smarter
1. Record routes, track running & analyze: Track distance, swim pace, cycle speed, elevation gained & calories burned
2. Map your route: Mix up your run, swim or ride with the world‚Äôs largest trail network
3. Training challenges: Push yourself with monthly Challenges & compete with others

DISTANCE TRACKER & MILE COUNTER
‚Ä¢ Track running, cycling and swimming: Compare your performance over time
‚Ä¢ Track distance, pace, speed, elevation gained and calories burned on every run
‚Ä¢ Mile counter: Use your Android device or pretty much every GPS device out there

CONNECT & SHARE
‚Ä¢ Record routes on your Strava feed so friends & followers can comment & share their own progress
‚Ä¢ Your cycle route is the best? Share the route map & photos of your latest bike ride
‚Ä¢ Join Clubs of brands, teams and friends for activities and growing communities

STRAVA SUBSCRIPTION
‚Ä¢ Set your fitness goals and get customizable training plans. Use the distance tracker and set your own time or segment goals
‚Ä¢ Get live feedback to help you train safer & perform better

RUNNING TRACKER and TRAINING
‚Ä¢ Marathon training hit a plateau? Track distance and boost your performance with running tracker Strava and access tailored plans with Premium
‚Ä¢ Turn your device into a personal coach for triathlon or marathon training

It doesn‚Äôt stop at running and cycling, you can use Strava activity tracker for a whole range of sports:
‚Ä¢ Swim
‚Ä¢ Alpine Ski
‚Ä¢ Hike
‚Ä¢ Crossfit
‚Ä¢ Kayak
‚Ä¢ Rock Climb
‚Ä¢ Surf
‚Ä¢ Yoga
‚Ä¢ Indoor running
‚Ä¢ Indoor cycling
‚Ä¢ Gym workouts
...and many more!

NOTE ON GPS SUPPORT:
Strava depends on GPS for recording activities. In some devices, the GPS does not work properly and Strava will not record effectively. If your Strava recordings show poor location estimation behavior, please try to update the operating system to the most recent version. There are some devices which have consistently poor performance with no known remedies. On these devices, we restrict installation of Strava, for example the Samsung Galaxy Ace 3 and the Galaxy Express 2. 

See our support site for more information: https://strava.zendesk.com/entries/27141334-Does-Strava-4-x-run-on-my-Android-device

recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: I'm a 14 year old cyclist, I started about a month ago and fell in love, the more you use strava the easier it will get, I'm paying ¬£5.00 a month for extra uses such as building routes and seeing you heart rate, analize each effort, power zones, segment leader boreds so people can see you if you are in top 10 for a surten road, I highly reccoment getting this app!

I like the metrics, but the reason I got the app was to be able to notify my family of when I was out running. Having to send a text then start the app is not as smooth as I would like. An automatic notification to them when I start the routine is what was expected. I sent the beacon notification thinking that was the start of my run and didn't realize till I was 0.5mile in that my workout had started. One of my best runs was not clocked. Even worse, I opened a ticket a month ago on this. üòí

Every time I pause a recording during a run, it glitches and records inaccurate kms and a crazy fast pace. That it happens repeatedly is unacceptable. Strava should ensure the basic functionalities are working before removing free features and constantly advertising for their paid subscription. Will be looking elsewhere now.

A good app. Cost is a bit high. Also, there needs to be a way to incriminate the ride to find the highest 1 hour max, ideally automatically. This should be easy programming. I usually just take my avg power for the whole ride as my FTP, if it improves. Also, I'm sorry STRAVA but, I want the ability to turn off the local legends option. Or at least rename the idea. A local legends should be someone with the most KOMs. Please these improvements so I can 5 star you guys! Kris

It's a good app, but either the app, my phone (Xperia xz1 compact) or my global location (West Sussex, UK) conspire to formulate GPS data that is not accurate enough to trust. It congratulated me for running 400metres in 44 seconds and tracked two identical runs on different days as 1.6km different in length.

title: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
description:
Be together whenever, with our free* all-in-one communication app, complete with unlimited text, voice, video calling and group video chat features. Easily sync your messages and contacts to your Android phone and connect with anyone, anywhere.

NEW! WATCH TOGETHER
Watch videos, tv shows, and movies with your friends over Messenger Video Chat and Rooms when you can't be together. Capture every moment and reaction in real-time.

NEW! CUSTOM REACTIONS
Lost for words? Now you can customize your reactions, with lots more emojis to choose from, including  üéâ and  üî•.

NEW! CHAT THEMES
Choose from fun themes and colors, like Tie-Dye or Love, to make your chats more personal.

GET THE GROUP TOGETHER WITH ROOMS
Send a link to group video chat with anyone, even if they don't have Messenger. Host up to 50 people with no time limits.

FREE VIDEO CALLS TO STAY CONNECTED
Keep your friends and family close with unlimited live video chatting - like FaceTime, but works across devices (Android, iOS, etc.). Host group video calls with up to 8 people, with high-quality audio, high definition video, and interactive video features like face filters.

UNLIMITED FREE TEXT & PHONE CALLS
Skip exchanging phone numbers and simply send a message to your Facebook friends, even if they‚Äôre across the world. Enjoy high-quality voice and text messaging on mobile, tablet, and desktop.

TURN OFF THE LIGHTS IN DARK MODE
Give your eyes some rest with a sleek new look that darkens the colors of the chat interface.

RECORD AND SEND VOICE AND VIDEO MESSAGES
When text just won't cut it, just hit record and send. Say, sing, show, or shout it out loud.

EXPRESS YOURSELF WITH STICKERS, GIFS, AND EMOJIS
Use custom stickers to show your creative side. You can even add effects and filters to video calls.

SEND FILES, PHOTOS, AND VIDEOS
There‚Äôs no limit to the number of files you want to share with your friends.

PLAN AND MAKE IT HAPPEN
Make plans to get together with polls and more. Suggest a meeting spot or tell friends where you are by sharing your location with just a few taps.

SEND MONEY SECURELY AND EASILY (within US only)
Send and receive money securely and easily with friends and family right in the app by adding your debit card, PayPal account or reloadable prepaid card (single-source cards eligible for sending money only).

CHAT WITH BUSINESSES
Easily connect with your favorite businesses to make reservations, get customer support, find deals and more.

BRING SMS INTO MESSENGER
No need to open multiple apps to stay in touch. Use one app for SMS and Messenger.

COMPATIBLE ACROSS PLATFORMS
Chat with friends across an array of devices, like desktop, Portal, and others.

Privacy Policy: https://www.facebook.com/about/privacy/

LEARN MORE about Messenger texting and group video chat at: http://messenger.com (https://messenger.com/)
* Data rates apply
descriptionHTML:
Be together whenever, with our free* all-in-one communication app, complete with unlimited text, voice, video calling and group video chat features. Easily sync your messages and contacts to your Android phone and connect with anyone, anywhere.

NEW! WATCH TOGETHER
Watch videos, tv shows, and movies with your friends over Messenger Video Chat and Rooms when you can't be together. Capture every moment and reaction in real-time.

NEW! CUSTOM REACTIONS
Lost for words? Now you can customize your reactions, with lots more emojis to choose from, including üéâ and üî•.

NEW! CHAT THEMES
Choose from fun themes and colors, like Tie-Dye or Love, to make your chats more personal.

GET THE GROUP TOGETHER WITH ROOMS
Send a link to group video chat with anyone, even if they don't have Messenger. Host up to 50 people with no time limits.

FREE VIDEO CALLS TO STAY CONNECTED
Keep your friends and family close with unlimited live video chatting - like FaceTime, but works across devices (Android, iOS, etc.). Host group video calls with up to 8 people, with high-quality audio, high definition video, and interactive video features like face filters.

UNLIMITED FREE TEXT & PHONE CALLS
Skip exchanging phone numbers and simply send a message to your Facebook friends, even if they‚Äôre across the world. Enjoy high-quality voice and text messaging on mobile, tablet, and desktop.

TURN OFF THE LIGHTS IN DARK MODE
Give your eyes some rest with a sleek new look that darkens the colors of the chat interface.

RECORD AND SEND VOICE AND VIDEO MESSAGES
When text just won't cut it, just hit record and send. Say, sing, show, or shout it out loud.

EXPRESS YOURSELF WITH STICKERS, GIFS, AND EMOJIS
Use custom stickers to show your creative side. You can even add effects and filters to video calls.

SEND FILES, PHOTOS, AND VIDEOS
There‚Äôs no limit to the number of files you want to share with your friends.

PLAN AND MAKE IT HAPPEN
Make plans to get together with polls and more. Suggest a meeting spot or tell friends where you are by sharing your location with just a few taps.

SEND MONEY SECURELY AND EASILY (within US only)
Send and receive money securely and easily with friends and family right in the app by adding your debit card, PayPal account or reloadable prepaid card (single-source cards eligible for sending money only).

CHAT WITH BUSINESSES
Easily connect with your favorite businesses to make reservations, get customer support, find deals and more.

BRING SMS INTO MESSENGER
No need to open multiple apps to stay in touch. Use one app for SMS and Messenger.

COMPATIBLE ACROSS PLATFORMS
Chat with friends across an array of devices, like desktop, Portal, and others.

Privacy Policy: https://www.facebook.com/about/privacy/

LEARN MORE about Messenger texting and group video chat at: http://messenger.com (https://messenger.com/)
* Data rates apply
summary: Free group video chat, video calls, voice calls and text messaging.
recentChanges: We update the app regularly so that we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available Messenger features. This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements. Thanks for using Messenger!
comments: PLEASE NOTICE THIS. I want to suggest some feature in this app. I don't know how do you work on updating it but I wish you notice this suggestion and give it a shot. In the "Search in Conversation" feature can you add the date not just the words in a conversation. I remember the dates but not the conversation making it harder to find what I'm looking for. THANK YOU!!! üòä

I use messenger a lot as I like to text people and video chat them. Messenger has been even more helpful during these times as it gives me a way to communicate with my family members and friends. I love the effects you can use on video calls but you should be able to get all of them on every video call and not just a few of them. Apart from that I love Messenger and good job!

Please optimize the application. I think it takes up too much space for a messaging app. Yes there are tons of features, but it becomes redundant since your other applications can also do the same (for example, the great similarities with Instagram when it comes to the camera). In terms of bugs, I don't know if Facebook or Messenger is at fault, but when viewing messages from Facebook, Messenger always prompts for a sign in. As for suggestions, I think a message scheduler would be great.

This new "update" is awful. I hate the color scheme. It jumps around, freezes up and is so glitchy. Also I don't get my messages when they are sent most of the time. Also I hate having the little red indicator on the bubbles to tell me how many messages I have. It's like they were trying to make a bad user experience

Im not able to sign into messenger on my new s20+. When i sign it it says "logging in" then immediately says "logging out" and "something went wrong please try again later".. this has been going on for a week. Signing into messenger lite was no problem at all though.  I tried signing out of all sessions, waiting a day, re installed the app multiple times, confirming this was me, signing into without a sim card etc etc..

title: Microsoft OneDrive
description:
Microsoft OneDrive keeps your photos and files backed up, protected, synced, and accessible on all your devices. This OneDrive app lets you view and share OneDrive files, documents, and photos with friends and family. Plus, you can use the app to automatically back up your phone‚Äôs photos and videos. Start with 5 GB of free cloud storage or upgrade to a Microsoft 365 subscription to get 1 TB of storage.

Microsoft OneDrive offers the following features:

Back up photos & videos
‚Ä¢ Automatic photo backup when you turn on Camera Upload
‚Ä¢ Find photos easily thanks to automatic tagging
‚Ä¢ View photos on your phone, computer, and online

File sharing and access
‚Ä¢ Share files, photos, videos, and albums with friends and family
‚Ä¢ Get notifications when a shared document is edited
‚Ä¢ Set password-protected or expiring sharing links*
‚Ä¢ Access selected OneDrive files on the app without being online

Document Scanning
‚Ä¢ Scan, sign, and send docs right from the OneDrive mobile app
‚Ä¢ Scan and markup docs, receipts, whiteboards, and more

Search
‚Ä¢ Search photos by what‚Äôs in them (i.e. beach, snow, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Search docs by name or content

Security
‚Ä¢ All OneDrive files are encrypted at rest and in transit
‚Ä¢ Personal Vault lets you protect your important files with identity verification
‚Ä¢ Restore files with version history
‚Ä¢ Stay protected with ransomware detection & recovery*

Works with Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, Outlook
‚Ä¢  Use Microsoft Office apps to edit and collaborate in real time on Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneNote files stored in OneDrive.
‚Ä¢  Back up, view, and save your Office documents.

The OneDrive app for Android offers 5 GB of free cloud storage to sync photos and files across your devices, share photos and docs, and keep your digital life backed up in the cloud.

Upgrade to a Microsoft 365 subscription
With a Microsoft 365 Personal subscription you get 1TB of storage (1TB of storage per person for up to 6 people with the Family subscription), OneDrive premium features, and access to all features in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and OneNote on mobiles devices, web browsers, PCs and Macs. 

To make an in-app purchase of a Microsoft 365 Personal or Family subscription: open the app, tap the Me tab, then tap your storage or the diamond icon. Subscriptions begin at $6.99 a month in the US, and can vary by region. Microsoft 365 subscriptions and OneDrive standalone subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your Google Play store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period, unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. 

To manage your subscriptions or to disable auto-renewal, after purchase, go to your Google Play store account settings. A subscription cannot be cancelled or refunded during the active subscription period.

Using this OneDrive app for work or school
For you to sign into your work or school account on OneDrive, your organization needs to have a qualifying OneDrive, SharePoint Online or Microsoft 365 business subscription plan. 
 
Privacy
This app is provided by Microsoft. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft and transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or its affiliates maintain facilities. 
 
Privacy Policy: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=507539 
Terms of Use: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=246338 

*Requires Microsoft 365 Personal or Family subscription

recentChanges: You can now set up OneDrive to unlock with your face, if your device supports it.
comments: This is a frustrating app. On one hand, on one of my devices, this app is great. It runs properly, is decently clear on what everything does, and having the peace of mind that my photos are safe is nice. On the other hand, on another device, this app crashes every time I try to move photos to a different app, is slow when doing anything else, and ends up wasting my time.

So far I am LOVING THIS!!! I have only just begun using OneDrive, not knowing entirely what it was to begin with. Now I look for it wherever I am. I can open ANY file from pretty much ANY device! Word, power point, excel, etc.! I find that impressive. Especially since it's Microsoft. Like, I think Google tried to do the same thing but something just doesn't feel right over there. This is where it's at. Hands down. So far I highly recommend.

I don't understand what's happend with this app. It worked perfectly fine and then Samsung backup switched to using one drive and it just isn't uploading anything right, it's not uploaded and new pictures from the last month since it change apart from some pictures from a year ago. Then it's saying it can no longer back up from and SD card? There doesn't appear to be anyway to change back and it's not clear what I actually have backed up now. So disappointed.

Setup trying, should be made easier. Sometimes it takes days for uploads. Amazon is good for auto uploads. Making sub- albums is nonexistent (I used to keep info on leases, rent receipts, complaints, etc. in separate albums then group them under 1 album). Even Google changed that capability. I can't deal with these egomaniacs deciding what to do with my pics.

Works ok except one annoying issue. The file dates displayed appear to be the dates the file was initially created and not the date the file was modified/synced. You cannot tell if file is modified until you open and inspect it. This problem is unique to Android version. Works correctly on all other OneDrive apps on other platforms (IOS, Windows, etc).

title: Minecraft
description:
Explore infinite worlds and build everything from the simplest of homes to the grandest of castles. Play in creative mode with unlimited resources or mine deep into the world in survival mode, crafting weapons and armor to fend off dangerous mobs. Create, explore and survive alone or with friends on mobile devices or Windows 10.

EXPAND YOUR GAME:
Marketplace - Discover the latest community creations in the marketplace! Get unique maps, skins, and texture packs from your favorite creators. 

Slash commands - Tweak how the game plays: you can give items away, summon mobs, change the time of day, and more. 

Add-Ons - Customize your experience even further with free Add-Ons! If you're more tech-inclined, you can modify data-driven behaviors in the game to create new resource packs.

MULTIPLAYER
Realms - Play with up to 10 friends cross-platform, anytime, anywhere on Realms, your own private server that we host for you. Try a free 30-day trial in-app.

Multiplayer - Play with up to 4 friends with a free Xbox Live account online.
Servers - Join free massive multiplayer servers and play with thousands of others! Discover gigantic community-run worlds, compete in unique mini-games and socialize in lobbies full of new friends!

SUPPORT: https:///www.minecraft.net/help
LEARN MORE: https:///www.minecraft.net/

That's a pretty good game I gave it four stars I would give it five stars well because I'm on Android and I can't get achievements and I can't see my friends when they're online :(. I wish I could earn achievements so I can get points too will be a lot easier for me. I hope soon Android can earn achievements if you do let it please and let us see our friends online too. If you can fix that.

Really an amazing game. I've never found a game that's better than minecraft! I love the fact you can play with your friends, enable TONS of resource packs and let your imagination run wild! I think this game should be free so younger children can experience it themselves, and help their creativity improve! One glitch I need to report, though. Whenever two of my friends are on my friend's realm, I can never join, and never can my friends. I hope you can help with this, thanks.

I love this app. I have played it for many years but recently it hasn't been working. Everytime I try to sign in my xbox account it takes me out the app and tells me the app stopped working. I reset my device 10 times. I even asked my friends who play it if it was working for them. It wasn't. This started happening after the recent updates.

I'm very happy with this game it was worth my money, but every time I open minecraft it doesn't work and I have to close the application. This is although the first time it happened and hopefully the last. The problem isn't fixed yet so if someone could help me please do. UPDATE Even with the new update it still doesn't work I hope you guys will fix it. It freezes every time I open Minecraft . EDIT: it works again. If you have the same problem watch a YouTube tutorial. Worked for me.

title: Digital Secure
description:
Protect your private information from digital threats. 
Digital Secure is a one-stop suite of privacy and security tools for your mobile devices and home computers. Safeguard your internet connection and personal data with antivirus, anti-malware and identity theft protection so you can browse with peace of mind. 

Here‚Äôs what you‚Äôll get with Digital Secure.
You‚Äôll get free security and privacy tools, plus you can get advanced protection for $5/mo per line or $10/mo per account.

1. Security and Privacy
Protect your device from online threats and get around-the-clock peace of mind. 
Get warnings when connecting to an unsecure network, visiting risky websites or attempting dangerous downloads. Plus, you‚Äôll be able to see how installed apps are currently using your personal information. 

2. Safe Wi-Fi 
Connect with confidence to any public Wi-Fi. 
With Digital Secure, it‚Äôs easy to make any Wi-Fi connection private. You‚Äôll get an on-the-go secure VPN connection so you‚Äôll be able to keep personal data and online activities to yourself. 

3. Identity Theft Protection (IDTP)
Take control with always-on IDTP and social media monitoring, dark web surveillance and theft alerts.
24/7 cyber monitoring means you can be notified if we detect any personal information you‚Äôve asked us to monitor is shared online. You‚Äôll also get step-by-step guidance from recovery and replacement specialists if essential items such as credit cards and IDs are lost.

24/7 cyber monitoring means you can be notified if we detect any personal information you‚Äôve asked us to monitor is shared online. You‚Äôll also get step-by-step guidance from recovery and replacement specialists if essential items such as credit cards and IDs are lost.
summary: An all-in-one privacy and security app that keeps your personal information safe
developerAddress: One Verizon Way, Basking Ridge, New Jersey
recentChanges: Bug Fixes
comments: Last update on Google play was sept 16, and today Oct 10 I am told my app is out of date. This is a security app, not tetris. Also, won't start automatically after restart sometimes. I have to manually start it (if I notice it's not running).

Hello, my phone has been spammed. I thought this app is supposed to protect against that. Now I don't know how to stop the spamming. I keep getting messages that my phone will be locked if I don't install and pay for Spam protection.

I haven't done the September update. I've read many customer comments and notice that the one common aspect to each one is the canned set of replies from the Verizon Care correspondent. Notably, that in each instance, the tone and tenor of the reply is condescending in a passive-aggressive manner. For example, inviting the dissatisfied customer to take yet another step, reaching out to customer care, to describe "your problem", again? It's a Verizon or digital secure problem. Start there eh?
Still kinda on the fence with this app since switching over from a very corrupt AT&T. I can say that because I've been with them for over 20 years. They went bad about 4 years ago. Thank you Verizon.
App doesn't allow Web security. You turn on 2 seconds later the app crashes I have no idea if I'm safe browsing on the Web > latest version 9/16 Issue still a problem !!!

title: edjing Mix - Free Music DJ app
description:
Introducing edjing Mix - the brand new version of the famous DJ app - reworked to ensure even greater performance level.
Designed in partnership with pro DJs, edjing Mix transforms your device into a real DJ setup and stretches the limits of djing on mobile, offering unlimited creative freedom.

Access millions of tracks coming from Deezer, SoundCloud and all your local folders and remix in an instant with more than 20 DJ fx and features. Not to mention the all-new sampler and the hardware integration to push even further the boundaries of the mobile djing.

* ‚Äòedjing Mix offers the same capability of a pro DJ software except with the convenience of being on a device that fits in a pocket.‚Äô - DJ Tech Tools
* 'A super portable digital setup' - DJ Worx

Remix +50 million tracks

- Music library (access to all your local music)
- Soundcloud integration (requires a Soundcloud premium account)
- Deezer integration (requires a Premium account)
- create multisource playlists with songs from both your local and streaming sources
- smart search feature that displays results for all your music sources on the same screen
- queue system to prepare the upcoming songs
- advanced sorting: browse by alphabetical order, BPM, or Time

A new major feature: the sampler

- access 16 free samples: siren, gunshot, kick, snare...
- possibility to link the sampler to the crossfader to cut the pads' samples sound depending on your crossfader's position.
- +20 sample Packs (EDM, Hip-Hop, dubstep...), created by Pro DJs, in partnership with Future Loops

All the must-have DJ tools

- automatic BPM detection for all your songs
- Tap BPM to manually adjust the BPM of your tracks
- continuous sync between your tracks
- little audio spectrum to navigate in your music
- wide audio spectrum for optimised beats detection
- pro audio FX: Echo, Flanger, Reverse, Filter
- audio FX expansion (in-app purchase): Roll, Roll Filter, Steel, Gate, Double Beat, Phaser, Color Noise, Beatgrid, Band pass, Band stop, Reverb
- automated audio FX sync on the BPM (loop, cue, seek)
- loops: from 1/64 to 128, or customizable
- set up to 8 Hot Cues on each deck
- EQ three bands and Gain
- Pre-cueing stereo with headphones (in-app purchase)
- Automix mode to let edjing mix and do seamless transitions between your tracks
- ultra precise scratch
- set the vinyl inertia, and the starting speed of the vinyl
- a 'Slip' mode for Loops and Scratch
- HD recording of your mixes and scratch routines in .wav format
- 4 skins to customize your turntables (in-app purchase): Diamond, Gold, Neon, Metal

Designed by pro DJs

- intuitive interface with direct and quick access to all the essential features
- apply two audio FX at the same time on each deck
- reorder the FX lists to customize the panel as it suits you best

Hardware integration

- control edjing with the best portable fader: Mixfader
(Mixfader requires Bluetooth LE and Android 4.3 onwards)
- compatible with your time coded and standard audio vinyls
- MIDI controller support: Pioneer DDJ-200

Remix songs from your Android Wear

- access your set key information
- sync your songs
- manage 4 DJ effects

About edjing Mix

To keep up-to-date on our latest news, follow us on:
www.edjing.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/edjingApp
Instagram: http://instagram.com/edjingofficial/
Twitter : http://twitter.com/edjing

Contact our Team: support@edjing.com

developer: MWM - Free music and audio apps for Android
developerAddress:
54-56 avenue du G√©n√©ral Leclerc
92100 Boulogne Billancourt, France
recentChanges:
Hello! This version contains fixes to improve your user experience.

Keep writing to us at support@edjing.com, your feedback are everything to us! And if you like edjing Mix, make sure to rate it on the Play Store :).
comments: I've been on and off with this app for years. It's had so many changes throughout the years but this latest version has got to be the worst. The latest interface is just clunky. The old one was better. Another thing: there was two versions of this app. The original version was this free one. Now it's not free anymore? How is it that you guys are putting a premium on this one when you already made another pro version that you had to pay for? Just keep this one separate and free.

Wow... just wow. Downloaded app a while back, and was pretty good! Unlocked all the fx options by watching videos, and was able to actually use the app.new update comes in, cant do anything but watch ads. Now even the previously free fx effects are now "premium", and whenever you click the fx tab, it brings up the subscription page, interrupting your doing. And when you exit THAT add, ANOTHER one comes up! Worst update ever.

This pirch bar is a joke, can barely set the bpm right without using the sync button. You ruined it, the previous one was way better. It's nice that you can apply 2 effects on a track at the same time unlike before the update, but now they're smaller which makes it harder to use with my chunky fingers, i often screw it up because of that. The eq slides were narrowed down, bad idea. The automix button just simply shouldn't exist or place it somewhere else where you can't press it by accident.

Don't even bother updating it, when you try to change the tempo/pitch of the song, its too hard to get it accurately to where you want it to be using the bar, the way it was before was way better and the worst part is they charge you for recording, they'll do everything and anything for money....

I absolutely love love love this app great for beginner djs or just to have fun my only problem is that I cannot record anything I mix through SoundCloud even if I do buy premium. if there is a fix for this I would love to hear about it also would like to see more personalization opinions when you do pay for it

title: Roku
description:
Stream hundreds of hit movies, TV shows and more on the go with The Roku Channel, use it as a second remote, enjoy private listening, and more. 

The free Roku mobile app makes it easy and fun to control your Roku player and Roku TV‚Ñ¢.

Use the Roku mobile app to:
‚Ä¢ Control your Roku device as another remote
‚Ä¢ Stream hit movies, TV shows and more on the go with The Roku Channel 
‚Ä¢ Enjoy private listening* with headphones 
‚Ä¢ Use your voice or keyboard to search for movies, shows, actors, and directors
‚Ä¢ Cast videos, photos, and music to your TV 
‚Ä¢ Add and launch channels on your Roku device
‚Ä¢ Enter text on your Roku device easier with your keyboard


To use certain features of the Roku mobile app, you must connect your phone or tablet to the same wireless network as your Roku device. Certain features require a compatible Roku device, and may require logging in to your Roku account. 


Feature availability:
¬∑ Searching by voice is available in English in the US, UK, and Canada only.
¬∑ The Roku app is available in English only in Mexico.
* Mobile private listening is available for Roku Express, Express+, Roku Streaming Stick (3600, 3800, 3810), Roku Streaming Stick+, Roku Premiere, Roku Premiere+, Roku Ultra and Roku TVs.
** Subscription or other payment may be required to access certain channel content. Channel availability is subject to change and varies by country.

For more information and troubleshooting help, go to http://support.roku.com,
https://docs.roku.com/published/userprivacypolicy/en/us#userprivacypolicy-en_us-CCPA

recentChanges:
- Fixed an error loading the content page.
- Fixed a Remote layout issue.
- Improved page load performance.
comments: Another update and I still can't get to expert picture settings. Now I get an error that says to restart the TV. I do this and still same error. Everything else in the app works perfectly. Please get this fixed. Originally I rated this app 5 stars years ago. The last few months I have not been able to get to my Roku TV expert picture settings. The app crashes every time I select expert picture settings. There is no other way to get to these settings other than through this app.

Super useful! I love the fact that you can use your phone to listen privately. A couple of small peeves: 1. When I close out of the app, it still seems to run in the background sometimes. It shows up in the drop-down notification bar. (This is just an OCD thing.) 2. I'm not sure if it's my phone or headphones, but the private listening will occasionally cut out and then disconnect. It's usually easy to get reconnected, though. Overall, I'm satisfied with this Roku app!

I have LOVED this app until recently. Now, the shows I try to watch decide to randomly skip 5 minutes ahead or stop all together... You call it bug fixes, I call it bug infestations. What happened to the great streaming I previously had? I have plenty of data, not to mention the fact that I'm mostly connected to a business internet router. Previously, I would have given 5 stars, but now? I'm not even convinced it deserves one.

Amended: I added a star because I was finally able to connect the app to my device. It's pretty responsive, but the problem I'm having now is that when I use private listening, the sound will cut in and out. That makes watching things really difficult. Original review: app is useless to me. I've tried a dozen times to get this app to connect to my device. Won't connect no matter how many times I reset or redownload or restart my device and my internet. It's a hot mess üôÑ

New controls are awful. Half the time it selects when it should move or move when it should select. Swiping to move makes it move more than one space. It's like they thought it would be cool to have this new feature, but didn't think to ask end users. Also, it disconnects from the device the moment my screen turns off, which means it must be exited out and reopened before it will work.

title: The Sims‚Ñ¢ FreePlay
description:
From the creators of The Sims‚Ñ¢ comes a complete Sims experience on mobile! Grow SimTown to expand your Sim community and create an entire town with your own style, personalities and dreams!¬†Complete goals to earn Simoleons and pick up rewards along the way. Keep your Sims happy and watch them thrive as you help them live a fun and fulfilled life!
_________________

SIM-ULATING POSSIBILITIES
From head to toe ‚Äì and floor to ceiling ‚Äì customize every aspect of your Sims‚Äô lives! Keep up to 34 Sims looking stylish, and design and build their dream homes complete with swimming pools, multiple floors and incredible decor. As you get more Sims and they start a family, expand your Sim Town with a pet store, car dealership, shopping mall, and even a private villa beach! Express yourself and tell your own Sims story by unleashing your inner architect and interior designer all at once. Visit your real friends‚Äô Sim Towns, where you can form new relationships and compare your friends‚Äô interior design skills against yours.

STAY CONNECTED
Life is better together. Start relationships, fall in love, get married, and have a family. Make lifelong friends and care for pets. Throw pool parties and grill outdoors or snuggle up by the fireplace for movie night. In the mood for some trouble? There‚Äôs plenty of drama to be had when Sims don‚Äôt get along. Act silly with teens, be rude to family members, or even say no to a marriage proposal! From babies to seniors, your perfect Sims story can happen at every stage of your life simulation. Love and friendships? Drama and breakups? The choice is always yours.

ALL WORK & ALL PLAY
A Sim‚Äôs gotta work! Start different dream careers, and even follow Sims‚Äô days at the Police Station, Movie Studio, and Hospital. The more your Sims go to work, the more they learn skills and raise their salary, giving you rewards and setting them on a path to success. In their free time, choose different hobbies like cooking, fashion design, salsa dancing, and puppy training. The more involved they are, the happier they‚Äôll be, from kids to teens to adults. The opportunities are limitless when you create a life your Sims love!

_________________

FOLLOW US at
Twitter @TheSimsFreePlay
Facebook.com/TheSimsFreePlay
Instagram @TheSimsFreePlayEA
_________________

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game requires 1.8GB total storage.
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings. 
- Advertising appears in this game.
- A network connection is required to play.

recentChanges:
Care Bears are bringing sunshine to SimTown, guaranteed to make the world feel a little less blue! In the latest update of The Sims FreePlay, you‚Äôll enjoy:

The ‚ÄòShare Your Care‚Äô live event with Share Bear and Grumpy Bear. Earn a magical ‚ÄòCare A Lot‚Äô Community Center grand prize plus Care Bears plush toys, onesies and more!

comments: I LOVE the Sims games. I've been a LOOOOOONG time player, including the first pc games. But the simchase episodes kill me. I work my butt of trying to complete the challenges in time to get the prizes but the last 4 episodes tend to be impossible! The tasks take longer and longer to complete, while the challenger seems to fly through them. Paying big bucks seems like the only way to get any of the prizes. What a shame. I already know I'm going to lose yet again.

It could be better. Needs more updates than you think, our sims disappear after a while and need to make new ones, glitched money meaning expensive houses are free. Not the common sense I'd like from a game as this. The graphics and music is old. Please update that too. In other words furniture and housing is beautiful. Thank you for the new style for sims as well. With that being said the game has been untouched, only "events" happen but never music, graphics, quality has ever changed.

I know writing this review is a waste of time cause the developers only care about your money. The more you play the more expensive it will cost you. The quests are taking longer times and the only way to beat them is to spend your money. And on top of that half of my simoleons disappeared over night. Some quests want you to use 11 sims but the game will only allow 6 at a time so it takes twice as long to complete. So a 3 hour quest is now 6 hours. If it stays Ike this I will delete the game.

I just wasted 500,000 simoleons that I payed for on this "Simschase" event. I was constantly checking the game to start the next task, but I still lost every episode because I have to go to school, and sleep and actually have a life. I bought the simoleons with real money and it all got thrown away. I can't skip tasks because the only way to get social points is to have Facebook friends who also play the game. I should not have to pay and pay and pay just to play this game.

Game has gotten worse. Being forced to start events or stupid Simchase thing. Having to clear app cache and data every so often to make sure game doesn't screw up. Only reason I keep the game is so that my wife has a neighbor now that Facebook has cleared inactive players from the database. They send out updates without testing them. Too much content in a short span of time. Now looks like you have to spend real money to get things to complete tasks.

comments: Love the game but I have reached the point where I only play the 60,000 bet and win more times than not. Please add more higher bet games. Also add some more cues please I seem to have all of the current list. I like the star difficulty system, but could there be a player star amount? To see how skilled you get? poor controls, limited items on store, i expect to have tables in store but there is nothing. pls expand the store. and add more levels in 8ball and 9 ball module. and pls add a reward redeem module that will allow us to buy items using tickets
Don't waste your time until they get the controls right. Power bar changes your aim. Needs more work.
Great game but takes your shot away. By this i mean if u hit the lowest ball first, it says that u didnt hit that ball. In 9 ball
I like it! It works and doesn't freeze up. Unlike miniclip. Only bad part is you can't play with friends.

title: EVA Facial Mouse
description:
EVA FACIAL MOUSE is an application developed and promoted by CREA with the support of Fundaci√≥n Vodafone Espa√±a.

EVA FACIAL MOUSE is a free and open source application that allows the access to functions of a mobile device by means of tracking the user face captured through the frontal camera. Based on the movement of the face, the app allows the user to control a pointer on the screen (i.e., like a mouse),which provides direct access to most elements of the user interface.

People with amputations, cerebral palsy, spinal cord injury, muscular dystrophy, multiple sclerosis, amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS) or other disabilities may be beneficiaries of this app.

Due to restrictions of the Android platform, there are currently some LIMITATIONS:
‚Ä¢	Most standard keyboards do not work with EVA, so a basic keyboard is provided. Such a keyboard needs to be manually activated after the installation.
‚Ä¢	Does not work with most games. 
‚Ä¢	Browsers do not handle properly some actions (we recommend using Google Chrome).
‚Ä¢	Applications such as Maps, Earth and Gallery work with restrictions.
‚Ä¢	It cannot be used simultaneously with other applications that make use of the camera.
‚Ä¢	For obvious reasons, it has not been tested with all devices available on the market. If you find any issues with your device, please, let us know.

In this link, you can find a list of devices (tablet and mobile) that have been evaluated according to their compatibility with the EVA Facial Mouse application: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1gxuIKbw92d9USPT_SvM0iCdWjtnVcx7owJAgwM6Za6w/edit#gid=0 


EVA has been developed in collaboration with experts and users from organizations of ASPACE Confederation (Spain). In particular, ASPACE Asturias, ASPACE Barcelona, ASPACE Gipuzkoa, ASPACE Granada, APPC Tarragona and AVAPACE. Furthermore, it has been tested by CEAPAT, CRE (Le√≥n) and ASPAYM Castilla y Le√≥n.

This app uses Accessibility services.

CREA is a company devoted to the research and the development of innovative software solutions.
www.crea-si.com

The Fundaci√≥n Vodafone Espa√±a is a private, nonprofit institution that aims to improve the quality od life of vulnerable groups through the Information Technology and Communications. FVE collaborates with various entities, both public and private, in technological innovation projects and applications for autonomy, independence and social and labour integration of all people.
www.fundacionvodafone.es

In particular, ASPACE Asturias, ASPACE Barcelona, ASPACE Gipuzkoa, ASPACE Granada, APPC Tarragona and AVAPACE. Furthermore, it has been tested by CEAPAT, CRE (Le√≥n) and ASPAYM Castilla y Le√≥n.

This app uses Accessibility services.

CREA is a company devoted to the research and the development of innovative software solutions.
www.crea-si.com

The Fundaci√≥n Vodafone Espa√±a is a private, nonprofit institution that aims to improve the quality od life of vulnerable groups through the Information Technology and Communications. FVE collaborates with various entities, both public and private, in technological innovation projects and applications for autonomy, independence and social and labour integration of all people.
www.fundacionvodafone.es

comments: Idea is good but the mouse just keeps running down and to the right. Should have waited a few more years or got better developers to work on it.

1) Difficulty with vertical control, especially up. 2) When I look away, the cursor still moves. . . Why? 3) How to best calibrate the cursor/mouse? Should I try to calibrate with the cursor in the middle of the screen? The consistency is challenging Please understand the importance of my ability to use this technology. NOT only would this give me the opportunity to access "the world" from my bed, after my physical assistant has left for the day. If we can work out the kinks in this system so it is efficient for me, I would purchase the full software program

I would rate 5 stars, but the calibration must be corrected. When I do the initial face scan, it calibrates over to the left, rendering the right side of my screen impossible to move the cursor over without struggling and doing a lot unnatural body movement. I am on Asus ZenFone AR. I really do like the app, and will recommend it to anyone.

I love this kind of app,It's really works properly and it help me touch in my broken screen android phone. Only one thing is that the voice command is not responding. I'm very happy today for this app. So thankyou your developer. And guys if you have a problem in touching the phone screen then you download it. It works well......Thankyou
The best app ever although it keeps crashing and using the battery strange. That's something that the developer needs to fix, otherwise it helps me tremendously with communication

title: Build a Bridge!
description:
**Google Play Most Innovative Game 2017 - Winner**

Test your engineering and improvisation skills in a puzzle game where the stakes are as high as they get. It is you who will construct bridges for cars, trucks, busses... And sometimes even monster trucks. Gather your wits and get on with the construction!

During the planning phase the game presents itself with a simple, 2D interface. It is there that you select the best materials for your bridge and connect the dots to make the most resilient structure you can. You can approach each level as a complex puzzle, trying to be as efficient as possible and get the best solution. But don't be afraid to experiment too. You can just go crazy and construct something that looks outrageous but still somehow works. There's fun in both of these approaches.

When you're done, switch to the 3D mode and watch a car drive through your bridge. Will it hold? Or will you watch a spectacular crash? 

In addition to the normal mode the game features the easy mode for more relaxed gameplayed, focused on creativity and improvisation. You can also use in-game hint system if things get too hard. With 86 levels plus hidden and bonus bridges to construct you will not run out of things to do quickly.

Game features:
- Different materials to build from - Wood, Metal, Cables
- 86 levels of increasingly difficult puzzles 
- Varied, detailed environments full of interactive elements
- Multiple cars to test out your constructions
- Realistic physics engine 
- Beautiful, stylised art style
- Available in 13 languages

comments: Its really nice because it challenges you to build it better and better. The only 2 problems i have encountered with this game is that it goes from easy to super hard too fast! There should be more intermediate levels and slowly introducing inclines, jumps, obstacles and free standing bridges. The camera angle, OMG! This is such a headache. If you want to see where the stress is at, you have yo change it to 2D which is almost 8bit MarioBros 1 style! Its ridiculous! Still great tho!

too many ads,a game that is literally pay to win,ripoff of polybridge,honestly this game is just the poopy mobile version for polybridge,and stolen textures,those who left five stars either 1:never heard of polybridge2:think this games better because it is free and not all people can install polybridge,and i heard one person talking about how polybridge is a ripoff of this and they said "polybridge was made:2018 and this game was made: 2017 so dont believe that dont Confuse this for polybridge

The developer of this game does not respect your time. This might be the first time in like 10 years Ive written a review complaining about ads but this is ridiculous. Random 30 second ads when you lose, when you win, when you start a level, and literally being forced to watch ads to get enough "coins" to unlock a level.. & its legit 2 and a half minutes of ads to unlock the level. Its pure greed, its outrageous and ruins the game. It's fun tho if you dont mind watching ads more than playing it

I think I downloaded the Screen Saver version, because apparently, when I open the app, it NEVER gets to the main menu, or not even a loading screen. It just shows 2 islands, a "Build a Bridge" logo on the bottom left corner with some clouds passing by in the sky. I kept my phone on, charging, for the next few hours to see what would happen, and nothing. Still a screen saver. Tried uninstalling, formatting, restarting, but nothing.

I really like this game but since I'm young I don't have money and can't get the extra worlds and I beat this game fast. I ran out of levels to play because of the expense of the extra levels so can you possibly replace the payment with ads or make us beat each world to move on to the next one? Thanks in advance!

title: TikTok: It Starts with You
description:
TikTok is THE destination for mobile videos. On TikTok, short-form videos are exciting, spontaneous, and genuine. Whether you‚Äôre a sports fanatic, a pet enthusiast, or just looking for a laugh, there‚Äôs something for everyone on TikTok. All you have to do is watch, engage with what you like, skip what you don‚Äôt, and you‚Äôll find an endless stream of short videos that feel personalized just for you. From your morning coffee to your afternoon errands, TikTok has the videos that are guaranteed to make your day.

We make it easy for you to discover and create your own original videos by providing easy-to-use tools to view and capture your daily moments. Take your videos to the next level with special effects, filters, music, and more. 

‚ñ† Watch endless amount of videos customized specifically for you
A personalized video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.
 
‚ñ† Explore videos, just one scroll away
Watch all types of videos, from Comedy, Gaming, DIY, Food, Sports, Memes, and Pets, to Oddly Satisfying, ASMR, and everything in between.
 
‚ñ† Pause recording multiple times in one video
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. Shoot as many times as you need.
 
‚ñ† Be entertained and inspired by a global community of creators
Millions of creators are on TikTok showcasing their incredible skills and everyday life. Let yourself be inspired.

‚ñ† Add your favorite music or sound to your videos for free
Easily edit your videos with millions of free music clips and sounds. We curate music and sound playlists for you with the hottest tracks in every genre, including Hip Hop, Edm, Pop, Rock, Rap, and Country, and the most viral original sounds.

‚ñ† Express yourself with creative effects
Unlock tons of filters, effects, and AR objects to take your videos to the next level.

‚ñ† Edit your own videos 
Our integrated editing tools allow you to easily trim, cut, merge and duplicate video clips without leaving the app.

* Any feedback? Contact us at https://www.tiktok.com/legal/report/feedback or tweet us @tiktok_us

comments: There's actually a lot of educational and helpful people on this app from all different backgrounds and it's actually incredible to be able to learn from them. It can also just be fun and silly. It all depends on what you're looking for. I only have one real complaint and it's that I wish you had more characters to write a comment with. I'm an extremely long winded person and the limit makes it feel difficult to communicate efficiently for me. I haven't had the app for very long though. ü§∑üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄ

This app is amazing !!! It keeps you very entertained and you can spend hours on it without being bored , but there are lots of problems , minor problems and big problems. A big problem for example would be Tik Tok deleting random videos which really annoys me , some of my favourite videos have been deleted for no reason , and another huge issue is the community , the people in the comments always say mean stuff to the creators of that video and it really bugs me because I feel so bad for them.

I really enjoy the app, very much, but there are a couple/few of things I would love to see updated: *1. Make it possible to edit a video after posting (too many times I have made a last minute change, which (for whatever reason) changed the placement of an embedded text. SO IRRITATING); *2. While in the editing process, make it so the timing duration doesn't disappear; *3. Disclose how one can become "verified" (this actually may be in the app somewhere, but I haven't been able to locate it);

I love tiktok. But sometimes the app freezes and its sorta annoying. And why should we have to link our phone number? I can't text like that. And we should be able to have multiple accounts with the same phone number. I know that could be dangerous but you could notify the other account(s) with the same number to see if it is the same person. And until this is fixed I will rate one less star every month.

I like TikTok a lot and it is very addictive - I've found a lot of pages I really like, thanks to the excellent algorithm. However, I do have a couple of suggestions: 1) It'd be nice if there were a setting that allowed you to have the video either be paused or muted when you first open the app , so it wouldn't just start playing out loud in public when you don't want it to. 2) It'd be great if you could make an auto-scroll feature so you could do other things while watching videos.

title: Instagram
description:
Bringing you closer to the people and things you love. ‚Äî Instagram from Facebook

Connect with friends, share what you‚Äôre up to, or see what's new from others all over the world. Explore our community where you can feel free to be yourself and share everything from your daily moments to life's highlights.

Express Yourself and Connect With Friends

* Add photos and videos to your INSTA story that disappear after 24 hours, and bring them to life with fun creative tools.
* Message your friends in Direct. Start fun conversations about what you see on Feed and Stories.
* Post photos and videos to your feed that you want to show on your profile.

Learn More About Your Interests

* Check out IGTV for longer videos from your favorite INSTA creators.
* Get inspired by photos and videos from new INSTA accounts in Explore.
* Discover brands and small businesses, and shop products that are relevant to your personal style.

Menlo Park, CA 94025

comments: I've really hated this app from day 1, but I never complained since it kept me coming back, but now it's completely useless to me. I only use instagram to keep up with a few of my close friends and sometimes post some of my art. But now with recommended posts, my feed is filled with pictures that I just don't want to see. I can't use this app anymore, I was mad when they made it so posts weren't shown in chronological order, but now I'm livid. I've no more reason to keep using instagram.

I have been using Instagram since like, last year. This is the first time I've encountered this problem. I have 2 accounts logged into the app, my finsta and my main. Since I use my finsta more, it's the one that's logged in whenever I update the app. But then I log into my main and the features are all the old ones? Fix this, or like add a feature where you update the app 1 time per account, and then I'll give this 5 stars.

I been on Instagram since it was released for android. I always loved it,but the amounts of ads has become unbearable. Its ugly, noisy, intrusive and tacky. I'm hoping for better days. Edit 2020 oct And then the mute button didn't work anymore. Is it just for more "never-ending content vibes", is it a bug or is it pure evil? I don't even know anymore. When I scroll I can't keep going to my own follow list? Nonono, you gotta be tipped about more content, more accounts, It's never enough. Toxic.

Over the last few days my posts have been getting arbitrarily flagged immediately after I post them, supposedly for breaking the Community Guidelines. I'm incredibly frustrated by this and there seems to be no way to stop this from happening. Same thing has happened to several other friends of mine. Whatever change was recently made to your automated flagging system needs to be undone immediately, as it is flagging accounts for no apparent reason.

Not good for tablets. I am using a tablet. The stories are cropped from top and bottom. It's annoying. Scrolling in tablets is not continuous and smooth. The scrolling jumps to the next post below, I am not able to see the description of the post. Overall, this app has not been designed and tested for tablets. It is disappointing and, tbh, a company like Facebook should be able to handle a simple thing like variations in aspect ratios. I guess they don't have many tablet users so they don't care

title: Google Support Services
description:
The Google Support Services (GSS) app allows you to share your Android device screen with a Google customer support agent for a personalized support experience. With GSS on your device, the agent can invite you to share your screen, and guide you with on-screen annotations making it faster and easier to resolve your issue. While sharing your screen, the agent will not be able to control your device, but will be able see your screen to help explain their instructions. You can completely stop or pause sharing your screen at any time.
 
 This app comes pre-installed on Pixel devices, and Nexus devices with Android 7.1.1 or higher; it can be installed on most devices with Android 5.0 or higher. This app cannot be started by itself and is used only when a Google customer support agent sends an invite to the user to share their screen.

comments: I am really grateful for Google services help. I stick when it comes to having a technological know how is irritating to me. This app has saved me and keeps me from crashing anymore computers, tablets especially I went through 41 mobile phones before this and now thanks to this Google services app I have had the same mobile phone for over a year and a half. Thank you Google.

Horrible!! App will not connect with representative..shuts down every time. Google reps don't care. I have multiple issues with my Google account..no support other than email. Impossible to explain and ridiculous that this app is available but won't work and not one rep even questions why or tries to figure it out? Its a new Samsung S20 plus..it should work on my phone. I feel as if I've wasted a lot of money on a Google based phone that I have no direct support for...unacceptable.

I see people on this app angry top. Had 5 month of hell with pixel 3a. The last week has been a replacement handset and now this one does not recongnise having a sim.. i feel sorry the peeps anwering the phones for google as they have have been hung out to dry. The one that called me the morning did not show as the usuall California number. It was his real name and location and phone number Got screenshots to prove it. Google can't even protect there own data lmao. Never mind us customers
I'm still having trouble with my pixel 3A receiving text and sending text nobody seems to have an answer not even Google support I guess it's a spiritual thing
Because after I installed the app it's say to uninstall and I call Google phone number and it sent me to this app and it's doesn't not work for me

title: pCloud: Free Cloud Storage
description:
With pCloud you can store files from multiple devices to a one beautiful and intuitive cloud storage space. 

Upon joining we will present you with 10 GB FREE cloud storage! 

With pCloud you can:

- expand your phone's storage with up to 2 TB!
- backup all camera photos and videos automatically.
- sync files across all your devices.
- access your files even if you are offline.
- share files, track changes and statistics.
- encrypt your sensitive data with a military-grade client-side encryption - pCloud Crypto¬Æ.
- play music with a built-in audio player.
- upload quickly, regardless of the file size.
 

pCloud is also available for iOS, Windows, MacOS, Linux and any popular web browser. 

Read our Terms of service for full disclosure. 

Learn more about the permissions we use:
https://www.pcloud.com/help/android-help-center/what-permissions-does-the-android-app-require

comments: The cloud itself is pretty fine, but the app is weak in terms of a cloud app. It can't check file checksum to see if the file already exists so that it doesn't re-upload it. Multi selection of the items are not possible, you should select them manually by hand, which is funny! Recently I've seen some instances of users complaining that pCloud or other 3rd parties scan your files to check if there are any so called "illegal" files and they terminate your account. This is the opposite of privacy!

No way to upload files and open new folders. Yet it reads: "created folder": "uploaded files". Network ok. Other fully functional apps. Update today 22/10/2020. Version2.11.2. But already with the previous version ie version 2.9.1 I had the same problems. But momentary, not like today. Thanks for the attention. Good job . In Trust I always leave 3 stars. GOOD DAY .Review update 22/10/2020 All solved for now. Thanks for the effort, the commitment and the seriousness. Let's go to 4‚≠ê

Looked far and wide, this is the best there is. If you are like me and have bunch of media on your external hdd which makes it very inaccessible to you. Then this is for you, the media streaming facility is excellent. I've compared it's lifetime plan against Google drive, idrive, purchasing a nas. It's without a doubt the most sensible choice.

Still now it's good to use. But one think I want to know,after installing day to now present time, how much MB (products) I upload on this "pCloud" free cloud storage,I found 1 thing is not going well, For ex:- supposed that, I upload 20 MB on this 'pCloud" store,but the problem is I see,everytime I upload any file any size,after completing upload,if I go settings-app & notification-click on this "pCloud" I see as much (MB/GB) upload on "pCloud" storage,this app size will also expend the same.

This company isn't able to repair a bug in the audio player reported 8 months ago. After I sent a reminder I got a reply saying: "Be advised that your feedback has been provided to the Android team months ago. You don't need to worry, we are already working on a new and improved Audio player." - That was in July, no change since then. They claim to be "a young forward-thinking team doing our best to make a significant impact on the rapidly growing IT market". Not like this, guys.

title: WhatsApp Messenger
description:
WhatsApp from Facebook

WhatsApp Messenger is a FREE messaging app available for Android and other smartphones. WhatsApp uses your phone's Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to let you message and call friends and family. Switch from SMS to WhatsApp to send and receive messages, calls, photos, videos, documents, and Voice Messages.

WHY USE WHATSAPP:

‚Ä¢ NO FEES: WhatsApp uses your phone's Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to let you message and call friends and family, so you don't have to pay for every message or call.* There are no subscription fees to use WhatsApp.

‚Ä¢ MULTIMEDIA: Send and receive photos, videos, documents, and Voice Messages.

‚Ä¢ FREE CALLS: Call your friends and family for free with WhatsApp Calling, even if they're in another country.* WhatsApp calls use your phone's Internet connection rather than your cellular plan's voice minutes. (Note: Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details. Also, you can't access 911 and other emergency service numbers through WhatsApp).

‚Ä¢ GROUP CHAT: Enjoy group chats with your contacts so you can easily stay in touch with your friends or family.

‚Ä¢ WHATSAPP WEB: You can also send and receive WhatsApp messages right from your computer's browser.

‚Ä¢ NO INTERNATIONAL CHARGES: There's no extra charge to send WhatsApp messages internationally. Chat with your friends around the world and avoid international SMS charges.*

‚Ä¢ SAY NO TO USERNAMES AND PINS: Why bother having to remember yet another username or PIN? WhatsApp works with your phone number, just like SMS, and integrates seamlessly with your phone's existing address book.

‚Ä¢ ALWAYS LOGGED IN: With WhatsApp, you're always logged in so you don't miss messages. No more confusion about whether you're logged in or logged out.

‚Ä¢ QUICKLY CONNECT WITH YOUR CONTACTS: Your address book is used to quickly and easily connect you with your contacts who have WhatsApp so there's no need to add hard-to-remember usernames.

‚Ä¢ OFFLINE MESSAGES: Even if you miss your notifications or turn off your phone, WhatsApp will save your recent messages until the next time you use the app.

‚Ä¢ AND MUCH MORE: Share your location, exchange contacts, set custom wallpapers and notification sounds, broadcast messages to multiple contacts at once, and more!

*Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details.

--------------------------------------------------------- 
We're always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at:

android-support@whatsapp.com

or follow us on twitter:

http://twitter.com/WhatsApp
@WhatsApp
---------------------------------------------------------
