comments: I'm on my PC and when i try to open the app, it doesn't work for some reason, i don't actully know why, i think you maybe did it so later in the future, the PC addition will become arrived, if you are reading this, this is NOT false information, instead it is true, anyone comment for some suggestions, i need a few because i'm actully starting to get annoyed, i've already downloaded it on my tablet, but i can't on my PC, creators, when it is 15 days, make sure you add the PC version or addition because that would be a bit helpful, if you can't, i'll comment again if there is any more bug's to fix and what the idea is, i hope you add PC addition or version, because i really really want it now or later, i hope it's a bit early, because if it is early, that would really make my day, i hope you can see this, developer's but also, make sure you add a sandbox to it, well it does sound a bit bad, though if you add a sandbox, new player's will enjoy it so really, do it because it'd be so nice if you did, i hope it will be in early development because that would be nice, trust me when this hits 300 words this will end, lets talk about the PC version or addition, if you actully made a baldi or roblox planet, i'm actully going to be so jealous, so please add it soon, i would appreciate it so please add all the features i explained, it was worth it, was it because i hope so, well my brain will explode soon but it wont actully, just a joke, i am not making fun of you developers.

Something is wrong with this game. Almost nothing works and I can't even tell what most things are supposed to be. There are no instructions. No labels on buttons. I was able to find a few buttons that did something among all of the different screens but that's it. One dramatically increased the coins per tap. I then tapped for quite a while to see if somethijg, anything, would happen. Nope. Especially frustrating as the buttons do behave like they are working. Art style is nice, unique.

Itd be neat if there was a button that stops the story slides every time you reset Also (might be my phone not sure) I cant always access the leaderboards Also I think the pets and or backgrounds shouldnt get repeated unless having multiple give some boost another thing it would be nice if master beggar stayed active or paused or maybe like half speed when you go over to other tabs rather than just not letting you go to other tabs and a master beggar upgrade that costs gold potions would be cool

Good app. The grammar is a little bit bad. Not all. Please make a free coins by watching ads. Also the potion. Please 5 or 3 potion per ads pls. Thankyou. Your apps is good. Edit: TY for reply. Hm I also want to ask if can you please make a button where we can on and off the thing below the trainer, i mean the option. So we can play it full screen. Its hard to click when phone is small. Please. I really really love your app. Im willing to watch ads to support you guys. Hehe. Staysafe!

Amazing game! I've spent about $45 on it and I have to say it was money well spent. The grammar's a bit off, but I believe it's the translation. It's a tapping game, you can earn potions to benefit you (or buy them), you can hire people once you get enough coins to get money for you, you can customize your character, the background, and that's all I can think of off the top of my head. Overall, really great game!

title: Google
description:
The Google app keeps you in the know about things that matter to you. Find quick answers, explore your interests, and stay up to date with Discover. The more you use the Google app, the better it gets.

Search and browse:
- Nearby shops and restaurants
- Live sports scores and schedules
- Movies times, casts, and reviews
- Videos and images
- News, stock information, and more
- Anything you‚Äôd find on the web

Get personalized updates in Discover*:
- Stay in the know about topics that interest you
- Start your morning with weather and top news
- Get updates on sports, movies, and events
- Know as soon as your favorite artists drop new albums
- Get stories about your interests and hobbies
- Follow interesting topics, right from Search results

comments: Only one problem, 3 days ago, I could still search things, but whenever I tap to go on a website, it acts like its disconnected even if my tablet is connected to the Wi-Fi. It just freezes and does nothing so now I can't go on websites anymore! Can you tell me what the problem is so I can fix it? If you don't have the answer, I'll be bored forever without going to any websites! üò°üò°üò° I hate this app sometimes because of this problem, but it only happened there.

About 1 out of every 4 searches won't go through. They'll load for a second before the bar gets stuck at the end, and no search results populate the screen. Nothing is wrong with my phone or internet. Chrome app searches work 100% of the time. Google app is the issue, its been like this off and on for years, but recently has been acting up constantly.

I am using a oneplus nord and whenever i search, this kept showing me ' check your internet connection' even when my connection is fast. Now, after the recent update, it is not even showing that, its just a blank white screen and nothing else. Sometimes it's working when i try again after reopening the app. Most of the time its not. Hope you'll fix this problem ASAP.

So actually, i like google since years ago. But 3 days ago or 1 week ago, i can't translate. It's maybe not like i need to update it, beacuse it only said "UNINSTALL OPEN". So it's probablly confusing. I don't know why i can't translate. And also, There's a lot of bugs that i can't explain. Please fix these. Thank you! By the way, I apologize for my wrong grammars or bad english.

I'm honestly going to switch to another app. Google has been ok with simple searches. However with the election coming up I've been trying to search up different facts and information on Biden and Trump, only to find rather biased results. I can even look up specific dates, name, and even addresses. The results are the same, many articles on things Trump has done wrong, or praise articles on Biden. It's not because of my search relevance either, I had all of that reset. Very disappointed.

THE DATAVIZ¬Æ ADVANTAGE
‚Ä¢ Founded in 1984, DataViz is an industry leader in developing mobile Office & productivity solutions for Android, iOS, and more. 
‚Ä¢ Documents To Go, now in its 15th year, is currently preloaded on millions of devices around the world and has been downloaded over 40 million times on Android. 
‚Ä¢ InTact Technology‚Ñ¢ retains original document formatting of edited files.

‚Ä¢ All your files in one app - no need to download separate components or cloud service/drive apps. 
‚Ä¢ Multiple file save & synchronization options ‚Äì Save & sync directly to your Android device, desktop & laptop via USB*, and to various cloud services*.
‚Ä¢ Technical support is available via email & via our robust knowledgebase at DataViz.com.

NEW in v4.0: 
‚Ä¢ Editing is now free for new users and existing Docs To Go ‚ÄòViewer Edition‚Äô users.
‚Ä¢ App redesign ‚Äì Modernized user interface includes a refined file explorer and easy access to extensive editing & formatting options without sacrificing valuable screen real estate.
‚Ä¢ Cloud services support* ‚Äì View, edit, save, and sync with multiple cloud services: Dropbox, Box, OneDrive, and Google Drive.
‚Ä¢ Android v. 9 (Pie) OS compatible.

OVERALL SUITE FEATURES: 
‚Ä¢ Includes both Android smartphone & tablet versions in one download.
‚Ä¢ View, edit, and create MS Office files (97-2016).
‚Ä¢ View PDF files.
‚Ä¢ Save changes directly to your device, memory card, multiple cloud services*, or to your Windows computer with our desktop/laptop application*.
‚Ä¢ Send & receive supported email attachments using Gmail or your favorite email app.
‚Ä¢ File sorting manager (sort your file list by Name, Modified, Size, etc.).
‚Ä¢ Localized in English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, Arabic, Polish, Czech.

WORD TO GO FEATURES: 
‚Ä¢ Format font type, size, color, bold, italics, underline, and highlight text
‚Ä¢ High fidelity viewing for embedded graphics, tables, bookmarks, comments, footnotes/endnotes, text boxes, table of contents, and hyperlinks
‚Ä¢ Change paragraph alignment
‚Ä¢ Edit bullets & numbering
‚Ä¢ Find & replace
‚Ä¢ View Tracked Changes 
‚Ä¢ Word count
‚Ä¢ Open password protected Word 97-2016 files* 

SHEET TO GO FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Freeze panes
‚Ä¢ Sort
‚Ä¢ Auto-fit 
‚Ä¢ Extensive cell, number, and sheet formatting options
‚Ä¢ 111 functions supported
‚Ä¢ Insert, delete, resize, hide/unhide rows & columns
‚Ä¢ Rename, insert, and delete worksheets
‚Ä¢ Find/find next
‚Ä¢ View charts
‚Ä¢ Open password protected Excel 97-2016 files* 

SLIDESHOW TO GO FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Effortlessly ‚Äúflick‚Äù through slides
‚Ä¢ Rehearse timing
‚Ä¢ View speaker notes
‚Ä¢ Sort and edit slides, including promote/demote bullets
‚Ä¢ Open password protected PowerPoint 97-2016 files*

PDF TO GO FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ High-fidelity viewing of PDF files with page view, word wrap, auto-rotate, bookmarks, search, and select/copy text options
‚Ä¢ Pinch-to-zoom to desired PDF page size/width
‚Ä¢ Open password-protected PDFs*

*Select features only available via in-app purchase in Docs To Go, such as file access via cloud services, desktop sync (Windows only), and password-protected file support.

title: DRM Info
description:
*THIS IS A DEVELOPER TOOL ONLY*
*If you have problem with your media app, contact that app's support*

This app will display the information of the Digital Right Management (DRM) module from Android Media Framework and MediaDrm API.

This app only shows the info, and is not doing any test on the availability. 

Popular media apps (e.g. Netflix, Disney+) rely on DRM (e.g. Widevine / PlayReady) and HDCP for content protection. However, they may also implement additional limitation such as whitelist or blacklist. Please contact that media app, not this app, if you have any difficulty on their app.

Ads revenue of this app is used for paying the Ads Network so you could find this app easier.

This app currently support the following DRM module (will display only when supported)
- CENC ClearKey
- Adobe Primetime
- Google Widevine Modular DRM
- Marlin 
- Microsoft PlayReady
- Verimatrix
- Wiseplay DRM

This app usually update twice a month, to include the update from AndroidX and Firebase. These changes are invisible to most users.

This app is Free, sponsor me at https://github.com/sponsors/seventhmoon

To learn more, you may visit the following links which mentioned about this app.
- https://www.ghacks.net/2016/12/03/check-your-android-devices-drm-capabilities/
- https://android.gadgethacks.com/how-to/check-if-your-phone-can-stream-hd-video-from-netflix-amazon-prime-video-other-services-0181603/
- https://hometheatrelife.com/check-drm-info-android/
- https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/11/16/drm-info-android-app-reports-widevine-and-playready-drm-information/
- https://www.androidauthority.com/widevine-explained-821935/
- http://www.androidpolice.com/2017/12/10/oneplus-5-5t-cant-play-netflix-hd-feature-will-added-point/

title: Free phone calls, free texting SMS on free number
description:
Houseparty with Dingtone group chat!
Dingtone, a free calling app allows you to make unlimited free phone calls, send free text messages to anyone. Dingtone also gives you a free number as 2nd line, a real phone number with local area code for free calling and free texting. You can call any mobile/landline phone numbers in over 200 countries and regions, your friends don‚Äôt need to install the app. 

Make free phone calls and send text messages
Get real phone numbers for your phone/tablet
Cheap or free international calls to 200+ countries and regions
Local phone numbers for you to choose: US, Canada, UK, Belgium, Netherlands, Australia, France, Sweden, Mauritius, Poland, Austria, Indonesia, Puerto Rico, Czech Republic, Malaysia, Denmark, Romania 
Free calls or texts to friends and families
Group phone calls and conference calls


Get a real US phone number for free
Add 2nd, 3rd line to your phone/tablet 
Call & text to any phone numbers for free


Free Calls & Free Texting
Dingtone lets you make unlimited free internet calls to anyone over WiFi, 3G/4G data network without using any cell minutes; Invite your family members and friends to use the free phone call app for free internet calling and free SMS, and start saving money now.

Real US Phone Numbers
Get a real US phone number as a second line without adding an extra SIM card. Enjoy crystal-clear phone calls and unlimited texts on phones and tablets.
 

Cheap or Free International Calls
Call any mobile/landline phone numbers in over 200 countries and regions at super low rates. Calls between Dingtone users are free. Caller ID is supported so that your friends know it is you who are calling.

Crystal Clear Calls
Voice calls are transmitted on Dingtone's high-quality dedicated VoIP network. With HD voice technologies, most free online calls between Dingtone users have superior clarity to existing regular phone service. Free calls and cheap calls are no longer cheap quality! With Dingtone, you can make or receive calls even under bad cellular reception.

Walkie Talkie Re-invented
Tired of typing text messages on the small screen? Dingtone transforms your phone into a real Walkie Talkie - simply push a button and speak. It works like a two-way radio! Push to talk and voicemail are perfectly tied into one clean interface. 

Amazing Premium Features
Dingtone provides various Premium features including visual voicemail, call blocking, call forwarding, call recording, etc.

Why use Dingtone?

Dingtone is super simple and fast. You can use it when you have no cell minutes or under bad cellular. Just download Dingtone and you can make free international calls, send free SMS.

Free phone calls home and abroad
Unlimited text messages to/from anyone
Great call quality, hd voice over cellular data & wifi
Walkie talkie mode for instant push to talk
Group conference calls up to 8 people
Group messaging with up to 100+ people

The best free calls & free texting app ever.

Learn more at http://www.dingtone.me
Need Help? http://dingtone.me/support

Dont install or waste your time....

This app is really great if you know your email password. But, I finally found mine, and used it, and this app is great! You can call and text. obviously. But you just watch videos to get credits, and watchibg videos to talk to people isn't bad compared to paying each month. This app os great. LOVE IT!!!!

title: Samsung Calculator
description:
[Key features]
Perform four fundamental operations and engineering calculations.

To start the engineering calculator, tap the engineering calculator icon.

To check the calculation history, tap the calculation history icon. To close the calculation history panel, tap the keypad icon.

You can use the previously inputted formulas. Tap the formula you need from the calculation history.

[Additional features]
To convert units, tap the unit calculator button. You can easily convert various types of units, such as area, length, and temperature.

This software uses the Apache License 2.0. The details can be found at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.

developerAddress: 129, Samsung-ro, Yeongtong-gu, Suwon-si, Gyeonggi-do, 16677, Rep. of KOREA
recentChanges: ‚ñ† A few bugs have been fixed.
comments: This app is better than any other calculator app. I've never had issues with this app. Its big buttons and visual makes it easy on the eyes and fun, doesn't glitch, and it does exactly what I need it to do with no bells and whistles. Though as of today 10/08/2020 I went to use it to work on some things and noticed it has mysteriously uninstalled itself. But guess what - I installed it RIGHT back lolüòÑ.

Try to make the UI simple instead of going here and there or copy the MI calculator app.Try to provide the calculation history in the entry field itself. So we can easily check the correctness of the calculation without going to the history window. Also while using scientific calculator I have to rotate the mobile. It is annoying and it is very difficult in field condition.

Samsung this is a request to please make more user friendly ui of calculator app. To open the trigonometric and other functions, we need to rotate the mobile. Just a suggestion that it would be great if there can be a slide(swap from right to left) feature which can open those functions in portrait mode only. Thanks n regards

It's a very good app, it calculate very accurately, it's very easy to use( just press the numbers like the real calculator and then press = to get your results) or tilt your phone to go to crazy super nerdy mode. Thank you Samsung for making calculations so easy.
There is no innovation in this app, I could not see and user friendly approach here. I expect real time innovative and creative approach from Samsung. Greetings !

title: Messages
description:
Meet Messages, Google‚Äôs official app for texting (SMS, MMS) and chat (RCS). With Messages, you can communicate with anyone in any location with the reliability of texting and the richness of chat.  Connect with friends and family through group messages, shared photos, videos, GIFs, emoji, and more. Intuitive and modern, Messages makes conversations easy, expressive, and fun.

Richer messaging with chat features (RCS)
In supported conversations, you can send and receive messages over Wi-Fi or your data network, share images and videos in high quality, see when friends are typing or when they've read your message, and more. 

Simple, intuitive, and comfortable design
Instant notifications, smart replies, and a modern design make communicating easy, fast, and convenient. You can send and receive texts on your mobile phone, computer or tablet. And with dark mode, you can use Messages comfortably in low-light situations..

Easy sharing
Easily take pictures and videos directly from the in-app camera or share from the media gallery. You can also send audio messages, share your location or contacts, and send and receive payments with Google Pay.

Express yourself
Communicate with friends, family, and groups in more fun and expressive ways using emojis, GIFs, and stickers.

Powerful search
Find more shared content in your conversations: tap on the search icon and select a specific contact to see your messaging history with them and all your shared text messages, images, videos, places, and links.

Safer conversations
With real-time spam detection, Messages helps prevent spam from entering your inbox so chatting is easier and safer.

Messages is supported on devices running Android‚Ñ¢ 5.0 Lollipop and above.

comments: None of my text messages are being sent. Whenever I try to send one I keep seeing "Not sent. Tap to try again." My text messages won't go through unless the recipient sends me a text message first, only then can I send that contact messages. This is really frustrating and I've already tried numerous methods to fix it but nothing is working.

Typically a great messging app. Although it has been bugged very badly recently, mostly through media messages. More often then not pictures will not come through and in the rare case they do, they will only be displayed in thumbnail form and when clicked to expand will show previous pictures in the thread! Not the expected and typical performance ive come to know and love from google, you know the ones who developed android?üòí

I'm using the OnePlus 8T and I'm using Google messages. I'm able to send pictures to friends but when I try and send video messages it says 'message not sent: couldn't resize video'. I have video on lowest setting when recording (1080) and frame rate (30). Still won't sent. The video will send to other OnePlus users but when I sent to other androids like samsung and iphones it don't send at all even if the video is 2 seconds long still will not send. Can you help me?

MMS won't send pics, attach pics to messages never displays them in Gallery. Support tells me to reinstall the app as a fix. My question to support is why release an app in the first place that requires something like that for what's considered base functionality for a cell phone? You're taking away Hangouts which I used for txt before, so this is unacceptable to me as a solution.

The app is the default SMS option on my phone. I've used it for years, and a bug since last winter has started deleting SMS history, which isn't recoverable. I lost years of conversations with people, and Google hasn't bothered to fix the app. This is beyond infuriating. The only restoration is to wipe my phone, use Pixel backup, still lose a week's of conversations, and then manually backup my SMS content each day. This is a well-reported issue, and Google doesn't offer a real solution.

title: Mopria Print Service
description:
Mopria Print Service enables printing on your Android smartphone or tablet to Mopria¬Æ certified printers and multi-function printers (MFP) from Brother, Canon, DEVELOP, Epson, Fuji Xerox, Gestetner, HP, Infotec, Konica Minolta, Kyocera, Lanier, Lenovo, Lexmark,  NEC, NRG, Pantum, RICOH, Samsung, Savin, Sharp, TA Triumph Adler-UTAX, Toshiba and Xerox. The companies who make these devices have collaborated to create the Mopria Print Service to make printing easier and create an industry-wide print solution. Print. Scan. Go. 

If you want to check to see if you printer is Mopria¬Æ certified before installing the Mopria Print Service, check here:  http://mopria.org/certified-products. 

Easily print photos, web pages and documents when your mobile device is connected to a Mopria¬Æ certified printer through a wireless network or using Wi-Fi Direct¬Æ. Control print settings such as color, number of copies, duplex, paper size, page range, media type and orientation.  In the workplace, take advantage of the advanced punching, folding, stapling, PIN printing, user authentication, and accounting features.

The Mopria Print Service also allows users to print using the Share feature from many of their favorite apps including Facebook, Flipboard, LinkedIn, Twitter and Pinterest, giving users the power to print easily. When using the Share feature, users will see a Mopria Print Service option is included as an option after email and messaging. The Share icon is conspicuously placed and users simply select the Mopria Print Service option, select their printer, adjust settings and print.  

Mopria Print Service is pre-installed on some Android and Amazon devices. The device manufacturer determines which devices have the Mopria Print Service pre-installed and if the Mopria Print Service can be uninstalled from such devices.

For more detailed information, visit the following website: http://mopria.org/en/faq.

title: Telegram
description:
Pure instant messaging ‚Äî simple, fast, secure, and synced across all your devices. Over 400 million active users.

FAST: Telegram is the fastest messaging app on the market, connecting people via a unique, distributed network of data centers around the globe.

SYNCED: You can access your messages from all your devices at once. Start typing on your phone and finish the message from your tablet or laptop. Never lose your data again.

UNLIMITED: You can send media and files, without any limits on their type and size. Your entire chat history will require no disk space on your device, and will be securely stored in the Telegram cloud for as long as you need it.

SECURE: We made it our mission to provide the best security combined with ease of use. Everything on Telegram, including chats, groups, media, etc. is encrypted using a combination of 256-bit symmetric AES encryption, 2048-bit RSA encryption, and Diffie‚ÄìHellman secure key exchange.

POWERFUL: You can create group chats for up to 200,000 members, share large videos, documents of any type (.DOCX, .MP3, .ZIP, etc.), and even set up bots for specific tasks. It's the perfect tool for hosting online communities and coordinating teamwork.

RELIABLE: Built to deliver your messages in the minimum bytes possible, Telegram is the most reliable messaging system ever made. It works even on the weakest mobile connections. 

FUN: Telegram has powerful photo and video editing tools and an open sticker/GIF platform to cater to all your expressive needs.

SIMPLE: While providing an unprecedented array of features, we are taking great care to keep the interface clean. With its minimalist design, Telegram is lean and easy to use.

100% FREE & NO ADS: Telegram is free and will always be free. We are not going to sell ads or introduce subscription fees. 

PRIVATE: We take your privacy seriously and will never give third parties access to your data.

For those interested in maximum privacy, Telegram offers Secret Chats. Secret Chat messages can be programmed to self-destruct automatically from both participating devices. This way you can send all types of disappearing content ‚Äî messages, photos, videos, and even files. Secret Chats use end-to-end encryption to ensure that a message can only be read by its intended recipient.

We keep expanding the boundaries of what you can do with a messaging app. Don‚Äôt wait years for older messengers to catch up with Telegram ‚Äî join the revolution today.
descriptionHTML:
Pure instant messaging ‚Äî simple, fast, secure, and synced across all your devices. Over 400 million active users.

FAST: Telegram is the fastest messaging app on the market, connecting people via a unique, distributed network of data centers around the globe.

SYNCED: You can access your messages from all your devices at once. Start typing on your phone and finish the message from your tablet or laptop. Never lose your data again.

UNLIMITED: You can send media and files, without any limits on their type and size. Your entire chat history will require no disk space on your device, and will be securely stored in the Telegram cloud for as long as you need it.

SECURE: We made it our mission to provide the best security combined with ease of use. Everything on Telegram, including chats, groups, media, etc. is encrypted using a combination of 256-bit symmetric AES encryption, 2048-bit RSA encryption, and Diffie‚ÄìHellman secure key exchange.

POWERFUL: You can create group chats for up to 200,000 members, share large videos, documents of any type (.DOCX, .MP3, .ZIP, etc.), and even set up bots for specific tasks. It's the perfect tool for hosting online communities and coordinating teamwork.

RELIABLE: Built to deliver your messages in the minimum bytes possible, Telegram is the most reliable messaging system ever made. It works even on the weakest mobile connections.

FUN: Telegram has powerful photo and video editing tools and an open sticker/GIF platform to cater to all your expressive needs.

SIMPLE: While providing an unprecedented array of features, we are taking great care to keep the interface clean. With its minimalist design, Telegram is lean and easy to use.

100% FREE & NO ADS: Telegram is free and will always be free. We are not going to sell ads or introduce subscription fees.

PRIVATE: We take your privacy seriously and will never give third parties access to your data.

For those interested in maximum privacy, Telegram offers Secret Chats. Secret Chat messages can be programmed to self-destruct automatically from both participating devices. This way you can send all types of disappearing content ‚Äî messages, photos, videos, and even files. Secret Chats use end-to-end encryption to ensure that a message can only be read by its intended recipient.

We keep expanding the boundaries of what you can do with a messaging app. Don‚Äôt wait years for older messengers to catch up with Telegram ‚Äî join the revolution today.
summary: Telegram is a messaging app with a focus on speed and security.
developerAddress: Business Central Towers, Tower A, Office 1003/1004, P.O. Box 501919, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
recentChanges:
Pinned Messages 2.0, Improved Live Locations, Playlists and More

‚Ä¢ Pin several messages in any chat
‚Ä¢ View pinned messages on a separate page
‚Ä¢ Get alerts when friends sharing their live location are close and see which way they are looking

‚Ä¢ View detailed statistics about the performance of individual posts in your channels

View the complete list of changes in-app or on our blog
comments: I installed a new update of Telegram, but I still want the ability to folder the messages stored in this good program to be created and come. Well, we save hundreds of messages every day, which are separate topics such as science sports and even lessons for students. If this content can be separated, it will be very good because it will take less time for us to find the content. Thanks to you.

I love this app but after the latest update it has so many bugs! I see latest updates in channels and chats but after I close the app and open it again, it send me notifications for that seen messages again and again! And the other problem is that I get the notifications for new messages but they don't load in chats and channels!!! It's so annoying... Please fix it .

No way to delete my info. Installed to find no way to make calls. Very unclear about why the selected only 3 contacts to sync out of my list. Was hoping to be able to make voip calls but this does not replace a conventional messenger and phone. No dial pad. No video calls like I was under the impression were here. Just really unsure what the point of the AP is all together. Like is this just for messeging strangers? I don't want that at all.

i updated the app last night and since then it doesn't shows the last message in some channels and groups. you can see the last message from chat list but when you open the channel it's not there. and it skips some messages in channels or groups. it also doesn't show the source channel when i forward a message to my own channel.

I would give it a 5 star rating. The animation are great and the fact that I have been told that I can send file/s up to 2gb in size is great (Not done so as yet) The problem ‚ö†Ô∏è I am having is I receive no notification sounds. Just vibration. I have looked up and down on how to change it, but no joyüòê

title: SmartThings
description:
With SmartThings, you can connect and control multiple devices quicker and easier. No matter where you are, you can monitor and control smart devices, home appliances (refrigerator, wine cellar, washer, dryer, oven range, dishwasher, cooktop, robot vacuum, air conditioner, air purifier and etc.)
, TVs, and speakers registered on the server.

[Key features]
- Remotely control and check the status of devices registered through a Wi-Fi AP.
- Group multiple devices into a Mode and control them simultaneously.
- Configure your device settings, including the time and operating conditions, and operate them automatically.
- Invite others to a location where devices are registered to enable shared control.
- The notification feature allows you to receive status information about your device.

‚Äª SmartThings is optimized for Samsung smartphones. Some features may be limited when used with other vendors' smartphones.
‚Äª Some features may not be available in all countries.

[App requirements]
Some mobile devices may not be supported.
- RAM size : 2GB over

‚Äª App permissions
The following permissions are required for the app service. For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed. 
 
[Required access permissions]
‚Ä¢ Location: Find nearby devices using Bluetooth or BLE.
                    Automate actions using GPS. 
                   (GPS is optional.)

[Optional access permissions]
‚Ä¢ Camera: Scan QR codes.
‚Ä¢ Contacts: Verify user information that will be delivered while transferring files.
‚Ä¢ Microphone: Used to provide voice control function using microphone.
‚Ä¢ Storage: Save and use plugins and app data, and transfer content and files via the app.
‚Ä¢ Phone: Check for app updates, identify the user's country, and transfer content and files via the app.

What's new

comments: The overall system/hub is great. However, this app is slow and clunky. Classic was better. It takes some time to load everything on launch before I can do anything. Then, when you go into a device, there's only a tiny space on the sides to scroll. Otherwise, if you scroll in the middle fast, it won't scroll, gotta go slow and it looks like it wants to select an option. You simply cannot scroll past a color wheel for a light because you'll just be selecting a color instead of scrolling. Annoying.

Could use a little work. Looks are better than the features. I wish for the oven connection, I didn't have to start while right in front of it and rather be able to at least start keep warm to get the oven started. Also that you have to stop oven to change which to a different setting then have to be once more right in front of oven to begin the new setting. I do understand it for security, but I think there should be a way to also disable temp for more secure homes.

If anyone else in your home uses the app to do something on the tv it basically makes your app unusable for the rest of the day. My wife used it and I try to use it a few minutes later to change the settings on my tv and I'm stuck in an infinite sign in loop. It's stupid. Why even add a feature to add other accounts to the group if only one can even navigate the app at a time?

Edit: Still not compatible with Android 11. I've been paying monthly for my smart Tracker service that I'm not able to use. This is unacceptable from such a large company. Not compatible with Android 11 can use my tracker anymore. Reached out to support and they told me an official version of Android is not supported... Reached out to support again and they said android 11 isn't supported because it's in beta. It hasn't been in beta for almost a month now and I can't use my smart Tracker.

The app says we have to download an add on. I press download and it says we can't download it, contact us. I contacted several times and didn't get any feedback. Well done guys. Even when it works, the touchpad works only once !!! After that you have to restart the app to use the touchpad But, someone's you can't even stop the app.

title: Samsung Music
description:
Samsung Music is optimized for Samsung android device and provides a powerful music play functionality and the best user interface.

Key Features

1. Supports playback of various sound formats such as MP3, WMA, AAC, FLAC.
2. Helps to effectively manage song lists by categories.(Track,Album,Artist,Genre,Folder,Composer)
3. Supports a new user experience that easily interact with Samsung smart devices like Tablet,TV(DLNA,Screen mirroring),Wearable.
4. Provides a clean and intuitive user interface.
5. The Samsung music shows recommendation of playlists from Spotify. You can find Spotify recommendation music by Spotify tab and search Spotify music you‚Äôll love.
(The Spotify tab is only available in countries where Spotify is on service.)

What is FLAC?
FLAC is an audio coding format similar to MP3 & AAC, but lossless, meaning that audio is compressed in FLAC without any loss in quality.


*** Required App Permissions ***
Below mandatory permission is required for basic features of Samsung Music.
Even if optional permission are denied, basic features may work properly.

[Mandatory Permission]
1. STORAGE permission :
   - Allows the player to write,modify,delete to SD card.
   - Allows the player to read data from SD card.

[Optional Permission]
2. MICROPHONE permission : Galaxy S4, Note3, Note4 only
   - Allows to control the player with voice commands which are listening, not recording.
     ex : PLAY,PAUSE,NEXT,PREVIOUS,VOLUME UP,VOLUME DOWN

3. PHONE permission : Korean devices only.
   - Verify your phone when using the music service.

[16.2.22.20]

comments: It's a great app so far but I have run into a slight issue with renaming songs. It seems like if you rename any songs you have downloaded with apps other than samsung music, it doesn't pick up on it. For example, if I have songnameA and I rename it to songnameB, it shows songnameB in the folder but in the app it doesn't change and is still songnameA. In the recently added section however, it shows songnameB, but as soon as I add it to a playlist it changes back to songnameA.

This really is a good music app. It's simple, clean (mostly), user friendly, and not glitchy. I'd only change 2 things, but they bug me enough to drop rating 1 star each. #1 PLEASE add the option to list multiple, separate, Artists and Genres in 'edit Track Details'?! There is one line to list any & all, but if I add 2(+) names or a 'feat', the track won't show up under each artist, only the 2(+) names together. #2 NEED 'Do Not Show Again' box on irritating SiriusXM ad when app starts up.

I have championed this app along with the very polished Internet and email apps Samsung makes. It is smooth, snappy, has good sound, is simple and light. But... Ads... They bothered me for a while, but I'm just learning to suck it up and deal with it. It's a couple of clicks every now and again. It's still the best in terms of functionality playing my local files. I like it's dark theme and generally feels intuitive. One star off because it would still be better without ads.

As of the last three updates this app has been the bug central. The worst of any music apps I've used. The welcome ads; freezing before playing a song; long pauses before deleting a playlist or removing a song from a playlist. What gives? It was never like this before. I wish there was an option to reset it to factory settings. I'll be looking for a new app today.

I had to move to this app because Google play shut down & YouTube music is garbage. It's alright. I can add music to some magical queue but somehow cannot look to see what's in said queue. It's good to make playlists & listen to music on random. However, unlike google play, when I put all my music on random I cant see a queue so I have no clue what's next, cant change my queue, and I dont like that. Unlike google play I cant swipe to the next song, I have to hit next, so in the car is not good.

title: Casey's
description:
Order a famous made-from-scratch Casey‚Äôs pizza, for carryout or delivery, with the all-new Casey's app. Browse our menu, see the best deals, customize your pizza, and place an order fast! And when it's time to order again on Friday, you can reorder your favorites with just a few taps.

Download the Casey's app today ‚Äì and create an account to join Casey‚Äôs Rewards ‚Äì so you can earn points, save your favorite order, set a default credit card, and search for nearby gas prices.
descriptionHTML:
Order a famous made-from-scratch Casey‚Äôs pizza, for carryout or delivery, with the all-new Casey's app. Browse our menu, see the best deals, customize your pizza, and place an order fast! And when it's time to order again on Friday, you can reorder your favorites with just a few taps.

Download the Casey's app today ‚Äì and create an account to join Casey‚Äôs Rewards ‚Äì so you can earn points, save your favorite order, set a default credit card, and search for nearby gas prices.
summary: Order pizza and earn points
recentChanges: This Casey‚Äôs app update is all about our 3 million Casey‚Äôs Rewards members! Quickly see how many points you‚Äôve earned for each transaction with the new Points History screen. You‚Äôll also be able to browse your offers with an all-new category sorting feature, making it even easier to find the offers you‚Äôre looking for. Enjoy!
comments: I like the food ordering options but other functions are pretty clunky. As far as rewards and needing to save them, why not just have it tied to your phone # instead of having to electronically 'clip it'? I'm turning off push messages too........way too many of them. I get it, you're selling pizza but not everyday is pizza day. Loll

I like Casey for convenience and has a good variety of what they carry including gas. Their employees are always very courteous and friendly. I do wish their new app that they want you to update but I do not have enough space to do this on my phone. I think we should still receive our points until we can get our phone corrected. Our Cellphone Company is having problems getting their help to the customer so I am stuck. The store itself is great in El Paso and we go to alot of Caseys because we dr
Easy to place my order, see daily deals and save deals and view my points so I can choose to use them or to wait until I accumulate more points.

Seems mostly okay, but has one bizarre flaw - I arrived well before the scheduled time, tapped the "I'm Here" button, and instead of acknowledging that information and maybe reminding me of the promised completion time, I got a baffling message instructing me to try again closer to the promised completion time. It is impossible to even fathom the motivation behind that insane response, so I must assume it is a software glitch or a practical joke.

When I first downloaded and used the app several months ago it owrked fine. Now I cant log in or order anything. I have uninstalled the app and reinstalled to no avail. It appears that other users are having the same problem. For now I have stopped using the app or trying to order pizza. Your loss.

title: Photo Studio
description:
Photo Studio is a powerful multifunctional photo editing application for photographers of any level. It contains the vast editing kit of tools for basic and advanced retouching of your photos. Make each your shot a perfect complete art-work using a wide range of effects, filters, text editing and color enhancement tools and a lot of other ready-to-use features.

Main features:

1. More than 200 unique filters, amazing special effects, a big collection of picture-in-picture effects, rich set of various frames for any event of your life, huge amount of stickers, textures, shapes and correction tools ‚Äì lighting tune, color correction, sharpening, lens boost, tilt shift, blur and more.

2. Use manual correction tools to highlight, fix or improve any part or object on your photo. Use mask correction tool to apply filters, effects or tune your photo selectively.

3. Collage editor allows to combine several photos into amazingly looking photo collages with a wide variety of adjustable frames, shapes, customizable backgrounds, templates and stickers.

4. Magic tools comprising the following outstanding features:¬† Blend feature for combining of two images together using a big collection of masks, backgrounds and blend modes; Color Splash is aimed to highlight objects on a photo; Clone stamp is intended to copy objects, change or erase a background; Shapes editor helps to combine photos with multiple variations of shapes, textures and backgrounds. 

5. Impressive text editing tool is designed for creation of nice-looking messages on your photos with rich collection of customizable fonts, color, textures and shapes.

6. About 50 additional content packages expanding the photo editing process with new effects, frames, textures, fonts and templates. Our team's constantly working hard to implement new stunning features to gain the #1 photo editor title.

Facebook: http://facebook.com/kvadgroup
Twitter: http://twitter.com/kvadgroup

- New filters, effects, stickers and so on.
- Real-time photo enhancement support
- New color palette

comments: I really like this editing app. It has lots of features and I have found it mostly easy to use. I have used other editing apps but always come back to this one. It would be a great feature in this app to be able to save, search, or favorite certain presets... like the preset texts. Overall, Great App. Good job. Plus, thanks for all the cool things available with this app for free.

This app is really easy to use, and has a lot of options to choose from when editing photos from various filters, to effects. There are so many things to do with this app, even with the free version. The only issue I have is sometimes a picture will become pixelated however majority of the time, the outcome is great. Definitely my favorite photo editing app

You can do alot of customisation and there are presets available for free which are enough to get you going, you can make realy nice edits with what's there you just need to get creative with it. and there aren't any ad pop-ups, insted they're on the side of your editor and don't get in the way of anything which is great. But most importantly you get full detail on the type of image you want to export and it gets saved in high quality. This is the best editor for free and highly recommend it!

App keeps crashing I have been using this app for a long time now, have had problems in the past but now it keeps crashing as soon as it's opens. So I uninstalled it and downloaded it again and it still keeps in crashing. I have purchased a LOT of effects, so I really need this to work. I gave 1 star because of this problem, if you can get this working for me I will upgrade the rating.

Bestest ever... Amazing app with ennumber of filters & effects. I've been using it for 3 years now and I love it! my all time favorite app. Easy to use and very impressive and the great part is that its almost add free. I strongly recommend it to everyone.

title: OfficeSuite - Office, PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint
description:
OfficeSuite is the smart choice for office productivity. Combining all the features that you need to read, edit, and create Word, Excel, PowerPoint and PDFs, OfficeSuite is the richest and most feature-packed solution for personal or professional use on mobile devices.

Documents, Spreadsheets & Presentations 
‚Ä¢	Powerful applications packed with helpful tools to handle any task.
‚Ä¢	All the advanced features you need ‚Äì format painter, track changes, conditional formatting, formulas, presentation mode and much more.
‚Ä¢	Familiar desktop-inspired feel that you know and love.
‚Ä¢	Export Word, Excel, or PowerPoint documents to PDF.
‚Ä¢	Advanced security options.

Advanced PDF management  
‚Ä¢	Open, view & annotate PDFs.
‚Ä¢	Work with fillable forms.
‚Ä¢	Digitally sign PDF documents.
‚Ä¢	Enhanced security and permissions management.
‚Ä¢	Convert PDF documents to Word, Excel or ePub.

Designed for work on the go 
‚Ä¢	Integrated cloud storage for easy access to files ‚Äì get 5GB free on our MobiDrive cloud or link your existing Google Drive, OneDrive, Box or Dropbox accounts.
‚Ä¢	Cross-platform capabilities linking your Windows PC with all your Android and iOS mobile devices. 
‚Ä¢	Compatibility with popular file formats ‚Äì Microsoft, OpenOffice, Apple's iWork and hundreds more.
‚Ä¢	Practical and user-friendly interface optimized for the latest Android version.

OfficeSuite is absolutely free to install and can be used to read, create and save documents. Start our free 7-day trial and you can see all that OfficeSuite has to offer, including editing documents and every other advanced tool and feature. If you like what you get, our flexible monthly and annual pricing plans allow you to select the right solution to best fit your needs.

Premium benefits include: 
‚Ä¢	50GB storage on MobiDrive
‚Ä¢	Unlimited PDF conversions
‚Ä¢	Unlock 20+ advanced features
‚Ä¢	Use with Premium on 2 mobile devices & 1 Windows PC.
‚Ä¢	No ads
‚Ä¢	Priority support

comments: Would give more stars but there is no support for this app, the help file is nothing more of a description of the words on screen no details on how to use anything. No online support or forums I can find website unhelpful and is just a marketing page. Cannot recommend an app that clearly has no customer focused support.

Great Office 365 alternative I have ever found. With other mobile wordprocessors that claim compatability, Word will only view and ask to save to edit. With OfficeSuite's Document app, this never happened, Word only went to editing. This was true for my personal desktop version too, went strait to editing with out any idication of issues. I am a Samsung DeX user and this also gives the best desktop experience. Just wish Aqua Mail was not seperate!

I love the OfficeSuites! I was a hardcore user of Microsoft's Office for over 20 years. I started using OfficeSuites two years ago and I haven't looked back! I have used all the suites including Excel, PowerPoint, PDF, Word, and Mail. They all run smoothly and without issue every time. I would like to see the Mail suite get more options like the option to mark the email "important" or "urgent" for sending and the ability to change the fonts inside the columns and rows, but these are not deal breakers for me. I am so glad I found OfficeSuites!

i just bought a new Samsung tablet, installed this believing it wouldn't have bugs associated with old ones, bought a year's subscription and it is full of glitches. It will not create new documents. It gives me a blank screen, no way to type a number or letter, i can type letters but they do not show or store. So i have to create documents from my Word program and import them in. It boots me out of my document often while i access a web page so not multi-tasking.

Just a rip off. You can't open any existing documents unless you pay for a subscription. So you pay it then you find that it doesn't come with the usual, everyday fonts, such as Arial, Times New Roman etc. These are part of the "Extended Font Pack" apparently üòÆ. If you want to use any documents that have these fonts (and you probably will, these are the standard, boring, day to day fonts) you'll have to pay another ¬£13.99 for the font pack to get your documents to open properly. Pfffft, keep it

title: Real Boxing ‚Äì¬†Fighting Game
description:
Real Boxing is a very popular fighting game & boxing simulator on Google Play, with jaw-dropping graphics, a full-blown career for your boxer and intuitive controls. Get your boxing gloves on and box like there‚Äôs no tomorrow!

The champion of the fighting games is here:

--- 
TOUCH ARCADE ‚Äì "It‚Äôs called Real Boxing for a very good reason, and it lives up to its name impeccably well." 4.5/5 
IGN ‚Äì ‚ÄúReal Boxing is an Unreal Engine-powered beauty.‚Äú
148 APPS ‚Äì "Real Boxing offers a console quality boxing app experience." 4.5/5 
---

Time to box & KO others in this boxing app! Vivid Games, the studio behind well known online fighting games on mobile, puts on the boxing gloves and presents the original KO boxing simulator that won the hearts of punching games fans worldwide! Enter the ring and let‚Äôs box!

KNOCKOUT GAMEPLAY IN THE ULTIMATE FIGHTING GAME
Fight using a variety of punches and combos in a knockout boxing app game. Box to up your fight game and tip the odds in favor of your boxer with power-ups. Feel every jab, hook and KO uppercut thanks to the most intuitive controls in multiplayer fighting games on mobile. They may be coming from kung fu or UFC roots, but you‚Äôve got the boxing gloves: whatever other opponents‚Äô fight games are, you‚Äôll always box like a boxeo boss, like Rocky.

COMPREHENSIVE CAREER IN THE TRUE BOXING SIMULATOR
This fight game is a challenge: knock out over 30 unique boxers with their own adaptive boxing styles in a full-blown career mode to become a true boxeo champion, the best boxer in the world! Welcome to the true fighting game on Android.

YOUR REAL BOXER, READY TO BOX
The fight night is coming, so get ready: customize your own boxer with dozens of unlockable hairstyles, tattoos, and gear. Train in a variety of boxeo mini-games as your fight game gets better and better. In this fighting game you‚Äôll face off against challengers as tough as Rocky Balboa!

BEFORE YOU KNOCKOUT: TRAIN & BOX IN A VARIETY OF MINI-GAMES
Put on your boxing gloves and get to the gym: boost your speed, strength and stamina enrolling in the training mode consisting of fun punching games (speed bag, heavy bag) and jumping a skipping rope.

EXHILARATING BONUS MODES
Put your boxing to the test and fight boxeo bosses in Real Boxing‚Äôs Arcade Mode, or take on the Underground Tournament to unlock brand new gear for your boxer!

AMAZING GRAPHICS & SOUND
As you box, immerse yourself in adrenaline pumping world of Unreal Engine-powered graphics and realistic motion-captured animations.

ENGAGING FEATURES
Win amazing boxeo prizes with Daily Rewards the Daily Spin. Also, how is your fight game? Check before the big fight night begins!

OVER 50 MILLION PUNCHING PLAYERS AROUND THE GLOBE!

Check more Vivid Games‚Äô online fighting games:
Real Boxing 2, the sequel, with more advanced graphics and combat mechanics.

Real Boxing is a trademark of Vivid Games. Unreal Engine is a product of Epic Games and is licensed. UFC is a registered trademark of UFC and is not affiliated nor featured in the game.

By downloading the game you accept our End User License Agreement, Terms of Service and Privacy Policy: http://support.vividgames.com/policies

description:
Waitr
Food Delivery & Carryout

Welcome to the Wonderful World of Waitr ‚Äî where great local food meets convenience!

Breakfast, brunch, lunch or dinner; have your favorites delivered.
Whether it‚Äôs a small coffee or a four-course meal, you can have it delivered for a flat fee, or order Carryout and pick it up for free. Browse restaurants in your area to find new favorites or order from the ones you already know and love. See your food like never before with our professionally photographed menus. Order the way you like with our customizable menu items and special requests feature. Start a Group Order to eat more conveniently with family, friends, and coworkers. recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: I like that this app accepts a lot of different forms of payment. Please add a GPS feature to allow customers to view drivers progress. A couple of recent drivers went to the wrong address. If I was able observe them, I would have been able to redirect them to my home and my food would certainly have been warmer when it arrived.
This was my first time using this app and service and I was pleased. My food was great, I had an estimated time for food arrival. Only drawback was that I couldn't track, otherwise I like this app!

The app is very usefull. At times the gps goes crazy while your driving. Not being from mississippi and relying on the gps makes it difficult sometimes. The gps is not always accurate and i have to use the waze app. To find my destination
App usually works very well, sometimes shows restaurants are available when they aren't. Overall, I use this way more than I should.

I use Waitr quite often, most of the time with no complaints. I do wish there was an easier, more streamlined way to deal with orders that finally arrive at the house-- incorrect -- though. I can't deal directly with the restaurant and the app is very time consuming when dealing with having paid for the food, tip, tax, fee, and delivery for something that isn't acceptable.

title: Connected Company
description:
Met de unieke Connected Company smartwatches, de connected watch K01 en E01, kunt u als gebruiker bellen en gebeld worden op uw eigen telefoonnummer. Ook kunt u een ander laten weten waar u bent of wanneer u hulp nodig hebt. Naast bellen kunt u via spraakberichten ook eenvoudig berichten uitwisselen.
 
De Connected Company app stelt u in staat uw connected watch (K01 en/of E01) in te stellen en te beheren. Het is uiteraard mogelijk om meerdere connected watches binnen de app te gebruiken waardoor u als beheerder het gemak heeft van √©√©n app voor meer connected watches.

De Connected Company app stelt u in staat uw connected watch (K01 en/of E01) in te stellen en te beheren. Het is uiteraard mogelijk om meerdere connected watches binnen de app te gebruiken waardoor u als beheerder het gemak heeft van √©√©n app voor meer connected watches.
summary: Met de Connected Company app kunt u uw connected smartwatch gebruiken

comments: It is very bright and helpful whether I am walking my dog at night or looking for something in the car or house. But it does not stay on very long, it cuts off after 2 or 3 min. And then depending on what I'm doing it can be a pain to stop and restart. It would be better with a longer time limit 5 - 10 min or maybe a confirmation before the session ends. "Are you finished y or n?" With default to end it if no answer.
I wish the flashlight would stay on till I decided to turn it off. I'll be in the middle of doing something or looking for something and the flashlight turns off. That is a total pain in my butt.
This app has saved me a number of times when I needed a light. It could last a little longer but still a great app.
Went from an S10+ to an S20+ and the flashlight has dimmed. Tried a handful of other apps with the same result. On an S10, this flashlight is best
Love it. One of the first things I downloaded on my new phone. Great at night when you have to get back from the bathroom without disturbing your significant other.

title: AnySoftKeyboard
description:
Any Soft Keyboard is an open-source, on-screen keyboard with multiple languages support with emphasis on privacy.
This is one of the most customizable keyboards available.

To activate: Launch 'AnySoftKeyboard Settings' App, and follow the instructions.

Main features:
* Multi languages keyboard support via external packages.
* Completion dictionaries for multiple languages.
* Also completes your typed words from you contacts names (Android 2.0+)!
* And, learns your typing behavior to provide next-word prediction.
* Multi-Touch support (as in, pressing SHIFT along with other characters).
* Extension keyboard (swipe your finger all the way up out of the keyboard).
* Voice Input support (Android 2.2+).
* Compact/Phablet Mode.
* Gesture support:
** Experimental Gesture-Typing (enable in the Settings app).
** Swipe left or right to switch layouts.
** Swipe up to shift.
** Swipe down to close the keyboard.
* Theme support (comes with a few built-in skins, and more available in Play Store).
* Night Mode: Quiet, Dark keyboard at night time (enable in the Settings app).
* Power-Saving Mode: No vibrations, sound, suggestions and a dark theme (enable in the Settings app).
* Build-in user dictionary words editor.
* Build-in abbreviations dictionary: create shortcuts for words and sentences.
* Utility keyboard (swipe up from space-bar):
** Clipboard actions copy, paste, select-all, select selectively (long-press select and use arrow keys).
** Voice input
** Arrows
* And many more features!

Support at: https://github.com/AnySoftKeyboard

developerAddress:
70 Haven Avenue 1G
New York, NY 10032
USA
recentChanges:
* Colorized nav-bar on supported devices. Needs to be enabled.
* Gesture-Typing fixes and improvements.
* Various fixes around theme setting.
* Updated translations.
* YABTU

More here: https://github.com/AnySoftKeyboard/AnySoftKeyboard/milestone/91
comments: The good things about this keyboard is the privacy oriented approach, the pleasant colour scheme and that's about all the good I can say about it. The layout is fairly outlandish and sometimes frustrating if you aren't used to it and by far the worst thing about it is the autocorrect, which is awful. It rarely corrects words such as "its" to "it's", "arent" to "aren't". The autocorrect has no sense of suggesting commonly used words and it never correctly interprets acronyms like "idk".

I love it in theory. but it's finicky. the Swype feature randomly turns off, I cant seem to find the options in the myriad of possibility its settings provide, took me fifteen minutes to get the extra language pack to show up... and if it doesn't know at all what word i mean it just doesn't write anything. and PLS don't require me to swipe all the way down to ' to write doesn't! I know its beta...but without the swiping input there's not enough there to change to it

I've use it few times before testing it, my last test mostly covers all my needs. It becomes my main keyboard, the only thing is missing feature is the hybrid language dictionary , I would like to use two or three at the same time. Lighteight excellent support for old versions of android. I use it in all my devices , actually four, thanks for your excellent work

Though it initially took some time to get it set up as I liked, I found this keyboard to be excellent. As a long-time user of SwiftKey I rarely ever find keyboard apps I like other than it but this one is very nice. The swipe and autocorrect has worked well for me. And I love that it asked for no sensitive permissions. One thing I would like to see is a little easier more functional use of emojis. Thank you to the developer for sharing. Grace and peace

I‚Äôm loving this app with how it offers a T9-like key layout. However, I would like an option to quickly toggle text suggestions, and to base word suggestions on the key pressed and letters on that key, not the current character typed. This would speed up typing for me more akin to the T9 typing experience and improve my enjoyment of the app. Thanks for making it open source too! It would be great to have a floating keyboard too.

title: Clue Hunter
description:
Uh oh! Your client‚Äôs husband is suspected of cheating! What are you going to do? Sniff out the clues and prove that he‚Äôs a cheater once for all and collect that bounty money! $$$

With this addictive and hilarious game, you will have non stop fun inside trying to find out what happens next! Who knows, you might even be compelled to make a video out of it for the internet! Are you detective enough? Find out now.
 
 Game Features:


1.       Don‚Äôt get fooled!
Each level presents you with multiple choices - make the right answers to catch the cheater. Wrong answers will result in misery for your client. So sad.

2.       So many cases to solve!
When you aren‚Äôt helping find cheaters and liars, you‚Äôre solving other high stakes crimes! Can you solve them all?

3.        A fun time for everyone!
Everybody can play Clue Hunter. If you get stumped - ask for help from your friends and loved ones! No shame in doing anything necessary to solve these ridiculous puzzles.

4.        Simple and Addicting Gameplay
Once you start you will want to keep solving the different cases. The best detective game out there!

5. Can you find the ‚ÄúSave the Girl‚Äù girl?
Good luck!
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      

Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

Everybody can play Clue Hunter. If you get stumped - ask for help from your friends and loved ones! No shame in doing anything necessary to solve these ridiculous puzzles.

4. Simple and Addicting Gameplay
Once you start you will want to keep solving the different cases. The best detective game out there!

5. Can you find the ‚ÄúSave the Girl‚Äù girl?
Good luck!


Visit https://lionstudios.cc/contact-us/ if have any feedback, need help on beating a level or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

title: PhonePe ‚Äì UPI, Recharges, Investments & Insurance
description:
PhonePe is a payments app that allows you to use BHIM UPI, your credit card and debit card or wallet to recharge your mobile phone, pay all your utility bills and also make instant payments at your favourite offline and online stores. You can also invest in mutual funds and buy insurance products on PhonePe.  

Link your bank account on PhonePe and transfer money with BHIM UPI instantly! The PhonePe app is safe and secure, meets all your payment and banking needs, and is much better than Internet banking. 

Things you can do on the PhonePe app:

Transfer money with BHIM UPI: Send and request money from your contacts anytime, anywhere. You can instantly transfer money to any mobile number with UPI and also send money to any bank account using a IFSC code. You can also check your account balance, save beneficiaries & manage multiple bank accounts across banks like SBI, ICICI Bank, HDFC bank, Bank of Baroda & 140+ banks.

Recharge your mobile and DTH connection safely from home: Recharge your prepaid mobile for operators like Jio, Vodafone, Airtel, Idea. You can also recharge your Datacard/DTH connections across leading providers like Tata Sky, SUN Direct, Airtel Direct, Videocon D2H.

Pay your Credit Card Bills: Pay credit card bills for Visa, Amex, MasterCard, Rupay & Diners.

Pay Utility Bills: Pay landline bills across Airtel, BSNL, Tata DoCoMo, MTNL, Reliance & electricity bills across 180+ billers like BESCOM, BSES, IGL, TNEB, MSEDCL. You can also pay your water, gas and broadband bills on PhonePe. What‚Äôs more? You can set Autopay and opt for recurring monthly bill payments using your credit card & never miss a bill payment again.

Use your favourite Apps on PhonePe Switch: Use your favourite food, travel, shopping & grocery Apps on ‚ÄòPhonePe Switch‚Äô, without downloading them. Order food on Domino‚Äôs, Faasos, eat.fit, Box8 and more food apps. Make travel bookings, shop, play & do more!

Insure your health & more: Insure yourself & your loved ones against hospitalization expenses with Insurance plans starting at Rs.199 only. Stepping out to buy essentials or going to another city? Get insured for all rail, road & air travel In India with our Domestic multi-trip insurance. 

Buy and Sell Gold: Buy and sell 24K Gold at live market rates. The Gold you buy gets stored in a free and secure bank locker.


Manage your Wealth with Mutual Funds: Invest in Super Funds & let experts manage your money! Grow your wealth with the right balance of Equity and Debt, and plan for a brighter future. You can also save tax quickly and easily by investing in Tax Saving Funds on PhonePe. 

Make easy online payments: Pay easily for electronics, mobiles, fashion, home and kitchen appliances across your favourite online shopping sites like Flipkart, Myntra.

Make Safe, Contactless offline Payments: Pay safely at stores using the PhonePe QR and make safe, cashless payments while shopping for grocery, medicines & more. Pay at your neighbourhood kirana store and across your favourite food and shopping outlets like KFC, Bata, More, Star Bazaar, Cafe Coffee Day, Pantaloons etc. 

Buy PhonePe Gift Cards: Buy a PhonePe Gift Card for easy payments across 1 lakh+ leading offline and online outlets and across the PhonePe app.

Manage your refunds: Manage and track refunds from your favourite shopping websites on PhonePe.

For more details, please visit our website at https://www.phonepe.com

Permissions for App and reasons:

SMS - We use this to verify Phone number for registration
Location - This is a requirement by NPCI for UPI transactions
Contacts - We use this to for phone numbers to send money to and choose numbers to recharge.
Camera - We use this to scan QR code.
Storage - We use this to store scanned QR code.
Accounts- We use this to pre-populate email ID while signing up.
Call - We use this to detect single vs dual sim and let user choose
Microphone - We use this to carry out KYC video verification

comments: Taking huge time during transaction happening. Every time I am facing such kind of issue. When it's launched at that time it was performing well. But now very worst process. Even when I try to make payment through Mobile number. Then it's take lots of time select the number or searching the number with right name. Payment by mobile number it's take 3-4minutes. I have real experience and I can show you recording of screen while I make the transaction.

Not upto the mark. Sincerely speaking - most times it fails without any valid reason. Got the response from the developer. However worth to mention here that, in other payment modes including BHIM UPI, such failures are rare. But in PhonePe it is frequent and recurring. Makes one annoying. Not reliable.

There are more failed transactions in my PhonePe history then successful ones. What has happened to this app?? None of the services work, mobile recharge fails, credit card payment fails, electricity bill payments fail, even simple UPI transfer also fail. These things have been failing frequently. There are just way too many updates, but it doesn't improve the overall service of the app. POOR!!!

After using many other payment apps, I found PhonePe app very convenient. The transactions happen without any glitch and very quickly. I just wish if they can reward their customers with more cashbacks and rewards to encourage them to use it more often for all the financial needs. Thanks for the wonderful service.

Starting , this app gives cashback either on lower amount or higher amount but now a days , it wouldn't give a single cashback on transferring up to 5000 . It gives coupon which is useless like play Rummy coupon , so I give 1 star bcoz , Rummy is bad game which destoyed many people life . Give cashback instead of coupon , Laura lassan. Also give some good offers , you given offers are not useful

summary: Recharge prepaid number, pay postpaid bills, check usage, offers and much more
comments: The network of idea getting weaker and weaker day by day. I am using this network for the last 10 to 12 years. In the beginning idea was not so good, But after some time I personally felt that it was the bestest network provider. But after joining with Vodafone the range of their network went down day by day. At my work place, at my home, infact sometimes in the outdoor the network goes down. It suddenly goes to 0kb/s from 235 or 300 kb/s speed. Please idea I request you to increase the network.

Idea sim is the worst , I have been using it from past 3 or 4 years but now it is really malfunctioning, the internet speed is too slow and also the network is very bad no matter wherever I go I can't use the internet properly, when I asked for help in the app it told me restart my phone but it didn't helped at all the network was the same, I had enough of this I am really going to port out.

Data Speed is very low, unstable connectivity. Takes more time to upload requested pages, and Data speed is not constant. Some time going to be very low. Idea tower is just 300- 400 meters distance from my home and no barriers in between. Last day there was no network from morning to afternoon. Today on 20/10/2020 after noon till evening there was no network. And no internet connectivity. Suffered a lot. Verry bad service

This app is really simple to use and eliminates the need to head out to get mobile recharge transactions done. It provides details about your plan, mobile data usage and all essentials However, the application keeps asking me to re-login everytime I open it again. As a customer, I have one sim card on my phone and having to login again (USING OTP) every time I close and open the app is really frustrating. Hopefully that is something that will be worked upon and improved.

Upgraded to worst. Now there is no details of -Calls -Messages -Data usage and Balance deduction. When it was 'idea' we were able to monitor all our all call history & SMS history details. Now they upgrade to Vi and become the worst service network ever. No we are only able to do online recharge and can see the main balance. I don't think we need a app to know balance and to recharge where we have lot of apps with the same options.

title: Camera MX - Photo & Video Camera
description:
Camera MX offers every Android user an easy-to-use yet full-fledged camera app, regardless of the manufacturer of their smartphone. With over 20,000,000 installs, Camera MX is one of the most trusted free stock camera alternatives for Android. Try it today to discover why!

High-Quality
1. Support of all resolutions and ratios your camera allows
2. Fine-tuned auto focus to make sure your photos come out crystal clear
3. Customizable JPEG Quality in the camera settings
4. Auto Optimization and HDR for high-quality photos even in low light situations

Next Level Video Recording
1. Pause your video recordings at anytime and apply video cuts in realtime
2. Timelapse video recording to create epic fast motion videos
3. Apply filters and effects in realtime and even switch them while you are recording

Essential Camera Features
1. Front and back camera support
2. Flash on/off/auto + torch light to brighten the scene permanently
3. Fast camera zoom with pinch finger gestures
4. Disable the shutter sound
5. Optional GPS setting to save your current location (latitude and longitude) to the EXIF metadata

Enhanced Camera Features
1. Timer for delayed shots
2. Grid lines for better photo compositions
3. Change the exposure value to brighten/darken your photos
4. Selfie display flash to take the best possible selfies even in low light situations
5. Lock focus and exposure with a long touch

Live Photos for Android
Take moving Live Photos that can come alive when touched - with "Live Shot".
No longer decide whether to take a high-res photo or a video. With "Live Shot" you got both!

Shoot-The-Past Burst Mode
Turn your camera in a high-speed burst camera and browse sequence shots of the seconds before you pulled the trigger. 

Effect & Filter Camera
1. Hand-picked selection of beautiful camera filters
2. Kaleidoscope camera effect creates stunning photos and videos
3. Mirror camera effects for fun selfies
4. Pencil and sketch drawing effects
5. Color Splash effect that highlights a single custom color
6. Little Planet effect morphs the scene into a tiny planet

Photo & Video Editor
1. Crop your photos
2. Change brightness, contrast, saturation and color temperature for your photos and videos
3. Apply any filter and effect edits to your photos and videos afterwards as well
4. Shorten your videos with the video trimmer
5. Slow motion and fast motion video editing
6. Slow down the best part of your video and create epic slow motion highlights
7. Scale your photos and videos to reduce their file size


Have questions about Camera MX? 
Ask our 10,000 member strong Google+ community: https://plus.google.com/communities/111611351770096008311
Or send an e-mail to: cameramx_support@magix.net
Be sure to follow us on Facebook for the latest news as well: https://www.facebook.com/cameramx

comments: Fantastic app! It could use a few more settings so users can tweak everything, and it would be nice to be able to pause the video-in-photo playing for a good screenshot. This is really a great app so far. *** One important problem I see with this app is that when you touch a spot on the screen to lock the focus, there is no way to make it autofocus again. :/ I got this app for the video-in-photo feature combined with the semi-manual focus feature, but the autofocus doesn't quite work right.

WOW .. just WOW !! After years of being frustrated with my Android device cameras, it's popped up in my play pass and I thought well let me give it a try. By FAR the clearest images & filters that you have just right as you're taking the picture without losing your shot. No more twisting and turning and getting cramps in my hands. HIGHLY RECOMMEND ‚òÖ

I like that it opens up instantly soon as clicked. No annoying whatevers to have to wait for. I will say its better than my fone camera. I have a galaxy flip 2. And I'm very disappointed with this camera. Was expecting better but probably would be better on a fine with better camera. Would like to see more filters, maybe add some fun Snapchat type effects but good job guys..

I am happy with my device camera which is far better than this application with slow motion, time lapse, boomrange, short videos,image and video effects, low light sensor, sony imx sensor, phanaroma, HDR, timer, beauty mode, tilt shift, manual, image stablization, bokeh mode, potrait mode and many more settings available in my device camera i dont think this app has something special to keep this.

It's okay. Trying my Powerdirector app for video editing and it will not accept any files that I use from this app. That was a deal breaker. I had to take each video file and convert it to the proper codec. There is no option in these settings to do that before transferring to a editor. Way too much time consuming just to get a decent video clip for editing. Not worth the time or effort.

title: Kids Doodle - Color & Draw Free Game
description:
Kids Doodle, the BEST android drawing app for kids!

Kids Doodle is particularly designed for kids with super easy-to-use painting on photo or canvas. 

It has endless bright colors and 24 beautiful brushes, such as glow, neon, rainbow, crayon and sketchy, etc.

App supports unique "movie" mode, which can play back kid's artwork like a small film. Children love it so much!

The built-in gallery stores both kids drawing picture and drawing procedure. Kids can continue their drawing whenever they want, or "movie" their previous masterpiece anytime they would love.

‚Ä®GAME FEATURES:
* paint on photo or canvas‚Ä®* 24 brushes, such as glow, neon, fireworks, spark, star, rainbow, crayon, spray, ribbon, etc‚Ä®
* bright colors
* creative drawing
* built-in art gallery stores both doodle and doodle animation.‚Ä®
* "movie" mode to play back the drawing like a little film.‚Ä®
* undo, redo‚Ä®
* share drawing via Facebook, twitter, instagram, gmail, etc.
